address: 116 Nguyen Cu Trinh, Phuong Nguyen Cu Trinh, Quan 1, Ho Chi Minh, Quận 1, Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam, 700000
reviews: ['tất cả mọi thứ đều tốt, nhưng máy nước nóng quá tệ, không hoạt động', 'Khách sạn mới sạch sẽ.  Phòng rộng có cửa sổ to rất thoáng. Nhân viên đáng yêu nhiệt tình. Lần sau sẽ quay lại tiếp.', 'Ấn tượng đầu tiên của mình khi bước vào khách sạn là nhân viên ở đây cực kỳ thân thiện và nhiệt tình giúp đỡ khi mình cần. Vị trí khách sạn thuận lợi để di chuyển nhiều nơi với tiền grab chưa tới 30k. Phòng ốc ở đây thoải mái và đáp ứng đầy đủ các như cầu của mình, có cửa sổ nên khá thoáng và còn được ngắm view thành phố. Trên tầng 6 khách sạn có quán cà phê, buổi tối lên đấy chill chill ngắm nhìn thành phố về đêm cũng khá hay ho.', 'Phòng có cửa sổ rất rộng và view thành phố, đủ để mình cảm thấy thú vị. Những người trong khách sạn rất dễ mến, mình tiếp xúc với những người đó vài lần, để ... báo khắc phục vài sự cố trong phòng nghỉ. Mong rằng mình là vị khách xui nhất. Thực sự tiếc khi mọi thứ có thể tốt hơn rất nhiều!', 'Nằm ngay trung tâm, thuận tiện hàng quán Cơ sở vật chất xuống cấp, lỗi thời Nếu bạn muốn bình dân, giá rẻ, có thể ở đây', 'Nhưng phòng hơi cũ rồi.Được cái lúc mình book thì phòng tầng trên, có view 1 chút để nhìn thành phố về đêm.Các vật dụng tương đối cũ rồi, ko được như trong hình ảnh thiết kế đâu =)))', 'Tệ, nhà nghỉ giá khách sạn. Trong hẻm chật chội, phòng ốc chưa được sạch sẽ. Nhân viên nhiệt tình.', 'Địa điểm, sạch sẽ, tiện nghi , nhân viên điều OK . Chỉ có điều nước vòi sen phòng tắm yếu . Nhưng vẫn cho 5 sao', 'Vị trí và giá tiền phải hài lòngKhách sạn cạnh công trường đang xây rất ồn ào', 'Khách sạn cũ không như hình quảng cáo,  mền và ra dơ hơi ngứa, gối ko êm và quá cao, máy nước nóng trong nhà tắm bị hỏng, bụi bặm bám ở nhìu nơi do dọn vệ sinh ko kỹ .Nhân viên phục vụ khá tốtKhông có ăn sángThang máy rất dơ bẩn', 'Quá tệ, bên cạnh xây dựng ồn ào, nhà vệ sinh bốc mùi, không có nước nóng.', 'Gần khu Tây Ba Lô nhưng không bị qua ồn ào.  Phòng sạch sẽ, sáng và thoáng. Khách lịch sự. Giá hợp lý.', 'Tôi tới khá sớm khoảng 6g sáng nên phải đợi tới 14g để nhận phòng . Bạn lễ tân ca đêm rất thân thiện giúp đỡ khá nhiệt tình . Phòng rộng rãi , nhà vệ sinh cũng khá sạch sẽ ! Không có máy sáy tóc và bàn ủi trong phòng . Khách sạn nằm ở trung tâm ,  rất dễ tìm ! Có cơ hội sẽ quay lại .', 'Các bạn nv đã up free cho mình lên phòng tầng cao nhất. Phòng ở đây rất đẹp, nhìn rất sạch sẽ, thân thiện từ nv bảo vệ tới lễ tân. Nhất định lần sau tới sẽ quay lại', '+ Khách sạn ở trung tâm quận 1, đi đâu cũng tiện, từ khách sạn đi đến các dịa đanh hoặc các quán ăn ngon đều rất gần (25-30k grab car) + Mình ở phòng hạng thấp nhất nhưng cũng đầy đủ tiện nghi. Phòng có cửa sổ view nhìn được cả Bitexco nên khá thoáng. Phòng vs rộng so với phòng + Nhân viên ở đây từ bạn nam quản lý cho đến cô chú bảo vệ, buồng phòng đều rất thân thiện, hiếu khách. Mình rất ấn tượng với nhân viên ở đây. + Có quán cafe ở tầng 6 của tòa nhà cũng khá ổn.', 'Phòng sạch sẽ,nhân viên tốt thân thiện,miếng dặm chân ko đc sạch nhưg chấp nhân dc,miếng dặm chân trắng sạch thì ok. toillet ko chật chội như các nơi khác,nhưng bồn cầu thì quá cũ,ksan nên thay bồn cầu mới thì tốt và ron đường gạch cho trắng sạch thì ok. Tôi bình dân nên tạm chấp nhận đc, nếu người sống cao cấp hơn tí thì họ xem ksan nội thất tệ. Với tôi tạm đc.', 'Khách sạn nằm  ngay trung tâm, vị trí mặt tiền đường khá tốt. Phòng sạch sẽ tiện nghi nói chung giá cả hợp lý, có điều thang máy hơi cũ và chậm. Nhân viên nữ tiếp tân dễ thương, hỗ trợ nhiệt tình cho khách theo yêu cầu. Nhân viên nam buổi tối cũng được và ngay cả 2 bác bảo vệ cũng dễ mến. Nói chung là good cho 1 khách sạn tầm 2 sao giá rẻ tại khu vực trung tâm Quận 1.', 'I have paid cash on my first day of arrival for Studio Apartment for 3 Nights (at pricing SGD$108.03 about VND1, 848,015). But I was given a Duluxe Room at Room Number 204 for the 3 nights. Room booked is much more smaller not as same comfirm reservation booked.I am a frequent traveller and I have been booking hotels around Ho Chi Minh City and other parts of Central Vietnam. This is the first time where the property accommodation 1) did not issue a client/ visitor after paying in cash VND1, 848,015.2) and also the first time where the property which is Savanna Hotel did not promised the same room accommodation as booked. 3) Today 25 June 2019, I check out from your property. I have asked for the receipt again.. I have got the same reply from the guy serving at the front desk. In the end, I have request him to email the receipt to show that I have paid VND1, 848,015. Till now I have not received a single email of the receipt. I will hope that your management team will look it.', 'New hotel in perfect location, 2 minutes walk to bui vien. Friendly staff.. Rooms are modern and with really nice beds and bedsheets. Huge bathrooms.. Highly recommended if you looking for nice modern rooms in good location..', 'Avoid rooms 601 and 602. They have a bar 3 metres from your door. (Inside of the same hotel).With very loud music until 00.00-01.00 am. (despitenat the receptiom they will say to you that they will turn off music at 22.00-22.30.']

address: 17-19-21 Lý Tự Trọng, Phường Bến Nghé, Quận 1, Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam
reviews: ['Khách sạn đẹp, nhân viên nhiệt tình tuy nhiên đồ ăn sáng quá ít lựa chọn, không ngon', 'good location', 'pros   very clean room  bed comfortable  home like feeling  staff very nice   gym greatlocation excellent near the centercons  maybe its my bad luck but a/c positioning right over bed not good  if u keep it on u can get sick  if you turn it off hot     con also  some very loud construction during day time and i was jet lagged sleeping during dayalso hallways are not air conditioned', "This was my second time staying at the Norfolk. The location is awesome and the facilities are great. It's highly recommended if you're a family or just want more space than what a normal hotel room offers.", 'Although I love the aura of the old hotels in Saigon (Caravelle, Rex, Grand, Continental, and Majestic), and usually find a good buy on a suite with them, I could not find sypuch this time, so I decided to try Norfolk Mansions.  Very glad I did.  Much more spacious than hotel suites and includes a kitchen.  The trade-off is that your room-included breakfast is much more rudimentary (but quite acceptable) than the huge buffet breakfasts offered by hotels.  In addition, the welcoming fruit basket at the apartel is nothing compared to those at the hotels.  But I think the trade-off worthwhile if the Norfolk Mansions is offering a good rate, as I found.  I would do it again. 😍', 'Actually  it  was  good  for every group.  Wide living room and reasonable  kitchen.  Good  location which can walk near the central places. The  weather  make  us  to  take a taxi but it is too short to take a taxi.  Except this  it  was  great  hotel.', "Staff go above and beyond to help you out - needed transport from the hotel: they booked and supported me with what I was going to expect when I got to the terminal early the next morning.I've given the staff 3 stars - this is not because of the continued help, it's because when I checked in they had a print out of my credit card from Booking.com and it had all my details including the CCV in full display. I explained that this was not acceptable as anyone could go and purchase online with a less secure card. Apart from this, the rooms are huge and spotlessly clean with a balcony.", "I live in suburban HCMC and like to do getaways to D1 at times. This was my first time staying at Norfolk Mansion. It's a great area of HCMC & D1 (the Japanese area), which has tons of restaurants, spas, and bars around. If you like craft beer, the best craft beer pub, Heart of Darkness, is only 100m down the road. Check in and check out were quick and easy. The facilities at Norfolk are fantastic. The room was big, clean, and comfortable. It was quiet, too. No complaints. The breakfast was yummy. Not only are there the buffet items, but there is a small menu from which you can order pho, eggs, and a couple of other items. The swimming pool is great (big enough to do laps) and the gym is very well-stocked with a variety of machine and free weight equipment. The sauna/steambath/jacuzzi area is one of the nicest I've seen in a hotel like this. The hotel doesn't have a busy feel in any of the facilities, also, which was nice. Overall, it was a great stay at Norfolk. I'll be back!", 'The staff was so helpful and friendly, the room clean and spacious (I was even upgraded to a higher class room without extra-charge) and the place overall is very nice. Next time I come to HCMC this will definitely be my choice!', 'Incredible. Brilliant in every . aspect.  Stunning. I stay frequently via business experiences atvthe best 5 star hotels in many countries. There are no better places to stay within a city environment any where. I am going back to HCM City for a weeks holiday and that is 90% so I can stay at the Norfolk  Mansion. Staff brilliant-  absolutely. A smile given gets you at least two back ! Wonderful WOW.', 'We booked a 2 bed apartment. Our kids loved it. The apartment had a lounge and dining area, small kitchen, office area and ensuite bathrooms for both rooms. The wifi was good in the whole apartment. There was a lot of cupboard space which you don’t normally find. The whole space was great for our family of 2 adults and 2 kids. 1 room has a king size (UK) bed and the other has a double bed. The staff are really friendly and helpful. Breakfast options were fine.  The best part though was the location.  You can walk to all the main sights around District 1, but the area is on the quieter side. Definitely recommend this as an option for families. I have stayed in the Park Hyatt before with a friend and this definitely beats that for a family friendly option.', 'This is the best hotel I have ever stayed! Everything is great! Great service and rooms are clean and tidy. All the staff can speak fluent English! I will definitely stay in this hotel next time! Highly recommended!', "This hotel is a must stay in Ho Chi Minh. It may be a little pricy compared to other options, but three of us it was perfect. There was A LOT of room with the two bedrooms starting at 88 sqm (about three times the size of normal hotels). If you think that's excessive, imagine the living space of a nice TV lounge, a large balcony overlooking the city, two comfortable bed rooms, two bathrooms (no need to prioritise who goes in first), a small bar area and a dining area should you get take out, all after a hard / hot day's touring.The staff is unbelievable. Everyone speaks English, is trained to be hospitable. The bell person cheers up your day before you go out, and the reception very helpful - and can make calls to local tour companies for you. The hotel has a nice (if small) pool, a really good gym (with a stair master) and an adjacent Chinese restaurant that we found to be excellent. There were also welcome drinks and breakfast at the T restaurant was also above par of many hotels.You get what you paid for and if you are already going for a hotel, top up a little more and go for the Norfolk Mansion. You won't regret it.", "Initially, thought that it was Norfolk Hotel.  Hotel staff was kind enough to call a taxi to drive us to the actual place.  The place was clean and spacious. It was as if you are at ease with a new house.  All facilities are available. One exclusion - there is no toilet water gush near the toilet bowl. Usually, there is always one in Vietnam hotel rooms. Location ain't convenient.  Need to call cab even for short trip to Ben Thanh market we were with our elderly mother-inlaw.", 'Most welcoming staff.  Very accommodating from the moment we arrived until we left.   Service apartment was more like home than a hotel room.  Having fresh fruit on the table when we arrived was nice & we appreciated being able to do laundry before heading home too.', 'Hotel is situated in District 1 with many eateries, massage palours (good & clean massage, not those sleazy ones) and pubs within walking distance.The hotel is an apartment converted into a hotel with clean rooms and delicious breakfast.I will come back to stay again.', "I really can't falter this place.  We were made to feel very welcome as soon as we  arrived .  All staff across all service areas were always extremely helpful and friendly. Their professional manner and willingness to assist in any way truly made our 5th trip to HCM our best. The 2 bdrm premier room we stayed in was very clean, modern and great layout.  No problem with hot water for showers and good water pressure. Great view from our good sized balcony.  Free to use laundrette available with free powder provided.  Great location, only 5 min walk to Dong Khoi, Opera house and Notre Dame. Great range of restaurants both in price and variety in very close proximity but ladies do your homework if you are looking at Beauty treatments as prices vary immensely  and you could  easily  pay 3x more than needed. I would highly recommend Norfolk Mansion to families and couples as it is like being in a home away from home. We stayed here for 2 weeks and enjoyed every minute.", 'enjoyable, friendly staff, good clean environment, the interior furnishing of the aprtment not luxury enough for the upper class income group, nto much different from other service apartment. need to refurbish to better fabric and floor tile or carpet.', 'This is my second time to visit Vietnam, this hotel I trust it is extremely good service and take care for all room hotel guest. I would like to come and stay with this nice hotel at Vietnam Ho Chi Minh, also easy and work to Vincom center shopping mall, we can eat at the food mall at the basement.', "It was my first time to come to Vietnam and since I'm moslem then I prefer to stay in an apartment. The review stated in Agoda about Norfolk made me choose this hotel and the reviews are very accurate. I found this hotel very nice, big rooms, good lighting, and there's a balcony too. Kitchen utensils were there although not too complete but appropriate for short term stays. Location is good and easy to get the cab and there's a minimart in the hotel compound.\r\rOverall, this hotel is very recommended."]

address: 41-47 Đông Du, Quận 1, Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam, 70000
reviews: ['Mình đi công tác sài gòn,mục đích lấy bộ mẫu mỹ phẩm về Hn,nên để các bộ mẫu ngay bàn trang điểm,và để nguyên như vậy để cầm về Hà nội.Khi 2 vợ chồng đóng cửa đi dạo 2 tiếng,1 lúc quay về thấy phòng đã dọn và 3 hộp mẫu đã mất,chắc chắn nv dọn phòng đã lấy vì chỉ có họ vào phòng,cũng tại mình cứ để 31 món hộp mẫu trên bàn,khi về phòng còn 28 hộp,chắc nv dọn phòng nghĩ mình để lộn xộn và nhiều món nên mất không nhận ra và tưởng là hộp có ruột,khi được hỏi thì chối bay chối biến mặt tái mét,thật không thể không bực mình được,biết là nv dọn phòng lấy nhưng ko làm như thế nào được.Về khách sạn,ăn sáng ổn,vị trí trung tâm,nv lễ tân,bảo vệ thái độ tốt,mỗi nv dọn phòng ngày hôm đó là 1 cô nv nhìn mặt đã gian rồi,mất bộ mẫu khiến vợ chồng mình mất công đi vào sg bực mình kinh khủng', 'Khach san gan trung tam', 'Vị trí trung tâm nhưng phòng nhỏ. Đi về khuya ko tiện lắm', 'phòng sạch sẽ, địa điểm thuận lợi', 'I had an amazing stay at Saigon Hotel , so impressed with staff here , specially those at Front Desk whose names as I remembered like Vicky and Eric are very attentive and caring. They were trying to accommodate  my needs with lovely spacious and clean room which every single traveler may expect, a glass mirror for razor should be better.The breakfast is full of choices which I am satisfied with what I paid for, highly recommend this hotel.', 'The Front desk bent over backwards to attend to our needs, very friendly and professional. I really appreciate your kindness & courtesy.  Rooms are fully equipped and comfortable. Definitely is our first choice in this city for when I get back.', 'I enjoyed my stay here. Breakfast is good but small, elevators are slow. The pillows could be softer. I would be fine staying here again if I ever went back.', 'The hotel is very comfortable. Very helpful staff. Location is very convenient for guests to go to very where in HCM city.', 'Very convenient location! Only thing concerned is that you can hear outside noise from door very obviously..', 'Good hotel', 'Overall a very good stay marred at the end by charges for a small towel which apparently disappeared. We had two rooms and stayed a week and I feel that this was uncalled for. Very petty.Other than this, the staff was courteous and efficient and the rooms were nice. Excellent location', "The room was lovely and very clean. Linens were great. The bathroom awesome with a nice tub. The free breakfast buffet was lovely with both western and asian food. Everything a tourist or a return visitor would want was in the area. Plenty of good restaurants and shopping for tourist or those living in VN. I'm an expat returning from the US on my way to Da Nang and will return regularly. Highly recommend Sai Gon Hotel!", 'Hotel was located strategically in the Dong Khoi district and was really convenient as there are many eateries and 24 hour-convenience shops around. Excellent massage place down the street. Room was big and very spacious, and the toilet was really clean. Will definitely recommend to friends!!!', 'The stay was very comfortable. It was such a nice hotel, well suited our needs;1) Saigon Hotel staffs are very polite. We are allowed slightly early check-in. As we travel on Ramadhan, they even provide Halal breakfast pack for especially for us every early morning.2) It is located opposite to the Ho Chi Minh Main Mosque, with few Halal restaurants around the same street. It makes it convenient for Muslim travellers.3) Cab ride to spot places such as Ben Tanh market, Saigon Square, etc is just between 5-10 minutes taxi ride.4) Convenient Store, ATM, are available on the same street.5) Room was very clean, well equipped, well designed, and very comfortable for the price.Will surely stay here again in the future.', 'Need to diversify breakfast', "Good location, room is clean However the lower floor with street facing is quite terrible. It's really difficult to sleep due to the terrible noisy from street until early morning. Try not to take these rooms if you want to have a good night.", 'All staffs are very friendly and nice.Location is also very convenient and good.Breakfast is delicious.But,because the front of the hotel many people are gathering at night everyday,hotel room is little noisy.', 'The hotel is clean and great access to most of the sightseeing places in the city. They also offer good breakfasts everyday. But more than anything, the staffs are great. They are all kind, friendly and very helpful, especially a woman named Jolie of the reception desk who kindly helped me when I had a trouble with a bike driver. (There is one more person I would like to tell my gratitude but I forgot to ask his name... ) I would definitely recommend this hotel.', 'Staff is  helpful and friendly. Great hotel to stay in. I will be back to stay in the hotel.', 'Very close to the Mosque & several halal food resto']

address: 52-54 Đường Thủ Khoa Huân , Phường Bến Thành, Quận 1, Thành Phố Hồ Chí Minh, Quận 1, Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam, 70000
reviews: ['Khách sạn thuận tiện đi lại, nhân viên nhiệt tình', 'tôi rât thích', 'Tôi đã ở khách sạn A&Em ở nhiều chi nhánh khác nhau và đã là member VIP của A&Em nhưng khi book phòng trên Agoda, tôi đến khách sạn lúc 11:50 thì nhân viên vẫn phải bắt tôi ngồi ở sảnh đợi thêm 10phut thì mới đưa key lên phòng. Quá tệ và rất thất vọng. Sẽ không bao giờ quay lại A&Em Signature!', 'Ưu điểm là gần trung tâm nhưng phòng không sạch cho lắm', 'Gan trung tam, gia tot', 'tôi có 5 người mà đc sắp 2 phòng family , rất rộng , thoải mái & dịch vụ rất tốt', 'Nhân viên thân thiện, đồ ăn sáng ngon, khách sạn sạch sẽ, hồ bơi hơi nhỏ.', 'Mình đặt 3 đêm phòng 2 giường qua agoda, đến lễ tân nhận phòng, mình đồng ý thêm 5$/1 đêm (3đêm) để đổi phòng giường đôi, nhưng phòng vẫn không có cửa sổ.  Khách sạn bí, phòng không cửa sổ, phòng thiếu ánh sáng, ko xứng đáng với giá tiền. Nhân viên ko thân thiện. Vệ sinh phòng bẩn. Đêm đầu tiên mình ở, sáng ra dọn phòng, thay khăn nhưng không thay ga giường, (và ga giường trước khi vợ chồng mình đến cũng không được thay vì trên ga giường đã có vết bẩn). phòng tắm ướt át, bẩn thỉu, nền nhà tắm có những vết đất cát đã bị khô, tạo thành những mảng bẩn to, do không đánh rửa nền nhà tắm.  Đêm thứ 2 dậy, vợ chồng mình ra ngoài đến gần 1h chiều về, phòng vẫn chưa dọn, chăn ga gối lộn xộn, mọi thứ đều y nguyên như trước khi mình ra khỏi phòng. Chỉ bằng này lí do đủ khiến mình  không bao giờ quay lại khách sạn này nữa!', 'Nhân viên lễ tân mải làm việc riêng mà bắt khách chờ lâu cũng ko biết nói xin lỗi.Bellman ko giúp khách mang hàn lý lên phòng cũng ko có ai hướng dẫn các tiện ích trong phòng và khách sạn', 'ks thuan lợi cho việc đi lại', 'Phòng đẹp và rộng ,rất thích hồ bơi và bar rooftop.Trà chiều ok cần thêm nhiều món.', 'Nhan Viên nhiet tinh, de thuong, Phòng hoi mui kho chiu, Bon tam massage tot, an sang khong nhieu mon va 2 ngay ma mon giong nhau cam giac nhu an lai do nguoi, tra chieu ca Fe tot.', 'Ngay chợ bến thành ,có hồ bơi và khu vực rooftop thư giãn buổi tối rất tốt', 'Nhân viên thân thiện', 'Sang trong, thiet ke dep', 'Tiện đi lại,phòng sạch sẽ ,ăn sáng được ,nhân viên hoà nhã .', 'Check in hơi lâu ,nhưng nhân viên nhiệt tinh ,ăn sáng phong phú .', 'Phòng không có cửa sổ  nên thoáng mát', 'Khách sạn ngay chợ bến thành và có hồ bơi ,rất thuận tiện bạn bè đưa đón, có trà chiều và bánh ngọt miễn phí .', 'không ấn tượng']

It was such a nice hotel, well suited our needs;1) Saigon Hotel staffs are very polite. We are allowed slightly early check-in. As we travel on Ramadhan, they even provide Halal breakfast pack for especially for us every early morning.2) It is located opposite to the Ho Chi Minh Main Mosque, with few Halal restaurants around the same street. It makes it convenient for Muslim travellers.3) Cab ride to spot places such as Ben Tanh market, Saigon Square, etc is just between 5-10 minutes taxi ride.4) Convenient Store, ATM, are available on the same street.5) Room was very clean, well equipped, well designed, and very comfortable for the price.Will surely stay here again in the future.', 'Need to diversify breakfast', "Good location, room is clean However the lower floor with street facing is quite terrible. It's really difficult to sleep due to the terrible noisy from street until early morning. Try not to take these rooms if you want to have a good night.", 'All staffs are very friendly and nice.Location is also very convenient and good.Breakfast is delicious.But,because the front of the hotel many people are gathering at night everyday,hotel room is little noisy.', 'The hotel is clean and great access to most of the sightseeing places in the city. They also offer good breakfasts everyday. But more than anything, the staffs are great. They are all kind, friendly and very helpful, especially a woman named Jolie of the reception desk who kindly helped me when I had a trouble with a bike driver. (There is one more person I would like to tell my gratitude but I forgot to ask his name... ) I would definitely recommend this hotel.', 'Staff is  helpful and friendly. Great hotel to stay in. I will be back to stay in the hotel.', 'Very close to the Mosque & several halal food resto']

address: 8A/8D2 Thái Văn Lung, Quận 1, Quận 1, Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam
reviews: ['(+)Nhân viên thân thiện, phòng ốc sạch sẽ, vị trí trung tâm. Có thể yêu cầu khách sạn chuẩn bị cháo cho em bé.(-) Nhà mình ở phòng gác mái, ban đêm có tiếng chuột kêu rúc rích bên ngoài, phòng nhỏ, ăn sáng không ngon/ ít món, giá tiền hơi đắt so với điều kiện phòng và xung quanh lại có rất nhiều khách sạn khác tương đương', 'Tôi khá hài lòng với kỳ công tác ở đây. Nhân viên khách sạn rất thân thiện và nhớ tên tôi dù tôi mới ở một lần vài tháng trước đó. Vị trí trung tâm trong khu phố Nhật rất thuận tiện cho việc ăn uống và tiếp đãi khách hàng ở đây.', 'Khách sạn bố trí cho tôi phòng ở tầng cao nhất là tầng 8 tuy nhiên không có thang máy lên tâng này mà phải đi bộ từ tầng 7 lên. Đây là điểm duy nhất tôi cảm thấy chưa hài lòng trong thời gian lưu lại đây.', 'Ấn tượng nhất là nhân viên rất nhiệt tình và thân thiện', 'moi viec tot', 'Khách sạn tuy nhỏ nhưng giá cả phải chăng, có ăn sáng và thuận tiện cho việc đi lại cũng như thăm quan du lịch', 'Tôi không đặc biệt có nhận xét gì về khách sạn này, phòng sạch sẽ, thiết bị ổn nhưng hơi nhỏ. Phù hợp cho đi công tác.', 'Tôi không đặc biệt có nhận xét gì về khách sạn này, phòng sạch sẽ, thiết bị ổn nhưng hơi nhỏ. Phù hợp cho đi công tác.', 'A good value and friendly hotel in the heart of District 1.', 'Front desk personnel are friendly, helpful, and speak English well.  No other hotel personnel speak English.  Stayed at this hotel multiple times over last 2 years and always receive warm and pleasant reception.  Small unique hotel with approximately 28 rooms (7 floors).  Rooms are small but adequate for 1 -2 people. Great location within walking distance to many City Central destination points.  Limited breakfast options available.', 'Cherry Hotel is a simple hotel that is worth the value. The staff is quite friendly with great English for Vietnam, it is in a fun and convenient part of town, and has the essentials. Things to note: walls are thin so it is easy to hear the TV or noise from neighboring rooms, and the breakfast is rather limited after 8:00am.', "Nice place, the room was decent for the price, although the 'park view' was reminding me of the fawlty towers 'sea view when standing on the toilet' scene! Nice big window though.Breakfast was decent for this price range. And they kept it topped up with fresh hot dishes. Milk was even cold which is rare!", 'This is a good hotel in the city. Hotel staff can speak English well and helpful. Breakfast quite good. Hotel area is clean. Price is not expensive compare with other hotel in the same area. I will stay there again next time I go to Ho Chi Minh. Hotel is near night club bar etc. can walk from hotel. Also it is near shoping center and tourist place like post office and church.', 'the hotel is situated in the city can walk to tourist place easily. the room is clean and has space enought for 2 persons. Breakfast is ok compare with hotel price.Hotel staff can communicate in English well. I can check in check out very fast and can check out late until 4pm. I will stay this hoel again next time.', 'the hotel is situated in a relatively quiet area\rwith plenty of good restaurants and bars, though some are pricey compared to local restaurants\rthis area is known and catered to japanese and korean tourists/businessmen', 'the hotel was clean, it was quite spacious. Staff was friendly and helpful. the bed was super comfortable. Only thing was there was a smell in the room once in a while but overall, everything was fantastic. the hotel is value for money! Location was also good', 'a neutrally decorated hotel in central saigon. if you are to go to the usual night clubs your way back at the end of the night will be most convenient. the hotel is very centrally located for shopping and all sights  can be reached on foot. the rooms of the hotel are furnished comfortably in a neutral decor. bed was very comfotable and staff helpful without pushy as i found in some other parts of northern vietnam.', 'When we asked the Staff about the nearest available massages and hair salon services,they told us to go to a beauty spa that were much farther than what we would haave wanted.  We were in the taxi going to the place they suggested, but found several available spas on they way. After we passed the fourth spa, we decided not to go further but to stop and try it. The place and service was so good.  A couple of days later, we again went for another massage, this time, to the first spa we saw and the services and prices were even better, cheaper than the place where the hotel staff suggested at first.', 'we stayed here for three nights and it is indeed a good place to base. very near to everything yet in a quiet street. the color scheme is light and bright and the rooms are spotless. most hotels in these area are mid priced but cherry is more affordable and has good service. the real kicker for me is the location as it is two blocks away from opera house, convenience store, good restaurants and shopping areas.']

address: 26/12 đường Trương Định, phường Bến Thành, quận 1, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh., Quận 1, Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam, 8438
reviews: ['KS giữ đúng phòng có bồn tắm nhỏ như tôi yêu cầu, sạch sẽ. Nơi đây gần chợ Bến Thành và điểm trung chuyển bus Hàm Nghi - nơi có thể bắt xe đi khắp nơi (Suối Tiên, sân bay,...) nên rất thuận tiện.  Giá tốt khi xét về vị trí, không gian vừa phải, tiện nghi bởi  giá ở quận 1 thường cao hơn hẳn.', 'Nhân viên rất tận tâm, khách sạn sạch sẽ và ở vị trí rất tiện lợi ! xin cám ơn rất nhiều ạ', 'hài lòng, gần trung tâm, tiện lợi đi tham quan các địa điểm lân cận, gần chợ bến thành', 'Firstly, there was a constant urine smell in our room. Secondly, we booked for connected room but ended up we stayed in different floors. Thirdly, the picture shown online was totally different from the actual room which i really felt disappointed about it.', 'The pictures of the rooms on their hotel page is false and misleading. I was shocked to find out my room was not the same room as advertised.  The receptionist showed me a few rooms and they all have not been renovated. My room had exposed wires and unfinished paint. There were no security lock and amenities were missing. The whole place smells terrible because the receptionist explained that they were fixing the plumbing pipe, so overly-heavy air freshener was used to cover up the bad smell.  This was probably one of my worst experiences at a hotel and I had to stayed there because the room was not refundable, not to mentioned it wasn’t safe with exposed wires.', '-very near to ben thanh market/malaysian street-bilik yg complete dgn water heater/mini refrigerator/hair dryer-mereka sediakan servis iron...sehelai 10000vnd-hotel ni ke dalam sikit...simpang berhadapan dgn bloom hotel atau belah blakang bali boutique hotel...so selesa xbising...', 'Smell something like shit..don’t know where the smell coming from...overalll hotel all good..near the Malaysian street and Ben thanMarket..halal food..staff really helpful..can speak english..but tell me late to check out  early because before I check in..I tell them want to check out late around 4 to 5 pm and I will pay extra charge..and they say ok..when the day I check out.they ask me to check out early...so for me make sure tell me before the day I want to check out...overalll all good...', 'Moc Huong Hotel is located in an alleyway so you will need to be vigilant when trying to find the hotel for the first time. I booked the superior room with no window. The bed, towels and linen provided were clean. The bedroom itself was quite modern. However the bathroom is another story. It was very old and had traces of ants. For the first time I felt uncomfortable and had to wear thongs while showering. If they upgrade their bathrooms it would actually be quite a good hotel. The hotel is currently under renovations, mainly evident in the lobby area. Staff was very friendly.', 'I was very excited to stay in M&H after seeing positive reviews. When i arrived the staff were very kind and accommodating. The room that ww stayed in looked exactly like the one in the photo gallery. AC was also cold, my concern since i went during a hot summer time. Blankets and towels were clean. Most importantly, when my friend misplaced his passport and thought it was lost, the hotel staff volunteered to assist. Language barrier was a factor that helped along the way in finding the passport. Luckily my friend found his passport and we cant thank the hotel enough for their assistance. Good value for money, good location. Much recommended! 👍🏼', 'In the centre of town with a basic need, room same as photo provide, no window,  drainage pipe inside the room for upper floor without acoustic wall to block the noise. Mini bar with leftover food from previous hotel guest, less power point supply.BTW, overall still acceptable if you need the hotel at town central.', 'The hotel is nice and smell pleasantly. It’s just that you need to walk through the alley since this hotel is located behind the ben thanh night market. But don’t worry since there are police/army which is safe. If you travel by yourself, please search for “IDRIS HALAL FOOD” instead of searching  the hotel’s name through google maps/waze. Once you were there. Try to talk with one of the staff in the tour agency office. They will guide you. Overall I happy with my stay', 'I love this hotel. Eventhough it looks like a cheap hotel (cheap and affordable indeed)..but I really satisfied staying at this hotel. Near by the Ben Thanh Market..and quite place..eventhough it is situated at the small road but you will feel very safe...trust me...', 'Stayed there on december. It was a great hotel as the facilities are all perfect. maybe the room a bit small but it is what you pay.  Attraction are within walking distance. The worker there are helpful even theres a language barrier. They even explain by drawing me a map just to show the direction from hotel to attraction place. definitely will stay here again.', "very good rate for a budget traveler, room is small but adequate, in small alley and conveniently walking distance to ben thanh market, pham ngu lao backpacker nightlife area. hard to find, make sure you write down the address and phone number for direction if you don't speak vietnamese.", 'i chose this hotel due to its value for money and ideal location, very close to shopping areas and bars. the hotel was not what i actually expected, although the location of this hotel was a bit hard to find, i find the place very well maintained like it was just recently renovated. it has a great lobby area. the room is very clean and spacy. even though my room has no windows, i had a balcony, which made me very happy.\rthe bathroom is okay as well. and ventilation was fine, very very cool. i would like return here again. \r\rstaffs were fine, not very accomodating though, must be shy in speaking english.. but i find them okay.', 'Good location but too bad vehicles cant go in to the hotel. Need to walk till the main road with luggage. Overall the hotel is good.', "We take suite room for 3 person, its quite big enough for 3 person. The location is near to everywhere, very convenient.The room doesn't really look like in the picture, the toilet in the room doesn't show in the picture ( i guess because the design of the toilet and the room are slightly different,  but the toilet were clean, its just doesn't match with the room design, it might because they renovated all the room except for toilet)Staff were friendly, they lend us umbrella when its rain, share some information with us about the famous place to go in HCM. Overall is good for vacation, value for money we spent for 3 nights.", "Consider good location where all the food stall and convenience store just a few step from the hotel. The picture slightly different from the actual but still acceptable, all the staffs quite helpful, and the hotel not facing the main road, so will not so noisy and can have a perfect sleep at night.  The bed and pillow superb comfortable and personally felt that it better than some 5stars hotel. The hotel main door will close at 12midnight, but there have staff sleep over there (on duty), so that's no any problem if you late back to hotel.", 'The hotel is located inside an alley but worry not, there is a security post in front of the alley with CCTV. You have to request for room cleaning. Didn’t see the bell boy around. We have to carry our own luggages during Check in and Check out.']

hotel name: Khách sạn The Junction Hai Bà Trưng (The Junction Hotel Hai Ba Trung)
address: 220N phố Hai Bà Trưng, quận 1, Quận 1, Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam
reviews: ['Tôi về khách sạn lúc 22h không thấy nhân viên lễ tân đâu cả. Gọi thêm 2 số di động không liên lạc được. Cửa khách sạn có mật khẩu mà không ai cung cấp cho tôi nên phải đứng đợi gần 30 phút ở ngoài. May mắn có một người khách mở cửa từ bên trong giúp. Ngoài ra khách sạn không có người giữ xe rất nguy hiểm.', 'vị trí địa lý, giá cả và phòng ốc đều okie', 'Thiết kế lạ', 'Phòng ốc khá mới và sạch sẽ, giống như trên ảnh, ở trung tâm thành phố nên thuận tiện di chuyển tới nhiều địa điểm. Giá cả hợp lý. Lần tới quay lại SG sẽ tiếp tục book phòng ở đây', 'Not an ideal place if you like to rest and sleep. Hotel is surrounded by neighbors with birds. They are extremely loud in the morning. Internet connection is incredibly slow. There is no elevator and hotel staff wont carry your luggage upstairs. Be mindful of that. Mattress is not comfortable.The only good thing is the room is quite spacious. Would not come back here', "Everything here is good except for the location. It's in the alley & not in the center of the city/tourist area but still with in the area.", '- The ceiling light was not working - Bed lights are too big and no covers so very annoying if using it.- The shower is leaking and I was not able to control water direction.Good thing is that in the morning can hear birds chirping', 'The hotel is perfect for a solo traveler. Everything was good except the fact that there were so Many spider webs, like you can find them in every single corner. I really like the layout of the room. The bathroom has that enough space you need. They have kettle and hairdryer which is quite convenient. They also have bathrobe which I dont usually expect from a 1star hotel. The experience was definitely more of a 2-3 star one. I had bread  and omelete for bfast. The omelete was a bit too oily for me. The sausage and bread were ok. The lady even gave me some pineapple to try since it was my first trip to HCM and she tild me that the pineapple tastes different there. Very friendly.', 'Clean room, friendly staffs, but the price of the drink and snack available in the room are quite bitter compared to other hotels that i went before. But overall it is value for money', 'The hotel is located in a small alley but easy to find. The room is spacious and very clean. Highly recommend', 'Located in small alley near the city center. The hotel is clean, quiet and the staff is so friendly', 'So convenient, lovely decor and very welcoming staff... our home base to explore Ho Chi Minh!', 'Good:- spacious room, comfortable bed and pillow- bathroom dry-wet separation, well functioned flush, hot water shower easy to adjust accordingly- amenities provided (face towel, bath towels, bathrobes, shampoo and shower gel) (bottled water, minibar in room!) - near to Cho Tan Dinh (Tan Dinh market) - near to pink church (Tan Dinh church)- only 15mins from TSN airport (non-peak)- less touristy than Ben Thanh area- good pricing- friendly reception staff, simple English is okto take note: - need take bus/grab (average d20.000-d40.000) (depending on peak hours) to Ben thanh area - located in an alley, sighting of cockroaches and rats (but seen it elsewhere in saigon also, it’s not that uncommon) - bring/buy your own toothbrush & toothpaste Overall, had an enjoyable stay and trip at hcmc with Junction Hotel. Strategically plan the day, go out during non-peak and come back during non-peak, avoid traffic frustration and save traveling costs too. Surely Recommended!', "I've seen this situation a lot recently in D-1 areas of HCMC near my office. This explains why I change hotels often. :) A small, modern, 5 floor walk-up, guesthouse-style hotel (8-10 rooms).  The layout and furniture modern, but the upkeep already failing. Over 3 days I stayed in 2 different rooms. In each room the 'new' bedside light fixtures were literally falling off the wall.  Immediately I get the sense management doesn't care  how the property is maintained. Too bad. This place has promise", 'ổn áp ạ', 'Nice place to stay, modern design. Lots of restaurant and shopping nearby. Will definitely come back again.', 'Only good feelings about this placeLaundry 5kg - 50.000 👍', "Nice little room with a modern design to it. Very clean and well-maintained. The bathrooms were the nicest hotel bathrooms I've used in vn so far!", 'We only stayed for one night and the room is nicely designed, clean and spacious. However, our sleep was interrupted due to the constant call of rooster in the early  morning.', 'The hotel is nice and the room is fine - quite modern. There is an honesty bar on the top floor which is a nice touch. My only fault with the room is that the windows offer minimal soundproofing. the neighbourhood cockerel woke me up both mornings and people talking outside could clearly be heard,My main problem with the hotel is the location. We wanted to try somewhere different having always stayed in district 1 Pham Ngu Lao area before. There were a couple of nice restaurants nearby for dinner and munch but not much else. We found that we needed to take taxis everywhere. The area around the hotel is completely shut down around 10.30pm. There were people sleeping in doorways nearby and we felt a little uncomfortable when walking back to the hotel. I would suggest always taking a taxi to the gate at night if possible. Whilst the hotel is nice enough we will not stay there or in this area again.']

address: 11 Đường Cửu Long, Phường 2, Quận Tân Bình, Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam, 700000
reviews: ['HOTEL GIÁ ĐƯỢC, ĐỒ ĂN SÁNG NGON', 'Có hầm để xe ô tô, mình check-in nhanh, phòng đúng tiêu chuẩn 3 sao, thiết bị vệ sinh cao cấp, đầy đủ dụng cụ cần thiết. Có nước miễn phí, tủ lạnh, máy sấy tóc etc...Vị trí gần sân bay rất thuận tiện (cách 3 phút)', 'Mình đã thuê 2 phòng ở đây do chuyến bay đêm nên muốn tìm chỗ gần sân bay để nghỉ ngơi.Vị trí khách sạn rất gần sân bay nên khi đón taxi ra khách sạn thì cô lái taxi có vẻ không vui.Phòng nhỏ và khá sạch.Nhân viên thì nhiệt tình và vui vẻ.Bữa ăn sáng thì hơi ít món, nhưng đối với khách sạn 3 sao thì khá ổn rồi.Nói chung là mình rất hài lòng với khách sạn và sẽ quay lại nếu có dịp.', 'Vị trí gần sân bay, nhân viên thân thiện, ăn sáng ok', 'Vì vị trí ngay sát bên sân bay nên mình thường chọn khách sạn để lưu trú  khi muốn  nghỉ chân  trước những chuyến bay sớm . Nhìn chung khách sạn rât sạch sẽ , tiền nghi đầy đủ . Nhân viên nhiệt tình . Hơp giá tiền mình sẽ nghỉ lại trong nhung lần tới .', 'Tất cả mọi thứ đều tuyệt vời', 'Phòng không hút thuốc nhưng vẫn rất nhiều mùi thuốc và có thể nghe tiếng ồn ở phòng kế bên', 'Ăn sáng rất ngon', 'Mọi thứ đều rất tuyệt vời. Phòng sạch sẽ, nhân viên thân thiện, ăn sáng ngon, ngoại trừ việc hầm chỉ để được 1 ô tô. Chắc chắn sẽ quay lại.', 'Sach se, thuan tien', 'mình chỉ ở 1 đêm để sáng sớm đi sân bay nên chỉ thấy dc khách sạn sạch, phòng ko rộng, quan trọng là yên tĩnh gần sân bay', 'Khách sạn sạch sẽ, gọn gàng, trang bị đầy đủ. Nhân viên lịch sự. Đáp ứng được yêu cầu nghỉ ngơi của khách.', 'Perfect !', 'ks phục vụ tốt.', 'Nhân viên nhiệt tình chu đáo. Nhà hàng nấu ăn ngon, cần đa dạng thêm các món mới thì sẽ tuyệt vời hơn nữa.', 'Khách sạn sạch sẽ, mọi thứ có vẻ mới. Không gian khách sạn nhỏ nhưng rất gần sân bay (hơn 1km). Bữa sáng ko có j đặc biệt, ít lựa chọn, phòng ăn cũng nhỏ. Phòng 102 mình ở ko có cửa sổ. Phòng có 2 quạt thông gió nhưng nếu ko mở cửa ra vào thì ko ăn thua. Vòi sen trong phòng tắm bị rò nước. Nhân viên lễ tân ko niềm nở lắm.', 'Khách sạn phòng tương đối nhỏ nhưng khá sạch sẽ. Chúng tôi cảm thấy hài lòng nhưng giá phòng quá đắt so với dịch vụ và tiện nghi khách sạn', 'Tôi sẽ giới thiệu cho bạn bè khách sạn này', 'Vị trí gần sân bay nên rất thuận tiện trong việc di chuyển', 'Nhân viên Lễ Tân nhiệt tình vui vẻ, thân thiện, phòng sạch, hy vọng khách sạn giữ sẽ mãi như vậy']

hotel name: Khách sạn Lotus Boutique (LOTUS BOUTIQUE HOTEL)
address: 55/29-31-33 Le Thi Hong Gam, Dist 01, Quận 1, Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam, 028
reviews: ['Mình rất không hài lòng nhân viên tại cửa ra vào của khách sạn. Khi mình đi grab lại và bước vào khách sạn, tại các khách sạn hay resort khác mình đã từng đi thì nhân viên đều mở cửa cho khách vào. Nhưng ngày đầu tiên mình đến nhân viên khi thấy mình thì quay sang nơi khác giả vờ như không thấy sự xuất hiện của mình. Đến khi có khách nước ngoài vào thì nhân viên lại tận tình mở cửa. Tình trạng này kéo dài đến khi mình ra về vẫn bị đối xử như vậy. Đề nghị khách sạn huấn luyện lại nhân viên không nên phân biệt đối xử như vậy giữa người việt và người nước ngoài', 'Gần khu trung tâm, nhân viên nhiệt tình, thân thiện, đồ ăn ngon, phòng sạch sẽ, tiện nghi nhưng rất nhỏ, không phù với gia đình có trẻ con', 'Phòng bé. Nên có bar trên sân thượng', 'Khách sạn sạch sẽ. phục vụ nhiệt tình. vị trí thuận lợi', 'Khách sạn có vị trí thuận tiện, nhân viên nhiệt tình đáng yêu ở mọi bộ phạn. Lần sau sẽ quay lại.', 'Nhân viên thân thiện, phòng sạch sẽ nhưng nhỏ', 'Mình đến sớm nhưng bạn lễ tân giúp mình nhận phòng sớm, phòng tuy hơi nhỏ (nếu là có trẻ em ngủ kèm) nhưng thoáng do có cửa sổ, nhà tắm hiện đại, thích nhất bồn cầu có hệ thống rửa tự động. Ăn sáng ngon miệng. Hi vọng ks giữ đc dv tốt bền vững..', 'Lần đầu tiên ở khách sạn mà hồ bơi tính phí riêng, ko được miễn phí như các khách sạn khác.', 'vị trí ok, phòng hơi nhỏ nhưng đầy đủ tiện nghi , nhân viên lễ tân xử lý vấn đề của khách chưa hiệu quả, chậm.', 'Hồ bơi hơi bé. còn lại mọi thứ đều ok.Agoda không xuất hóa đơn cho KS này nên khó thanh toán khi đi công tác', 'The staff is amazingly nice, the rooms are very clean with really good amenities.  Small hotel , decent breakfast with small cute little pool on roof with nice view. I would ask for window maybe but not that big of a deal', 'Rooms small but adequate area is fine and breakfast selection good and pool on rooftop small but fine and staff friendly with small bars and wine within metres from front door', "Awesome location, $5 min walk from Ben than, short Grab rides out. Rooms are as described, it is clean with good AC. Pool is not swimmable, but good for a dip.A nice surprise was the breakfast. Coffee is not watered down, iced to make ca phe sua da. There's an egg station, where you can order your eggs any way you like, + omlette option, and they make pho/ bun bo hue depending on the day!The entire staff is awesome. Dexter at the front, the front desk ladies, and the cook who makes your omelettes/pho.Overall? Awesome staff and overall great experience for a couple that came in to town for the first time.", "Looks like a new small petite boutique 3 star hotel, very clean, white/cozy with modern facilities & great location - away from filthy & noisy area yet closed to all the landmarks. I didn't get the chance to use the rooftop pool coz busy looking for another hotel for my 2nd night as hotel is fully booked so can't extend.\r\rAs for lightless small window, please note that it has no indication on any hotel agents  website except direct hotel's website which says window with internal view (mine literally a few inches to another bedroom and I didnt see this till way after) which I wish hotel agents are not discreet about such thing & indicate this. I hate dark room or windowless which I can't really draw curtain out here because of another room facing and Saigon is full of windowless rooms throughout.", 'The breakfast was very bad . The bacon is poorly cooked and I would recommend to not eat it . The pillows were horrible . I had a sore neck for the rest of my trip . The staff were great and the roof top pool is nice .', 'We upgraded the room to include an extra bed for 3rd adult. Felt the bed was unstable and not safe to sleep on, we called for Housekeeping to check and ensure bed was set up securely.  Housekeeping came and left. We called front desk, only to have her insist “all extra beds are like that, cannot be like normal beds”. We went to front desk to explain the situation and asked for someone to come and see the bed so they can understand. Front desk insisted the same, told the manager to repeat the same to us “all extra bed are like that”, refused to allow the bellboy who offered to help to come up.Since hotel staff didn’t want to check, we lifted the bed and found a wheel had fallen off... couldn’t fit it back. The helpful bellboy, Dexter John, was sent up to help us fix it back. The poor service from the front desk made the otherwise good experience distasteful. Clean and seemingly new rooms and amenities, tasty and good variety breakfast, toddler friendly rooftop pool.', 'I stayed here for two nights during my training in HCMc. And it was a fantastic experience. You can find many good local restaurant and cafe nearby after a long working day. The room is comfort and clean. And the hotel is only a few walks from Ben Thanh market, Takashimaya shopping center and other main attractions. I will definitely come back here agai.', 'This was a couples holiday so therefore I judge things slightly differently from my solo trips. This is a very nice hotel for a couple to stay in. The room we had did not have a window but it is nice and quiet and perfect for a deep sleep. The pool and the gym are quite basic but they make use of their limited space so they are not bad at all, just nothing special. The gym is a small room on the bottom floor which has a limited set up. The pool on the roof is super small but actually very nice. The only problem we had is that during the day it was literally full, which is not ideal but empty in evening times. Staff are very lovely and helpful and it is in a nice central area. We actually wanted to extend our stay, which means we liked it, but it was full so we went to another hotel after it. We would stay again.', 'Some sounds are easily heard from corridor or neighbors. But no noise from streets outside which is good.', 'While Checking In i Reached at 9.30am instead of 12am check in time - they insisted I pay extra money for early check in - even tough they had rooms readyWORST case at 1am while sleeping - I got up to worst nightmares - 6- 7 BED BUGS CRAWLING ALL OVER THE BED - ONLY CHANGED THE ROOM.No Hot Water for Shower not even medium hot water to de-stress after workEven after point out at reception no proper action or communication they paid for my fare to airport - which I categorically told I do not need them to pay No proper responsiveness - also inside small lane to getting taxis a bit difficult or need to wait']

address: 52-54 Đường Thủ Khoa Huân , Phường Bến Thành, Quận 1, Thành Phố Hồ Chí Minh, Quận 1, Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam, 70000
reviews: ['Khách sạn thuận tiện đi lại, nhân viên nhiệt tình', 'tôi rât thích', 'Tôi đã ở khách sạn A&Em ở nhiều chi nhánh khác nhau và đã là member VIP của A&Em nhưng khi book phòng trên Agoda, tôi đến khách sạn lúc 11:50 thì nhân viên vẫn phải bắt tôi ngồi ở sảnh đợi thêm 10phut thì mới đưa key lên phòng. Quá tệ và rất thất vọng. Sẽ không bao giờ quay lại A&Em Signature!', 'Ưu điểm là gần trung tâm nhưng phòng không sạch cho lắm', 'Gan trung tam, gia tot', 'tôi có 5 người mà đc sắp 2 phòng family , rất rộng , thoải mái & dịch vụ rất tốt', 'Nhân viên thân thiện, đồ ăn sáng ngon, khách sạn sạch sẽ, hồ bơi hơi nhỏ.', 'Mình đặt 3 đêm phòng 2 giường qua agoda, đến lễ tân nhận phòng, mình đồng ý thêm 5$/1 đêm (3đêm) để đổi phòng giường đôi, nhưng phòng vẫn không có cửa sổ.  Khách sạn bí, phòng không cửa sổ, phòng thiếu ánh sáng, ko xứng đáng với giá tiền. Nhân viên ko thân thiện. Vệ sinh phòng bẩn. Đêm đầu tiên mình ở, sáng ra dọn phòng, thay khăn nhưng không thay ga giường, (và ga giường trước khi vợ chồng mình đến cũng không được thay vì trên ga giường đã có vết bẩn). phòng tắm ướt át, bẩn thỉu, nền nhà tắm có những vết đất cát đã bị khô, tạo thành những mảng bẩn to, do không đánh rửa nền nhà tắm.  Đêm thứ 2 dậy, vợ chồng mình ra ngoài đến gần 1h chiều về, phòng vẫn chưa dọn, chăn ga gối lộn xộn, mọi thứ đều y nguyên như trước khi mình ra khỏi phòng. Chỉ bằng này lí do đủ khiến mình  không bao giờ quay lại khách sạn này nữa!', 'Nhân viên lễ tân mải làm việc riêng mà bắt khách chờ lâu cũng ko biết nói xin lỗi.Bellman ko giúp khách mang hàn lý lên phòng cũng ko có ai hướng dẫn các tiện ích trong phòng và khách sạn', 'ks thuan lợi cho việc đi lại', 'Phòng đẹp và rộng ,rất thích hồ bơi và bar rooftop.Trà chiều ok cần thêm nhiều món.', 'Nhan Viên nhiet tinh, de thuong, Phòng hoi mui kho chiu, Bon tam massage tot, an sang khong nhieu mon va 2 ngay ma mon giong nhau cam giac nhu an lai do nguoi, tra chieu ca Fe tot.', 'Ngay chợ bến thành ,có hồ bơi và khu vực rooftop thư giãn buổi tối rất tốt', 'Nhân viên thân thiện', 'Sang trong, thiet ke dep', 'Tiện đi lại,phòng sạch sẽ ,ăn sáng được ,nhân viên hoà nhã .', 'Check in hơi lâu ,nhưng nhân viên nhiệt tinh ,ăn sáng phong phú .', 'Phòng không có cửa sổ  nên thoáng mát', 'Khách sạn ngay chợ bến thành và có hồ bơi ,rất thuận tiện bạn bè đưa đón, có trà chiều và bánh ngọt miễn phí .', 'không ấn tượng']

hotel name: Khách sạn The Junction Hai Bà Trưng (The Junction Hotel Hai Ba Trung)
address: 220N phố Hai Bà Trưng, quận 1, Quận 1, Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam
reviews: ['Tôi về khách sạn lúc 22h không thấy nhân viên lễ tân đâu cả. Gọi thêm 2 số di động không liên lạc được. Cửa khách sạn có mật khẩu mà không ai cung cấp cho tôi nên phải đứng đợi gần 30 phút ở ngoài. May mắn có một người khách mở cửa từ bên trong giúp. Ngoài ra khách sạn không có người giữ xe rất nguy hiểm.', 'vị trí địa lý, giá cả và phòng ốc đều okie', 'Thiết kế lạ', 'Phòng ốc khá mới và sạch sẽ, giống như trên ảnh, ở trung tâm thành phố nên thuận tiện di chuyển tới nhiều địa điểm. Giá cả hợp lý. Lần tới quay lại SG sẽ tiếp tục book phòng ở đây', 'Not an ideal place if you like to rest and sleep. Hotel is surrounded by neighbors with birds. They are extremely loud in the morning. Internet connection is incredibly slow. There is no elevator and hotel staff wont carry your luggage upstairs. Be mindful of that. Mattress is not comfortable.The only good thing is the room is quite spacious. Would not come back here', "Everything here is good except for the location. It's in the alley & not in the center of the city/tourist area but still with in the area.", '- The ceiling light was not working - Bed lights are too big and no covers so very annoying if using it.- The shower is leaking and I was not able to control water direction.Good thing is that in the morning can hear birds chirping', 'The hotel is perfect for a solo traveler. Everything was good except the fact that there were so Many spider webs, like you can find them in every single corner. I really like the layout of the room. The bathroom has that enough space you need. They have kettle and hairdryer which is quite convenient. They also have bathrobe which I dont usually expect from a 1star hotel. The experience was definitely more of a 2-3 star one. I had bread  and omelete for bfast. The omelete was a bit too oily for me. The sausage and bread were ok. The lady even gave me some pineapple to try since it was my first trip to HCM and she tild me that the pineapple tastes different there. Very friendly.', 'Clean room, friendly staffs, but the price of the drink and snack available in the room are quite bitter compared to other hotels that i went before. But overall it is value for money', 'The hotel is located in a small alley but easy to find. The room is spacious and very clean. Highly recommend', 'Located in small alley near the city center. The hotel is clean, quiet and the staff is so friendly', 'So convenient, lovely decor and very welcoming staff... our home base to explore Ho Chi Minh!', 'Good:- spacious room, comfortable bed and pillow- bathroom dry-wet separation, well functioned flush, hot water shower easy to adjust accordingly- amenities provided (face towel, bath towels, bathrobes, shampoo and shower gel) (bottled water, minibar in room!) - near to Cho Tan Dinh (Tan Dinh market) - near to pink church (Tan Dinh church)- only 15mins from TSN airport (non-peak)- less touristy than Ben Thanh area- good pricing- friendly reception staff, simple English is okto take note: - need take bus/grab (average d20.000-d40.000) (depending on peak hours) to Ben thanh area - located in an alley, sighting of cockroaches and rats (but seen it elsewhere in saigon also, it’s not that uncommon) - bring/buy your own toothbrush & toothpaste Overall, had an enjoyable stay and trip at hcmc with Junction Hotel. Strategically plan the day, go out during non-peak and come back during non-peak, avoid traffic frustration and save traveling costs too. Surely Recommended!', "I've seen this situation a lot recently in D-1 areas of HCMC near my office. This explains why I change hotels often. :) A small, modern, 5 floor walk-up, guesthouse-style hotel (8-10 rooms).  The layout and furniture modern, but the upkeep already failing. Over 3 days I stayed in 2 different rooms. In each room the 'new' bedside light fixtures were literally falling off the wall.  Immediately I get the sense management doesn't care  how the property is maintained. Too bad. This place has promise", 'ổn áp ạ', 'Nice place to stay, modern design. Lots of restaurant and shopping nearby. Will definitely come back again.', 'Only good feelings about this placeLaundry 5kg - 50.000 👍', "Nice little room with a modern design to it. Very clean and well-maintained. The bathrooms were the nicest hotel bathrooms I've used in vn so far!", 'We only stayed for one night and the room is nicely designed, clean and spacious. However, our sleep was interrupted due to the constant call of rooster in the early  morning.', 'The hotel is nice and the room is fine - quite modern. There is an honesty bar on the top floor which is a nice touch. My only fault with the room is that the windows offer minimal soundproofing. the neighbourhood cockerel woke me up both mornings and people talking outside could clearly be heard,My main problem with the hotel is the location. We wanted to try somewhere different having always stayed in district 1 Pham Ngu Lao area before. There were a couple of nice restaurants nearby for dinner and munch but not much else. We found that we needed to take taxis everywhere. The area around the hotel is completely shut down around 10.30pm. There were people sleeping in doorways nearby and we felt a little uncomfortable when walking back to the hotel. I would suggest always taking a taxi to the gate at night if possible. Whilst the hotel is nice enough we will not stay there or in this area again.']

address: 11 Đường Cửu Long, Phường 2, Quận Tân Bình, Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam, 700000
reviews: ['HOTEL GIÁ ĐƯỢC, ĐỒ ĂN SÁNG NGON', 'Có hầm để xe ô tô, mình check-in nhanh, phòng đúng tiêu chuẩn 3 sao, thiết bị vệ sinh cao cấp, đầy đủ dụng cụ cần thiết. Có nước miễn phí, tủ lạnh, máy sấy tóc etc...Vị trí gần sân bay rất thuận tiện (cách 3 phút)', 'Mình đã thuê 2 phòng ở đây do chuyến bay đêm nên muốn tìm chỗ gần sân bay để nghỉ ngơi.Vị trí khách sạn rất gần sân bay nên khi đón taxi ra khách sạn thì cô lái taxi có vẻ không vui.Phòng nhỏ và khá sạch.Nhân viên thì nhiệt tình và vui vẻ.Bữa ăn sáng thì hơi ít món, nhưng đối với khách sạn 3 sao thì khá ổn rồi.Nói chung là mình rất hài lòng với khách sạn và sẽ quay lại nếu có dịp.', 'Vị trí gần sân bay, nhân viên thân thiện, ăn sáng ok', 'Vì vị trí ngay sát bên sân bay nên mình thường chọn khách sạn để lưu trú  khi muốn  nghỉ chân  trước những chuyến bay sớm . Nhìn chung khách sạn rât sạch sẽ , tiền nghi đầy đủ . Nhân viên nhiệt tình . Hơp giá tiền mình sẽ nghỉ lại trong nhung lần tới .', 'Tất cả mọi thứ đều tuyệt vời', 'Phòng không hút thuốc nhưng vẫn rất nhiều mùi thuốc và có thể nghe tiếng ồn ở phòng kế bên', 'Ăn sáng rất ngon', 'Mọi thứ đều rất tuyệt vời. Phòng sạch sẽ, nhân viên thân thiện, ăn sáng ngon, ngoại trừ việc hầm chỉ để được 1 ô tô. Chắc chắn sẽ quay lại.', 'Sach se, thuan tien', 'mình chỉ ở 1 đêm để sáng sớm đi sân bay nên chỉ thấy dc khách sạn sạch, phòng ko rộng, quan trọng là yên tĩnh gần sân bay', 'Khách sạn sạch sẽ, gọn gàng, trang bị đầy đủ. Nhân viên lịch sự. Đáp ứng được yêu cầu nghỉ ngơi của khách.', 'Perfect !', 'ks phục vụ tốt.', 'Nhân viên nhiệt tình chu đáo. Nhà hàng nấu ăn ngon, cần đa dạng thêm các món mới thì sẽ tuyệt vời hơn nữa.', 'Khách sạn sạch sẽ, mọi thứ có vẻ mới. Không gian khách sạn nhỏ nhưng rất gần sân bay (hơn 1km). Bữa sáng ko có j đặc biệt, ít lựa chọn, phòng ăn cũng nhỏ. Phòng 102 mình ở ko có cửa sổ. Phòng có 2 quạt thông gió nhưng nếu ko mở cửa ra vào thì ko ăn thua. Vòi sen trong phòng tắm bị rò nước. Nhân viên lễ tân ko niềm nở lắm.', 'Khách sạn phòng tương đối nhỏ nhưng khá sạch sẽ. Chúng tôi cảm thấy hài lòng nhưng giá phòng quá đắt so với dịch vụ và tiện nghi khách sạn', 'Tôi sẽ giới thiệu cho bạn bè khách sạn này', 'Vị trí gần sân bay nên rất thuận tiện trong việc di chuyển', 'Nhân viên Lễ Tân nhiệt tình vui vẻ, thân thiện, phòng sạch, hy vọng khách sạn giữ sẽ mãi như vậy']

hotel name: Khách sạn Lotus Boutique (LOTUS BOUTIQUE HOTEL)
address: 55/29-31-33 Le Thi Hong Gam, Dist 01, Quận 1, Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam, 028
reviews: ['Mình rất không hài lòng nhân viên tại cửa ra vào của khách sạn. Khi mình đi grab lại và bước vào khách sạn, tại các khách sạn hay resort khác mình đã từng đi thì nhân viên đều mở cửa cho khách vào. Nhưng ngày đầu tiên mình đến nhân viên khi thấy mình thì quay sang nơi khác giả vờ như không thấy sự xuất hiện của mình. Đến khi có khách nước ngoài vào thì nhân viên lại tận tình mở cửa. Tình trạng này kéo dài đến khi mình ra về vẫn bị đối xử như vậy. Đề nghị khách sạn huấn luyện lại nhân viên không nên phân biệt đối xử như vậy giữa người việt và người nước ngoài', 'Gần khu trung tâm, nhân viên nhiệt tình, thân thiện, đồ ăn ngon, phòng sạch sẽ, tiện nghi nhưng rất nhỏ, không phù với gia đình có trẻ con', 'Phòng bé. Nên có bar trên sân thượng', 'Khách sạn sạch sẽ. phục vụ nhiệt tình. vị trí thuận lợi', 'Khách sạn có vị trí thuận tiện, nhân viên nhiệt tình đáng yêu ở mọi bộ phạn. Lần sau sẽ quay lại.', 'Nhân viên thân thiện, phòng sạch sẽ nhưng nhỏ', 'Mình đến sớm nhưng bạn lễ tân giúp mình nhận phòng sớm, phòng tuy hơi nhỏ (nếu là có trẻ em ngủ kèm) nhưng thoáng do có cửa sổ, nhà tắm hiện đại, thích nhất bồn cầu có hệ thống rửa tự động. Ăn sáng ngon miệng. Hi vọng ks giữ đc dv tốt bền vững..', 'Lần đầu tiên ở khách sạn mà hồ bơi tính phí riêng, ko được miễn phí như các khách sạn khác.', 'vị trí ok, phòng hơi nhỏ nhưng đầy đủ tiện nghi , nhân viên lễ tân xử lý vấn đề của khách chưa hiệu quả, chậm.', 'Hồ bơi hơi bé. còn lại mọi thứ đều ok.Agoda không xuất hóa đơn cho KS này nên khó thanh toán khi đi công tác', 'The staff is amazingly nice, the rooms are very clean with really good amenities.  Small hotel , decent breakfast with small cute little pool on roof with nice view. I would ask for window maybe but not that big of a deal', 'Rooms small but adequate area is fine and breakfast selection good and pool on rooftop small but fine and staff friendly with small bars and wine within metres from front door', "Awesome location, $5 min walk from Ben than, short Grab rides out. Rooms are as described, it is clean with good AC. Pool is not swimmable, but good for a dip.A nice surprise was the breakfast. Coffee is not watered down, iced to make ca phe sua da. There's an egg station, where you can order your eggs any way you like, + omlette option, and they make pho/ bun bo hue depending on the day!The entire staff is awesome. Dexter at the front, the front desk ladies, and the cook who makes your omelettes/pho.Overall? Awesome staff and overall great experience for a couple that came in to town for the first time.", "Looks like a new small petite boutique 3 star hotel, very clean, white/cozy with modern facilities & great location - away from filthy & noisy area yet closed to all the landmarks. I didn't get the chance to use the rooftop pool coz busy looking for another hotel for my 2nd night as hotel is fully booked so can't extend.\r\rAs for lightless small window, please note that it has no indication on any hotel agents  website except direct hotel's website which says window with internal view (mine literally a few inches to another bedroom and I didnt see this till way after) which I wish hotel agents are not discreet about such thing & indicate this. I hate dark room or windowless which I can't really draw curtain out here because of another room facing and Saigon is full of windowless rooms throughout.", 'The breakfast was very bad . The bacon is poorly cooked and I would recommend to not eat it . The pillows were horrible . I had a sore neck for the rest of my trip . The staff were great and the roof top pool is nice .', 'We upgraded the room to include an extra bed for 3rd adult. Felt the bed was unstable and not safe to sleep on, we called for Housekeeping to check and ensure bed was set up securely.  Housekeeping came and left. We called front desk, only to have her insist “all extra beds are like that, cannot be like normal beds”. We went to front desk to explain the situation and asked for someone to come and see the bed so they can understand. Front desk insisted the same, told the manager to repeat the same to us “all extra bed are like that”, refused to allow the bellboy who offered to help to come up.Since hotel staff didn’t want to check, we lifted the bed and found a wheel had fallen off... couldn’t fit it back. The helpful bellboy, Dexter John, was sent up to help us fix it back. The poor service from the front desk made the otherwise good experience distasteful. Clean and seemingly new rooms and amenities, tasty and good variety breakfast, toddler friendly rooftop pool.', 'I stayed here for two nights during my training in HCMc. And it was a fantastic experience. You can find many good local restaurant and cafe nearby after a long working day. The room is comfort and clean. And the hotel is only a few walks from Ben Thanh market, Takashimaya shopping center and other main attractions. I will definitely come back here agai.', 'This was a couples holiday so therefore I judge things slightly differently from my solo trips. This is a very nice hotel for a couple to stay in. The room we had did not have a window but it is nice and quiet and perfect for a deep sleep. The pool and the gym are quite basic but they make use of their limited space so they are not bad at all, just nothing special. The gym is a small room on the bottom floor which has a limited set up. The pool on the roof is super small but actually very nice. The only problem we had is that during the day it was literally full, which is not ideal but empty in evening times. Staff are very lovely and helpful and it is in a nice central area. We actually wanted to extend our stay, which means we liked it, but it was full so we went to another hotel after it. We would stay again.', 'Some sounds are easily heard from corridor or neighbors. But no noise from streets outside which is good.', 'While Checking In i Reached at 9.30am instead of 12am check in time - they insisted I pay extra money for early check in - even tough they had rooms readyWORST case at 1am while sleeping - I got up to worst nightmares - 6- 7 BED BUGS CRAWLING ALL OVER THE BED - ONLY CHANGED THE ROOM.No Hot Water for Shower not even medium hot water to de-stress after workEven after point out at reception no proper action or communication they paid for my fare to airport - which I categorically told I do not need them to pay No proper responsiveness - also inside small lane to getting taxis a bit difficult or need to wait']

Nhược: Ăn sáng hầu như không đổi qua nhiều năm, lối vào thang máy đôi khi có mùi lạ (?). Nói chung là hài lòng nhưng có 1 điểm không thoải mái lắm là: tôi thường xuyên nghỉ tại đây khi đến TP HCM nhưng lần đầu book qua agoda, không hiểu có việc gì nhưng lần này thấy lễ tân cứ cười với nhau, hỏi tại sao thì không trả lời lý do.', 'Friendly staff', 'được', 'Vị trí đẹp và thuận tiện, rất gần chợ Bến Thành. Khách sạn hơi cũ nhưng chất lượng vệ sinh và nhân viên khá.', 'Phòng khách sạn sạch sẽ và lịch sự, vị trí gần trung tâm thuận tiện đi lại', 'Nhân viên thân thiện. Khách sạn gần trung tâm mua sắm và giải trí.', 'Khách sạn cũ. Sảnh tiếp đón có mùi tanh. Phòng có gián. Rèm cửa bị rách, tủ lạnh mini hỏng. Chăn bị ố. Thang máy nhỏ.Ở khu trung tâm thuận tiện đi lại. View phòng đẹp. Nhận phòng sớm', 'Đôi khi phòng có mùi lạ lắm', 'Ngay kế chợ Bến Thành, nhưng khách sạn cũ quá!', 'Nhược điểm phòng bẩn và nước vòi không sạch. Ưu điểm ngay trung tâm và nhân viên thân thiện. Sẽ không bao giờ quay trở lại', 'ok', 'Rat thoai mai va thuan tien. Di lai de dang, nhan vien vien nhiet tinh', 'Chung toi co ky nghi thoa mai tai khach san nay, vi tri thuan loi, nhan vien phuc vu niem no va an can, tuy nhien phong hoi nho va giuong ngu hoi hep, neu giuong ngu rong hon thi thoa mai hon nua.', 'Pro - good location, near to weekend night walk ( at Phường Phạm Ngũ Lão, Quận 1).  If you going to book day tour, there are a lot travel agencies nearby)In front have a park. Can go anywhere by taxi or grab. Convenient. Like its breakfast, got various choices for breakfast. Staffs are friendly. Allow early check in when we arrived. Tq. Con - night time might be a bit noisy as the night bar is just in front of the building. But still fine for us, holiday mood.... :)Lobby aircon is not cold enough. Room air con is take longer time to be chill.', '(From comments of the person whom I booked this hotel for)1) Cleanliness:Room cleaning carelessly: hair on bed, water and dirt in bathroom2) Food:Few choices for breakfastFruits were not fresh (longan was too old, turned yellow under the peel)Cockroach crawled on jackfruit dishes (noticed the staff and she changed immediately)3) FacilitesThe hotel was Que Huong (Hometown) hotel then sold to Liberty. All facilities are old. No separate floor for hotel restaurant.Room had bed smell partially due to closed space. But we had informed the arrival time in advance (10pm), they should open the door or turn on airconditioner in advance to clear this smell.4) Booked this hotel at VND1,500,000 and they said it was the good room of the hotel but still low quality.5) Staff attitude was good.']

address: 382/34 Nguyễn Thị Minh Khai, Phường 5, Quận 3, TP. Hồ Chí Minh, Quận 3, Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam, 700000
reviews: ['Chất lượng phù hợp với giá cả', 'Mình ở đây được 2 lần, thấy mọi thứ rất ok và hài lòng, phòng ốc nội thất rất sạch sẽ.Lần này mình ở phòng 401, có duy nhất 2 điểm trừ như sau:- Netflix trên tivi ko xem được do dây cáp kết nối bị lỗi- Ko có bình đun siêu tốc', 'Nhân viên quản lý nói chuyện và xử lý vô văn hoá, nói chuyện với khách không có căn cứ khi bắt khách đền phòng... giam giữ vali khách khi tôi làm lớn họ mới trả, tôi đòi gặp mặt quản lý ko chịu ra mặt và đòi hù doạ tôi khi tôi luôn cư xử phải trái còn ngồi tại khách sạn, chuyến đi quá têh', 'Gia đình chúng tôi đã rất thoải mái và hài lòng khi ở đây. Khách sạn sạch sẽ, nhân viên thân thiện, chu đáo. Sẽ quay lại nếu có dịp!', 'Sạch sẽ, ngay trug tâm', 'Sạch đẹp, xinh xắn. Nên có thêm staff ở lại vào buổi tối và đêm thì sẽ tốt hơn. Nhưng nói chung là worth it!', 'Nice and cozy room', 'No Bed blanket, only a thin piece of cloth', 'The staff were wonderful. Had technical difficulties with the volume on the television but not a big issue as my kids watched tv on their devices. Proximity to the park was ideal for me kids. The rooms were spacious and comfortable. Overall, I was quite happy with the value.', "We absolutely loved our stay here. When we come back to HCMC next year, we'll definitely stay here again.The price for laundry was fair and the woman was very sweet.The upper deck/ seating are was awesome.This was the only accommodation we found  that provided us with a knife, chopsticks and a cutting board. It was a nice touch. They're also eco conscious and I was pleasantly surprised.We booked the Penthouse Suite for $20. / night CAD. We never would have been able to book a penthouse suit for that price anywhere else. 5 ☆'s in my opinion.", 'Booked the pent house room and soon realized it was biggest mistake. The hotel has no elevator. The staff didn’t even offer to bring your luggage to your room. Had to drag my luggage up 5 level of stairs. Was in a rush and asked the staff to bring a package to the room. They rejected my request and said they will keep it at the lobby. On the day of check out, left the hotel for breakfast and the staff rudely reminded that check out time is 12pm. At 11:45am, knocked on my door and asked me to leave. Never ever was treated this poorly.', 'Didn’t clean my room in 2 nights! Not even replenish water. Bathroom floods on taking a shower. Room window faces a wall. No intercom. Located in the midst o nothing touristy.', "The hotel entrance is at a small alley but it's very easy to find. It looks modern and new. Downstairs is a cafe and co-working space, and staffs are really friendly and helpful. My room is huge with two queen size bed and a small kitchen with dining area. It's very clean and comfortable. They even provide a media box with Netflix access for entertainment!Please take note that there's no lift in the building and you'll have to climb stairs. So may not be convenient if you're carrying too many bags. Surrounding wise, you can find decent Vietnamese street food easily even at late night. I would definitely come to stay again next time!", 'If u have an elevator or a lift, it’s must be perfect.', 'Pros, great location not far from city center, easy check in. Accessible staff. Cons, very firm mattresses, no lift, very high prices to do a few pieces of laundry. Price of larger rooms are also s bit high compared to similar properties', 'The management team is very nice and caring for their client. I will definitively come back next time I need a good value and nice room. For work, the desk inside the room is a bit small but they have longer table in the entrance area. A plus : they serve Nespresso coffee !!', 'Ruhige Lage, alle wichtigen Sehenswürdigkeiten befinden sich in näherer Umgebung. Freundliches und zuvorkommendes Personal. Falls nach 21 Uhr Ankunft. Personal in Kenntnis setzen, sie senden dann eine Email entweder auf Agoda oder Email-Konto mit den Zugangsinfos. Ansonsten kommt man nach 21 Uhr nicht mehr hinein. Zimmer sehr sauber, alles bestens.', 'シャンプー、コンディショナー、ボディソープ、スリッパなどのアメニティがありませんでした。', '高C/P值的房間,  但設施老實講不是太新, 同巷弄中有Bar, 走路一分鐘可以到Coffee house, 走五分鐘可以到錦麗牛肉粉.員工雖然英文不流利, 但態度很積極友善', '住了两晚頂層閣樓，空間很大，早上有日光可照進來，電視還可連接手機youtube播放，不過極度不建議拿行李喼的旅客住閣樓，因為頂層閣樓在4樓，只有樓梯，要搬上搬落是有一點吃力，另一缺點是浴缸水壓非常弱，放滿水要差不多20-30分鐘，如不介意沒有電梯和浴缸水壓問題，是非常推薦！']

hotel name: Khách Sạn Sài Gòn Amigo (Sai Gon Amigo Hotel)
address: 185/24 Đường Phạm Ngũ Lão, P.Phạm Ngũ Lão, Q1, Quận 1, Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam, 0084
reviews: ['đã đặt phòng nhưng ko đc nhận phòng, phải đi thuê phòng ngoài lúc muộn', 'Tôi đã có 3 ngày đêm rất hài lòng ở tại Amigo Hotel. Vị trí của khách sạn rất thuận lợi, tôi cũng nhận được sự giúp đỡ của nhân viên để thuê được xe máy ở ngay gần khách sạn. Phòng luôn được vệ sinh sạch sẽ và ngăn nắp vào sáng ngày kế tiếp, tôi thấy rất hài lòng. Vào ngày ở cuối khi gặp nhầm lẫn với việc gia hạn thêm ngày lưu trú trên trang web agoda, tôi đã nhận được sự giúp đỡ nhiệt tình từ phía khách sạn. Nhất định sẽ quay lại nơi đây nếu lần tới tôi đến SG.', 'co cam nhan hai long va thoai mai voi su tien loi toi uu', 'Clean, comfortable, quiet, well located, well priced.  My third stay here.', 'Great location very quite at night for sleeping but in the heart of resturants and bars', "Got an upgrade for free. Just on the side of  Bui Vein street, but won't hear much noise and you'll still get quality sleep at night.", 'Hotel is OK and good location. The staffs are very kind and helpful except the water heater malfunction.', 'Very clean excellent staff.  rj', 'Rooms infested with ants and cockroaches. Dank, dark and depressing. Man on reception rude and condescending. Don’t waste your money or time here. Book elsewhere.', 'One of our group hit a few problems and the staff went out of their way to help, top work 👍', 'The staff in this hotel were extremely helpful and friendly.  They made sure that myself and my two friends were prioritized even at their own inconvenience to ensure we had a comfortable stay. Mr Tom was especially helpful to ensure I had a bucket of ice each night so that I could begin my night with a few pre drinks in my room.', 'Got put in a room with mold on the walls that smelt terribly musty. The staff were very helpful and offered us a different room. The different room also melt musty, but was fine once we aired it out. The staff were helpful and friendly, but the hotel needs a bit of work. Don’t stay here if you need a soft bed.', "reception is very kind.\rFacility is little old.\rcompare with price its ok.\rit's clean.\rjust for sleep for cheap price it's good", 'Good place and nice hotel', "I won't go there EVER again.", "Value for the little money you pay for this small hotel. So cheap! Close to Buvien St and the bus stop. I'd stay again.", 'I would use this hotel again for a short duration ,the location is good and easy to access  all attreactions.It was a good fast check in.the room I had was a standard double ,but it was so tiny .the bathroom was minute and difficult to enter and shut the door..Therte was no kettle or water or shampoo ,this is the first hotel in Vietnam that has not provided these basic facilities ,thast i have visited.However the room was clean ,but very noisy during the night ,from outside ( late night drinkers etc )', 'tricky to find, but is a hidden gem', 'All are fair and will stay again', "The Saigon Amigo Hotel is well located in the heart of Saigon. You will need to go there walking though, as the hotel is located in a middle of a narrow alley. Our check-in occurred around midnight, as our flight landed one hour earlier from Japan.The other positive points are the friendly morning staff and the amenities that included a toothbrush. The elevator is new, clean and spacious. The price is good.I have to say that the access to enter the hotel was difficult, as a bunch of motorcycles lined up just at the entrance prevented us from getting in the hotel easily.As we had a late flight, we just bought some groceries/snacks at the nearest convenient stores, just a block away. We had bought noodle cups and went back to the hotel asking the night receptionist if we could have hot water for our noodles. It seemed to bother him, as he told us to come back the next day to have hot water! We insisted and he went to the kitchen. However, 20 seconds later he came back saying no hot water! I thought it wasn't difficult to boil hot water… Of course, we could have done that at the convenient store, but I didn't see myself carrying two noodle cups while avoiding getting hit by motorcycles and potentially burning myself.Anyway, I also found the blanket very small for two people, as it didn't cover my feet unto my shins. While the toothbrushes were a nice amenity, there wasn't any shampoo though.In conclusion, we will come back as it was an overall positive experience."]
