address: 373/6 Pham Ngu Lao, Dist 1, Quận 1, Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam
reviews: ['Đóng cửa hơi sớm.', 'Tôi đã có kỳ nghỉ rất vui tại Hostel này. Hostel nằm ở trung tâm thành phố, do đó cũng tiện đi lại tới khu phồn hoa của thành phố, hơn nữa lại khá gần khu phố Tây (Bùi Viện - Quận 1), đây là trải nghiệm thú vị khi được nhìn một phần của Sài Gòn với rất nhiều người Tây ngồi vỉa hè, uống cafe.\rVấn đề tôi không hài lòng, đó là về Agoda, tôi đặt phòng cho 2 người và thanh toán bằng thẻ tín dụng, trong confirmation lại ghi chú là 3 người lớn, việc này gây phiền phức cho tôi và khách sạn khi xác nhận số lượng người chính thức. Tôi có email hỏi Agoda, nhưng tới hơn 48 tiếng, vẫn chưa nhận được phản hồi từ Agoda, trong khi theo khuyến cáo của mình, Agoda sẽ có trả lời trong 24h. Tôi nghĩ sẽ không thực hiện đặt phòng trên Agoda nữa mà sẽ liên hệ trực tiếp với các KS mà tôi thấy ok.', 'Sẽ tuyệt vời hơn nếu ks có một số vật dụng cơ bản như máy sấy, bàn là, móc treo... cho khách mượn', 'Mình thuê 1 phòng double và 1 giường trong phòng dorm. phòng dorm ở chung mà, toilet kinh khủng, bước vô là muốn ói. lần đầu tiên mình trải nghiệm ở dorm là thế nào, thôi, không dám nữa. đã vậy tiếng cái mền cứ xệch xạc, không êm ái như bình thường, ai nhúc nhích kiểu gì cũng nghe, mình ko tài nào ngủ được cả đêm luôn. phòng double thì ok.', 'Khá hài lòng về khách sạn nhưng không hài lòng lắm về bạn nhân viên lễ tân', 'toi rat hai long va vuot hon su mong doi, doi ngu nhan vien rat chuyen nghiep.', "This place quite difficult to find because it's behind a market. But everything is good.", 'Tôi hầu như đi công tác vào Sài Gòn mỗi tháng, tôi đã ở khá nhiều khách sạn tại trung tâm Q1 nhưng hầu hết những khách sạn khác tôi ở đều không ấn tượng bằng Phan Anh Backpackers Hostel. Tại đây rất phù hợp cho các cặp đôi du lịch hoặc đi công tác, thậm chí là những bạn có ý định ở dài hạn hoặc ở tháng.  Khách sạn có chỗ đậu xe trong nhà, có bếp và chén đĩa đồ dùng cho khách, trong phòng nước nóng nước lạnh đầy đủ cũng như máy sấy và bình siêu tốc. Về phần vệ sinh thì tôi rất chi là hài lòng bởi vì tôi là người khá khó tính và sạch sẽ nhưng đội ngũ nhân viên tại Phan Anh Backpacker Hostel rất chuyên nghiệp và thân thiện làm tôi cảm thấy cực kỳ thoải mái khi nghỉ tại đây.Chị chủ Khách sạn vui vẻ và nhiệt tình cực kỳ nhé, very enjoy staying at Phan Anh Backpackers Hostel.  Super-Highly Recommended!!', 'Phòng khá sạch , chủ và nhân viên thân thiện', 'Rất tuyệt', 'Phòng sạch sẽ, thân thiện, gần sát chợ...', 'jjk', 'Phòng có mùi ẩm mốc nặng,bộ giường gối mùi thuốc tẩy  hơi nhiều gây cảm giác khó ngủ,ổ khóa phòng bị hư tạo cảm giác hơi k an toàn.Tổng thể gần trung tâm.sạch sẽ.hẹ thống nước ok.nhân viên ok', 'Ko có chỗ để xe, đóng cửa sớm', 'Lần thứ 2 quay lại Phan Anh kể từ 2 năm trước. Khách sạn vẫn sạch sẽ và tiện nghi như ban đầu, tuy nhiên sở vật chất có vẻ đã xuống cấp mà chưa được sửa sang, thay mới (thang máy ko đi được, vỏ chăn cũ và bị sờn), ngoài ra thì vẫn oke lắm ạ. Mong khách sạn sửa đổi để tốt hơn', 'Gần trung tâm, ngay cạnh chợ Thái Bình, nhiều hàng ăn uống bên cạnh. Nói chung địa điểm , phòng ốc, đồ ăn sáng mình đánh giá cao.Tuy chỉ chăn mềm thì bên Phan Anh nên chú ý hơn chút, chăn ga gối đệm mình thấy ko được thơm, sạch sẽ, nhất là vỏ chăn mềm có mùi kiểu vải cũ hay loại rẻ tiền ấy, khá bám bụi.', "So we had our Indochina trip and had to book four different hotels and this is definitely my clear favorite out of all we've booked! It has....1. GREAT location - just a few meters away from the main plaza and Bu Vien walking street as well as the travel agency street (De Tham).  I think the only downside for this is that there are A LOT of big rats at night in the area but the hostel itself is clean2. Staff are SUPER NICE and ACCOMMODATING - we arrived there at around 3AM and they immediately accommodated us and were so kind in answering our questions and requests3. Thank heavens they have an ELEVATOR - we had big luggages and the elevator was a huge relief4. VALUE FOR MONEY x100 - I'm not even exaggerating hahahaha. Our room was so nice and clean plus our breakfast was delightfully good!5. It's generally clean! As mentioned, the hostel itself is clean.  The only reason I gave it a 4 is because of the rats in the surrounding areas.  More power guys!", 'We checked in about 8pm this time due to heavy traffic from Phnom Penh. Thanks to Binh(reception) allowed us to safekeep our luggage for 1night when we took a bus to Phnom Penh. Our room is quite simple with white interiors which makes you feel relaxed, a minimalist classy design.but i think the bathroom was not kept clean though 😅 Breakfast- very good👍🏻 with generous amount of serving, they provide you various types of breakfast noodles/banh mi etc and also comes with vietnam coffee (hot/cold) -Strong Wi fi connection.-if ever you want to experience night life, it’s just 5minutes away. hostel Gate curfew until 12mn but they will open the gate for you if ever you’re still out anytime.Location- Near in Market place. Difficult to find if you’re not familiar to the set-up but this is near to everything, night life, teashop, coffee shop,convenient store, noodle shop ..as in EVERYTHING..👍🏻Staffs- All of them are very accommodating specially Binh 😄 who’s really patient on answering all our queries/concerns and requests.Kudos to the Team!♥️if ever i’ll be coming back to HCM, will definitely book on this hostel again. Til next time!', 'We arrived almost 2am in this hotel and we got a hard time finding the location. good thing that we encountered an accommodating grab driver and help us find the specific hostel unit. We are so sleepy that time and we got disappointed because Binh told us they don’t have room left for us☹️informed that they are  fullybooked, but they will divert our booking in a nearby hostel within bui vien street.My rating is for Saigon hostel 2. The girl there looks like irritated whenever we’re asking her for something. She gave us a locker space without a padlock. my friend is a bit worried about her things because her bag does not have a lock. In the end, they still did not provide us a padlock. Also, we asked her simple things like if there’s a nearby mall that we could see,she said she doesn’t know anything because she’s just working there.We never got a good information from .Even reserving a ticket going to Phnom Penh,looks like we’re giving her a hard time as her face shown.She just told us that the line is busy,all tickets are fullybooked and she can’t do anything about it. That’s why we go back to Phan Anh and talked to Binh to help us buy a ticket although it’s only a midnight travel is available we really appreciate his effort on helping us.Good thing we only stayed at New Saigon Hostel for 1 night. Then upon checking out we requested Binh if we could transfer back at Phan Anh on our succeeding night.good thing they reserved a room for us this time.', 'Their team were helpful and accommodating. The hostel was very clean and neat, newly renovated and more spacious. The toilet and bathroom ...always clean and  with modern design. The manager, Ms Hang was warm and accommodating. The breakfast was healthy and delicious.  I love the fruits that i bought at the market that was just few meters away from the hostel. I love this hostel.']

address: 84A Bùi Thị Xuân, Quận 1, Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam
reviews: ['View buổi tối từ tầng 10 rất ok', '- Vị trí thuận tiện, ở trung tâm TP;\r- Nhân viên thân thiện, nhiệt tình;\r- Phòng rộng, mát, sạch vừa phải;\r- Giá hơi đắt (có lẽ vì ở trung tâm);\rRiêng có việc này, tôi không hiểu, các bạn cần lưu ý: Tôi thuê 3 đêm, sáng ngày cuối cùng tôi có báo lễ tân là sẽ ở đến 19h, 1 bạn lễ tân nói rằng ở sau 18h sẽ tính 100% giá phòng, trước 18h tính 50%. Tôi thống nhất là trả phòng trước 18h, với giá là 350k. Đến khi trả phòng thì lại là nv lễ tân khác và báo tiền phòng ở thêm là 500k. Tất nhiên tôi không đồng ý và bảo đã thống nhất với bạn kia rồi, bạn này cũng vui vẻ đồng ý? Tại sao lại có sự không thống nhất như vậy? Liệu KS có biết việc đó không?', 'Tiện đi lại và sạch sẽ', 'Tiện nghi, thoải mái', 'Nhân viên rất thân thiện, phòng cách âm kém nhưng sạch, khách sạn mới , vừa ý khi ở đây nên đã từng giới thiệu dùm bạn và có dịp sẽ quay lại', 'Rất tiện lợi đi lại và ăn uống, nhân viên nhiệt tình', 'Không sẵn sàng giúp đỡ khách khi khách gặp khó khăn', 'Tôi thích phòng ở đây', 'MÌnh đặt phòng giường double nhưng lúc mình đến nhận phòng thì nhân viên bảo phòng mình đặt đã hết mặc dù mình đã trả tiền trước, nhân viên đổ thừa do lỗi của mình đã không chọn phòng giường double, cãi một hồi thì nhân viên mới xem lại cái hóa đơn agoda trong hệ thống của họ rồi mới chịu đổi phòng cho mình.Thang máy hư.Ở mỗi chân cầu thang đều có để mấy cái dĩa thức ăn của khách, cực kỳ mất vệ sinh và nguy hiểm với người đi cầu thang.', 'Khá thất vọng khi đến khách sạn, hoàn toàn khác với hình.  Khách dạn vừa trùng tu nhưng thật ra trong phòng nhìn cũ, 1 số vật dụng cũng cũ, giá hơn 800k 1 đêm là mắc so với thực tế. Ăn sáng sơ sài. Nhà hàng ăn sâng chỉ có 1 thang máy, nhân viên đưa đồ ra vào bằng thang máy của khách, gây ồn ào và bất tiện. Điểm hài lòng duy nhất là vị trí và nhân viên lễ tân + bảo vệ thân thiện.', 'Khach Ấn và phi nhiêu nên kg đuoc sạch sẽ', 'Nhân viên lịch sự , nhưng phòng thì củ và không sạch sẽ  địa điểm thì xa chung tâm giá phòng thì đắt không phù hợp với túi tiền với địa điểm này', 'Vị trí trung tâm quận 1, thuận tiện đi lại. Nhân viên nhiệt tình, chu đáo. Phòng hơi cũ, thang máy chậm.', 'Thức ăn sáng rất sơ sài. Lúc 7h00 mà đồ ăn tưởng như hết rồi. Không có lần thứ 2', 'Khách sạn phù hợp với yêu cầu cá nhân', 'rất tốt mọi thứ. từ giá cả cho đến tiện nghi', 'Khách sạn sạch sẽ đẹp và rộng rãi tuy nhiên có 1 thang máy nên rất bất tiện. Đồ ăn sáng thường ít món', 'Vị trí nga trung tâm thanh phố, gần phố ăn uống, giải trí. Phòng khách sạn sạch, tiện nghi.', 'Mình thuê phòng trực tiếp tại ks lúc 11h khuya, nhưng ks báo ko còn phòng đôi, thế là mình lên agoda đặt và đưa mã đặt phòng cho a nv lễ tân. Sau đó mình lên phòng, được 1 lúc a lễ tân gọi đt nói mình xuống xác nhận số booking, nhưng mình ko xuống vì đã khuya mới đi chơi về mệt rồi và mình đã đọc lại mã cho anh ấy kiểm tra. 1 lúc sau vẫn gọi lên bảo cần mình xuống xác nhận vì vẫn chưa nhận được mã đặt phòng. Mình bảo nếu nãy chưa nhận được mã thì đừng cho khách nhận phòng, với lại việc mình đặt ngay lúc đó có thể chưa hiển thị bên hệ thống của ks vì agoda đã gửi mail xác nhận mình đặt phòng nên ks cần check bên agoda rồi hãy đt mình. Những điều này bên lễ tân phải nắm rõ chứ. Giờ đó đã tầm khuya đã mệt mà ks đòi mình xuống kiểm tra nữa. Nói chung ko hài lòng về 2 anh nhân viên lễ tân tối hôm đó và mình sẽ ko quay lại.', 'Nhìn ngoài hành lang không sạch sẽ']

address: 2K Ho Xuan Huong, Quan 3, Quận 3, Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam, 70000
reviews: ['Rất phù hợp', 'Sạch sẽ, nhân viên nhiệt tình, đầy đủ tiện nghi, rất tôn trọng khách hàng', 'Tốt', 'Tot', 'Tiện nghi và vị trí và vệ sinh ổn,Giường đệm và gối tệĐiều hoà tệKhoá phòng khó mở ( có thể mỗi phòng mình bị)Nhưng nói chung với giá đó mọi thứ mình nghĩ là được', 'cỡ 2 star', 'Định kỳ', '- checkin lúc 4h sáng..nên ko đc ăn sáng..ks nói ăn sáng phải dki trước...vô phòng 2 đứa nhỏ..đứa 5 tháng đứa 2 tuổi khóc cả tiếng.- ở 3 ngày mà dọn phòng lúc 8h ngày đầu tiên..mới vô 4 tiếng là dọn...còn ngày sau báo dọn ko dọn..bẩn kinh khủng...thảm cực dơ- vô thang máy thì thang máy đóng cửa..ko lên ko xuống..chồng mình dùng tay kéo cửa cho 2 đứa nhỏ ra..tụi nhỏ sợ khóc thét.- ko biết căn hộ có gì ko nhưng 2 đứa nhỏ nhà mình vào tới cửa là khóc..khóc ngặt nghẽo..đi ra là nín...con gái lớn té giường  trong khi ngủ kẹp giữa ba và mẹ...đáng sợ luôn.', 'Tốt', "at first, it looked not bad,quite clean and good. but when we lied on the bed and were covered by the blanket, It was horribly itchy. when we saw our skin, there are many mites(we guessed) bites!!! we couldn't sleep anymore and just stayed on the couch in the living room. and also we saw many mites and bugs on our baggage later. it was awful!!!", 'Good:Price and locationBad:Registration for check in, Breakfast not in time, midnight noisy.', 'I like the room! Super clean and i love the bathroom! Hahahaha But its quite far from ben thanh market, close to war museum..', 'It was the first time staying at this hotel.\rSpacious rooms never made me feel cramped.\rEverything is clean so I wasn’t reluctant to use cups and dishes.\rTelevisions and air conditioners work well, Wi-Fi also.\rTwo bed rooms have toilet and shower respectively.\rAmenity consists of shop, shampoo and bath towel which is changed with new one every day.\r\rThere is not a reception but a staff is staying near gate the whole day.\rHousekeepers work carefully.\rAlthough I arrived in the morning, they allowed me to check in.', 'Saigon Apartments is just a well managed well maintained boutique home away from home experience. I have stayed here a dozen times (maybe more - I lost track) over the past two years.  By far my most preferred short term residence  in HCMC.', '2 Bedrooms/Bathrooms which is assigned to 3A room, everything look good except Aircon and Fan at living hall making some noise, will be good if they able to fix it before my next visit.Overall still a good apartment to stay.', 'I have stayed in Saigon Apartments now half a dozen times.  It is the first place to look to stay when I visit Saigon.  I would live here 365 days a year if I could.  The location is far enough from the noise and bustle, yet close enough to walk.  I would not want to recommend this apartment to anyone, since it would only make it tougher for me to get the bookings I want.  Having said that, I would recommend this apartment building to anyone who wants a quiet, private, living-in-the-city experience in HCMC.', 'The apartment was very clean tidy and spacious, far better than we had ever expected! We stayed in apartment 10 and it had two bedrooms, both with en-suite bathrooms! The kitchen had everything you would need. More than enough complimentary drinking water was provided for our stay which was really nice, as well as a fruit bowl when we arrived! The cleaners came every day as well!', 'Get rid of the carpet; with the heat, humidity in Saigon, there is no need for carpet. Ceramic tile would be much cleaner and cooler. Less maintenance for the hotel too. There are clear stain on the carpet. Other than this, it was very pleasant stay, particularly for family with children.']

hotel name: Khách sạn Liên An Saigon (Lien An Saigon Hotel)
address: 181 Lê Thánh Tôn, phường Bến Thành, Quận 1, thành phố Hồ Chí Minh, Quận 1, Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam, 700000
reviews: ['K có nước suối free cho khách. K cõ bãi đậu xe, phải nhờ NV gửi và tốn tiền. Máy quẹt thẻ lỗi thời, k sử dụg đc ATM', 'địa điểm cực hợp lý, gần trung tâm các hoạt động, ăn uống', '- Chúng tôi đi công tác nhưng hỏi nhân viên 1 số điểm ăn uống gần đó họ đều ko rõ lắm.- Phòng hơi nhỏ và giá phòng so với các khách sạn xung quanh, đặt qua agoda chưa thực sự cạnh tranh.', 'had an overall pleasant & lovely experience at lien ann hotel 2.\r\rwe paid all-inclusive [2nights] for a deluxe twin room.\rroom is kinda big. and the price is inclusive of breakfast (7am-9am).\r\r• 1 king size bed + 1 super single\r• 2 chairs + 1 coffee table\r• desktop pc with internet connection\r• dvd player + samsung lcd flat screen tv\r• bathtub/ bathrobes etc\r\rben thanh market is right beside the hotel.', "friendly and considerate staff. rooms are clean but the shower rooms are a we bit small. in-house dining room at the 10th floor is  small and need 'to climb' two levels up because the lift ends at the 8th floor only.  senior people like me find it a bit difficult. before taking a taxi do seek the staff assistance so that you won't be overcharged. try avoid taking the tribike ... you will be con if you are not careful. we had a very pleasant stay. i would put up at the same hotel if i visited hcmc again.", "Ive stayed here 10 times over the past 3 years. I dont recommend staying on the ground floor as it's noisy but otherwise no complaints about this hotel. super friendly staff and good value for money rooms. amazing location. make sure you try 4P's pizza restaurant around the corner ...best pizza in town", 'pros - near must see areascons - staff not helpful. chung even shouted at us when we requested him to assist us in weighing our baggage. unlike other hotels that we stayed inHCMC, staff are helpful and jolly fellows. lower floor rooms are noisy.', 'We reserved a family room so that my daughter can have her own space and bathroom. This room is interconnected with each other so space is enough for the three of us. Breakfast is not appealing though with 4 selections to choose and repeated for the entire duration of our stay, 6 nights. The dining area is at 10th floor that you have to use the stairs from 8th floor to 10th floor. Elevator is only up to 8th floor. No free bottled water in room.  The staff are nice esp the housekeeping staff. Although the kind of cleaning they do esp making the bed is not as neat and well organized. Noise from the outside your room can be heard but bec you will be tired after the whole day, it doesnt matter. Ben tanh market is so near! The famous Street Food Market is walking distance only. You can actually walk going to Saigon Center, Saigon Square!', 'This is by far the best value for money stay in HCMC for me on my travels... and ive been travelling for 17 years. Great location with spacious rooms with seperate bathroom and which is RARE for HCMC. I would highly recommend this place!', "My friend and I had a great time in saigon. We are regular travellers and normally I use Air BnB but for this trip I wanted to be very centrally located and this hotel didn't dissapoint :) Staff on front desk are super friendly and kind and helped us in every way possible. Maid service could do with not waking us at 9:30am everyday but otherwise fine Showers are very low so tall guys goodluckWas traveling with my Vietnamese gf and not always easy to stay in hotels unless married but this hotel is accepting of all female guests Good value, would definately stay again", 'Convenient location 5 Min walk to Ben Than market.Grab Taxi and Grab Moto available.Staff service is excellent. Although room small but value for money. You pay for what you get.Local food available with walking distance.You can get a transport to airport at USD9 for maximum 5 people. Check with the reception.', 'Really enjoyed my stay at Lien An Saigon Hotel, the location is excellent, the staff are fantastic and really helpful with tours, information and directions, breakfast was great, would definitely stay here again and highly recommend', "The room is too small that there is no space for you to walk. Feels like one of those cheap budget hotel. If you could imagine, there are only 3 rooms to each floor. The sheets are dirty like they've not changed it after the previous occupant. There is no complimentary bottled water in the room.\rThe staff wanted me to pay VND 10,000 after using her tape to seal my box! As I was asking the staff where to get the bahn mi, he was giving me directions half way and just walked away to have his breakfast in the room.\rI'll never recommend this hotel to anyone who visits HCMC.", "It's an old fashion hotel, like those you would find in olden days Peking. For slightly more money, you can get much better hotel around the area, eg. The Luxe or Avanti.The room is so small, there's hardly place to even walk or sit. Really, don't bother.", "overall a good experience at the hotel. the room was very clean clean, it had a clean, dry bathroom and a shower with strong water flow. There were several English channels (but no news channels) on TV. Unfortunately the standard room was claustrophobically tiny and it had a very small window facing the side wall of the next hotel, making it very dark. It felt like a windowless room. Pay a little more for a higher standard room with bigger windows and space, and try booking from the hotel's website for better value. The staff were friendly and the receptionist was helpful and spoke very good english. It is located within walking distance to all the central tourist areas.", 'We enjoyed our stay here, very convenient to market and many good places to eat. Easy walking distance to many points of interest. The staff arranged a trip to the Mekong delta which was very enjoyable. We would come again and recommend to friends.', 'This hotel had very nice rooms and the location was ideal for the market and nightlife however I was disapointed to be told I had to pay an extra $10 a night because the room I had booked was "broken", the staff were mostly helpful but this extra charge did sour the stay.', 'It was a pleasant stay with all we needed for the 4 day stay. Breakfast choice was limited but good enough to get the day going. For those who need more, it is readily available around the hotel at reasonable prices. Most attractions are within walking distances and taxi is also inexpensive.', 'we really enjoy the location of the hotel...nice & welcoming lobby. rooms are comfy. excellent internet service. however, without electric kettle/hot water,our stay with children were quite difficult.', "Good hotel but I got the same room during my stays there. I stayed here twice. i got a feeling only 1 room is available only. The room had a few cockroaches. Toilet was a lil dirty. but still ok. Staf was friendly and even helped me buy gum when i didn't know where to buy. In the end, I tip him and the total cost of the gum was so so so expensive. But that was my choice."]

address: 181 Lê Thánh Tôn, phường Bến Thành, Quận 1, thành phố Hồ Chí Minh, Quận 1, Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam, 700000
reviews: ['K có nước suối free cho khách. K cõ bãi đậu xe, phải nhờ NV gửi và tốn tiền. Máy quẹt thẻ lỗi thời, k sử dụg đc ATM', 'địa điểm cực hợp lý, gần trung tâm các hoạt động, ăn uống', '- Chúng tôi đi công tác nhưng hỏi nhân viên 1 số điểm ăn uống gần đó họ đều ko rõ lắm.- Phòng hơi nhỏ và giá phòng so với các khách sạn xung quanh, đặt qua agoda chưa thực sự cạnh tranh.', 'had an overall pleasant & lovely experience at lien ann hotel 2.\r\rwe paid all-inclusive [2nights] for a deluxe twin room.\rroom is kinda big. and the price is inclusive of breakfast (7am-9am).\r\r• 1 king size bed + 1 super single\r• 2 chairs + 1 coffee table\r• desktop pc with internet connection\r• dvd player + samsung lcd flat screen tv\r• bathtub/ bathrobes etc\r\rben thanh market is right beside the hotel.', "friendly and considerate staff. rooms are clean but the shower rooms are a we bit small. in-house dining room at the 10th floor is  small and need 'to climb' two levels up because the lift ends at the 8th floor only.  senior people like me find it a bit difficult. before taking a taxi do seek the staff assistance so that you won't be overcharged. try avoid taking the tribike ... you will be con if you are not careful. we had a very pleasant stay. i would put up at the same hotel if i visited hcmc again.", "Ive stayed here 10 times over the past 3 years. I dont recommend staying on the ground floor as it's noisy but otherwise no complaints about this hotel. super friendly staff and good value for money rooms. amazing location. make sure you try 4P's pizza restaurant around the corner ...best pizza in town", 'pros - near must see areascons - staff not helpful. chung even shouted at us when we requested him to assist us in weighing our baggage. unlike other hotels that we stayed inHCMC, staff are helpful and jolly fellows. lower floor rooms are noisy.', 'We reserved a family room so that my daughter can have her own space and bathroom. This room is interconnected with each other so space is enough for the three of us. Breakfast is not appealing though with 4 selections to choose and repeated for the entire duration of our stay, 6 nights. The dining area is at 10th floor that you have to use the stairs from 8th floor to 10th floor. Elevator is only up to 8th floor. No free bottled water in room.  The staff are nice esp the housekeeping staff. Although the kind of cleaning they do esp making the bed is not as neat and well organized. Noise from the outside your room can be heard but bec you will be tired after the whole day, it doesnt matter. Ben tanh market is so near! The famous Street Food Market is walking distance only. You can actually walk going to Saigon Center, Saigon Square!', 'This is by far the best value for money stay in HCMC for me on my travels... and ive been travelling for 17 years. Great location with spacious rooms with seperate bathroom and which is RARE for HCMC. I would highly recommend this place!', "My friend and I had a great time in saigon. We are regular travellers and normally I use Air BnB but for this trip I wanted to be very centrally located and this hotel didn't dissapoint :) Staff on front desk are super friendly and kind and helped us in every way possible. Maid service could do with not waking us at 9:30am everyday but otherwise fine Showers are very low so tall guys goodluckWas traveling with my Vietnamese gf and not always easy to stay in hotels unless married but this hotel is accepting of all female guests Good value, would definately stay again", 'Convenient location 5 Min walk to Ben Than market.Grab Taxi and Grab Moto available.Staff service is excellent. Although room small but value for money. You pay for what you get.Local food available with walking distance.You can get a transport to airport at USD9 for maximum 5 people. Check with the reception.', 'Really enjoyed my stay at Lien An Saigon Hotel, the location is excellent, the staff are fantastic and really helpful with tours, information and directions, breakfast was great, would definitely stay here again and highly recommend', "The room is too small that there is no space for you to walk. Feels like one of those cheap budget hotel. If you could imagine, there are only 3 rooms to each floor. The sheets are dirty like they've not changed it after the previous occupant. There is no complimentary bottled water in the room.\rThe staff wanted me to pay VND 10,000 after using her tape to seal my box! As I was asking the staff where to get the bahn mi, he was giving me directions half way and just walked away to have his breakfast in the room.\rI'll never recommend this hotel to anyone who visits HCMC.", "It's an old fashion hotel, like those you would find in olden days Peking. For slightly more money, you can get much better hotel around the area, eg. The Luxe or Avanti.The room is so small, there's hardly place to even walk or sit. Really, don't bother.", "overall a good experience at the hotel. the room was very clean clean, it had a clean, dry bathroom and a shower with strong water flow. There were several English channels (but no news channels) on TV. Unfortunately the standard room was claustrophobically tiny and it had a very small window facing the side wall of the next hotel, making it very dark. It felt like a windowless room. Pay a little more for a higher standard room with bigger windows and space, and try booking from the hotel's website for better value. The staff were friendly and the receptionist was helpful and spoke very good english. It is located within walking distance to all the central tourist areas.", 'We enjoyed our stay here, very convenient to market and many good places to eat. Easy walking distance to many points of interest. The staff arranged a trip to the Mekong delta which was very enjoyable. We would come again and recommend to friends.', 'This hotel had very nice rooms and the location was ideal for the market and nightlife however I was disapointed to be told I had to pay an extra $10 a night because the room I had booked was "broken", the staff were mostly helpful but this extra charge did sour the stay.', 'It was a pleasant stay with all we needed for the 4 day stay. Breakfast choice was limited but good enough to get the day going. For those who need more, it is readily available around the hotel at reasonable prices. Most attractions are within walking distances and taxi is also inexpensive.', 'we really enjoy the location of the hotel...nice & welcoming lobby. rooms are comfy. excellent internet service. however, without electric kettle/hot water,our stay with children were quite difficult.', "Good hotel but I got the same room during my stays there. I stayed here twice. i got a feeling only 1 room is available only. The room had a few cockroaches. Toilet was a lil dirty. but still ok. Staf was friendly and even helped me buy gum when i didn't know where to buy. In the end, I tip him and the total cost of the gum was so so so expensive. But that was my choice."]

address: 39 BACH DANG STREET WARD 2 TAN BINH DISTRICT, Quận Tân Bình, Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam, 700000
reviews: ['Tiện nghi đầy đủ, thiết kế đẹpPhòng tối, hệ thống đèn không đủ ánh sángRất tối, mờ ảo', 'Gần sân bay, đi bộ 10’ là đến. Phòng gia đình rộng, sạch, mới. Chỉ có điều hơi ồn có lẽ từ quạt nóng điều hoà bên ngoài phòng. Thu phí vào sớm như kiểu tranh thủ thu đc đồng nào tốt đồng ấy, trc ấy kình ở ks 5 sao còn để kh vào checkin từ 10h mà k thu gì, nói chung là tạm', 'Mình về Việt Nam thăm họ hàng, sẵn book khách sạn ở gần sân bay để tiện di chuyển. Xung quanh đây toàn là khách sạn cũ, không cũ thì giá cũng quá cao mà phòng thì xấu. Khách sạn này là ổn nhất khu, mặt tiền thì hơi thụt vô trong hơi khó thấy một chút nhưng phòng thì xuất sắc luôn. Mình chấm điểm phòng được 9.5/10. Nửa điểm trừ là mình muốn ngắm thành phố mà phòng mình k có cửa sổ, muốn up lên phòng cửa sổ thì tốn thêm phụ phí tầm 50k. Nhưng thôi giá rẻ thì tạm chấp nhận.Được cái rất gần sân bay, mình đi bộ tí là tới. Không lo bị trễ chuyến bay, hình như họ đang mở quán cafe buffet sáng gì đó. Lễ 30/4 mình về nhất định sẽ ghé lại đây.', 'Good value, quiet, clean, friendly staff. Will stay again.', 'The place is great location for me because I fly early in the morning . It’s very near to the airport , recommended . It’s value for the money, the room is perfect for us , clean and very comfortable bed', 'everything is good except old air conditioners, we really had hot nights!', 'We thought we had a great deal since we got a discount for our booking. It was really cheap, about less than 15 dollars for 3 nights. The review was high so we have not much doubts. When we got to the hotel to check in, the receptionist doesn’t know how to speak English and wasn’t really friendly. When we got to the room, the air-conditioner wasn’t working properly. When we slept, we noticed a sound coming from a plastic bag and when we checked, there were rat bites in the food inside. It was a nightmare. We decided to check out the next day and transfer to another hotel.', 'No window rooms must be better checked for smell.', 'Well, if it were not for the rats in my room I would rate my experience a 5 out 5 stars easily.What made me put 1 star is first of all the rats roaming around my room, I didnt see them first night but they woke me up during my second night and that caught me completely disgusted and shocked (travelled in my hotels in SE Asia and first time I see rats in my room) at the middle of the night that I couldnt even wanna sleep there anymore so I packed all my stuff and went on to complaint to the receptionist which didnt even proposed me to go check in a new room so I could go sleep again (I woke up at 3 AM) till I had to wake up to catch my flight, hell, she didnt even offered me the redbull that I took from the minibar (which only costed 15000 dong), even worse : she didnt apologized either for my bad experience, I had to beg her to sleep the rest of my night in the tiny couch at the reception, worst staff ever, she didnt care at all and didnt help me try to figure out a solution.', 'We have stayed in a few places in Saigon at around the same, or more than the price we paid here, and have been sorely disappointed with the quality of the hotel. This place is actually nice, we had a good sleep here (comfy beds) and the staff were friendly. We paid $26AUD per night and were happy with what we got.', 'Good choice for both airport and attractions', '1. Dirty room and bathroom. Toilet was dirty and un-flushed. 2. Hot water sinks in the bathroom were dispensing brown water. 3. Unfriendly staff. 4. After check-in, the woman at the desk asked a 5ft tall, young girl to carry my 30lbs backpack to the room.', "Actually, I haven't ever had a memorible trip as this trip. More luckyly, I found Spring Hotel like as a wonderful place for my selfie purpose. everything is so beautiful with high quality but without expensive. The receptionist is very kind and make me satisfy a lot. Thank for everything, I will comeback in next trips. Love!!!", "I traveled with my wife. Both I and she were very love this hotel because of all services they brought to us.- Room was cleaned everyday. Bedsheet & towels was changed new every 2 days. And they was all like fresh & fragrant.- Friendly staffs - always there when we need, I guess they always hang the smile on their mouths.- Nice room room amentities, I especially like the bathroom - really clean toilet & luxury shower.- Impressed by the location, it only took us around 5 mintutes to the airport by walking.You must stay here if you're foreign traveller.", "The location is near the airport, friendly staff . There're no many thíng to talk about ít quality!!!", 'Avantages : la proximité de l aéroport , le personnel agréable et à l écoute  Inconvénients: la literie , les matelas sont en mauvais états , et au niveau de la propreté , c est très moyen !']

address: 7 Nguyễn Trãi, Quận 1, Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam, 70000
reviews: ['Thất vọng vì phòng ko như hình ảnh. Tới nơi ks bảo đang đổi chủ và đang sửa chữa cho lên tầng 6 . Giường thì cũ lò xò lòi lõm nằm đau lưng. Nghĩ ở 1 đêm nên chắc họ cho lên phòng chưa sửa chữa này thôi mình cũng ok vì nghĩ chỉ 1 đêm thôi. Tối có lấy thêm 1 phòng đôi cho bạn thì phòng cũ , tường nội thất dơ,  vô phòng còn đồ khách cũ dọn chưa xong. Mình có báo lễ tân ngay . Sáng thì dưới tầng 5 sữa chữa lục đục khoan búa ko ngủ được . Tóm lại là góp ý ks hãy sửa chữa xong hãy nhận khách chứ đừng nhận khách rồi cho ở phòng ko xứng giá trị khách mua phòng như vậy!', 'Vị trí trung tâm thuận tiện cho việc đi lại, giá phòng vừa phải, phòng ốc sạch sẽ. Bữa sáng miễn phí phục vụ quá lâu, đồ ăn dở. Khách sạn miễn phí nước suối, trà, cà phê gói nhưng chỉ ngày đầu tiên, còn các ngày sau không có! Tuy không là bao, nhưng đây là một điểm kém của khách sạn. Cho 7,8 điểm.', 'Ngày đầu tiên check in, booking đã ghi chú phòng ko hút thuốc nhưng bước vào thì nồng nặc mùi thuốc. Có xịt khử mùi cũng ko đỡ hơn. Nửa đêm mùi thuốc lá bay ra từ toilet dù trong phòng chẳng ai hút thuốc. \rTường phòng dơ, cột tường bị bể 2 bên rất lớn. Toilet hay bốc mùi hôi mỗi lần xả nước. Vòi nước kế bồn vệ sinh nửa đêm bị rỉ nước tràn cả sàn.\rNgày hôm sau chuyển qua phòng sạch hơn, nhưng mền lại là kiểu ko có duvet. Ko có máy sấy, trong khi phòng trước lại có. Nước uống miễn phí chỉ có ngày đầu tiên. \rĐồ ăn sáng dở, đợi lâu. Đèn led trong phòng làm chói mắt rất khó chịu, phòng tối, đèn ko đủ sáng cả phòng.', 'không phục vụ bữa sáng.', 'Địa điểm trung tâm, thuận lợi, đông vui.', 'Phòng sạch đẹp nhưng k có cửa sổ nên hơi bí', 'Sạch sẽ và thuận tiện đi lại', 'Địa điểm tốt. Nhân viên thân thiện. Nhưng Giường quá cũ ko thể ngủ được. Phòng tắm thiếu tiện nghi. Ko thể giới thiêu cho bạn bè được', 'Mọi thứ ổn chỉ tội hơi bị mùi và điện thoại trog phòng ko dùng đc', 'khong co gi dang noi', 'Khách sạn tương đối tốt, nhưng khi đặt phòng qua Agoda thì khách sạn lại nhét mình vào phòng trên cùng, giống như nhà kho của khách sạn vậy. Rất chán', 'No hand tissues in sitting area ,I have to wait almost an hour after I ask for hand tissue may be out of stock  but good staff👍👍👍👍👍', 'Ms Mai - receptionist was very helpful with beautiful smile. The location of hotel is convenient for shopping, traveling & business trip. However, a little bit of noisy due to opposite main road. Overall: 9/10', "The location is really great and the room is clean. The only thing that I didn't like is their policy that they need ko keep your passport throughout the whole stay. The girl who was in the reception was a bit petty, as we don't want to leave our passports behind since we will be needing it later for our tour. I'm referring to the recpetion girl who has fairer skin, the other lady was nice.", 'Not as per pictures. Worst dirty room ever stay. Imagine spider webs. Horrible!', 'Normally but its not secure..j stay for 1 night but suddenly another people can come and knock my door many times its so annoying to our privacy', 'Staff say NO to every request. Room was old. Staff was unhelpful. Set up free water only one time while check in. Bathroom smelt urine all the time. Blanket was torn.Not the 2nd time staying at this hotel.', 'Room was big and clean,wifi ok.Housekeeping after clean room did not refill coffee satchel and bottle water.Towel from 2 become 1 only...Was only given 1 breakfast voucher until talk to reception then was issue another one.', 'Everything was ok. But under agoda deal we suppose to get 2 breakfast for one room. But first day they allow only allow one meal. As i and my friend were rushing we did not confront them. The next day when we confront them then they give us 2 coupon for breakfast. The reason they give was so stupid. But overall the stay was pleasant. So would recommend', "Hotel near to Ben Thanh market and Galaxy cinema. Hotel staff speak English and there's tour counter where you can book tour for a reasonable price. Good breakfast and clean room with air con working well throughout my 4 days stay. The only thing I don't like is my room is without Window though I book deluxe family room with window city view and room furniture need upgrade."]

address: 39 BACH DANG STREET WARD 2 TAN BINH DISTRICT, Quận Tân Bình, Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam, 700000
reviews: ['Tiện nghi đầy đủ, thiết kế đẹpPhòng tối, hệ thống đèn không đủ ánh sángRất tối, mờ ảo', 'Gần sân bay, đi bộ 10’ là đến. Phòng gia đình rộng, sạch, mới. Chỉ có điều hơi ồn có lẽ từ quạt nóng điều hoà bên ngoài phòng. Thu phí vào sớm như kiểu tranh thủ thu đc đồng nào tốt đồng ấy, trc ấy kình ở ks 5 sao còn để kh vào checkin từ 10h mà k thu gì, nói chung là tạm', 'Mình về Việt Nam thăm họ hàng, sẵn book khách sạn ở gần sân bay để tiện di chuyển. Xung quanh đây toàn là khách sạn cũ, không cũ thì giá cũng quá cao mà phòng thì xấu. Khách sạn này là ổn nhất khu, mặt tiền thì hơi thụt vô trong hơi khó thấy một chút nhưng phòng thì xuất sắc luôn. Mình chấm điểm phòng được 9.5/10. Nửa điểm trừ là mình muốn ngắm thành phố mà phòng mình k có cửa sổ, muốn up lên phòng cửa sổ thì tốn thêm phụ phí tầm 50k. Nhưng thôi giá rẻ thì tạm chấp nhận.Được cái rất gần sân bay, mình đi bộ tí là tới. Không lo bị trễ chuyến bay, hình như họ đang mở quán cafe buffet sáng gì đó. Lễ 30/4 mình về nhất định sẽ ghé lại đây.', 'Good value, quiet, clean, friendly staff. Will stay again.', 'The place is great location for me because I fly early in the morning . It’s very near to the airport , recommended . It’s value for the money, the room is perfect for us , clean and very comfortable bed', 'everything is good except old air conditioners, we really had hot nights!', 'We thought we had a great deal since we got a discount for our booking. It was really cheap, about less than 15 dollars for 3 nights. The review was high so we have not much doubts. When we got to the hotel to check in, the receptionist doesn’t know how to speak English and wasn’t really friendly. When we got to the room, the air-conditioner wasn’t working properly. When we slept, we noticed a sound coming from a plastic bag and when we checked, there were rat bites in the food inside. It was a nightmare. We decided to check out the next day and transfer to another hotel.', 'No window rooms must be better checked for smell.', 'Well, if it were not for the rats in my room I would rate my experience a 5 out 5 stars easily.What made me put 1 star is first of all the rats roaming around my room, I didnt see them first night but they woke me up during my second night and that caught me completely disgusted and shocked (travelled in my hotels in SE Asia and first time I see rats in my room) at the middle of the night that I couldnt even wanna sleep there anymore so I packed all my stuff and went on to complaint to the receptionist which didnt even proposed me to go check in a new room so I could go sleep again (I woke up at 3 AM) till I had to wake up to catch my flight, hell, she didnt even offered me the redbull that I took from the minibar (which only costed 15000 dong), even worse : she didnt apologized either for my bad experience, I had to beg her to sleep the rest of my night in the tiny couch at the reception, worst staff ever, she didnt care at all and didnt help me try to figure out a solution.', 'We have stayed in a few places in Saigon at around the same, or more than the price we paid here, and have been sorely disappointed with the quality of the hotel. This place is actually nice, we had a good sleep here (comfy beds) and the staff were friendly. We paid $26AUD per night and were happy with what we got.', 'Good choice for both airport and attractions', '1. Dirty room and bathroom. Toilet was dirty and un-flushed. 2. Hot water sinks in the bathroom were dispensing brown water. 3. Unfriendly staff. 4. After check-in, the woman at the desk asked a 5ft tall, young girl to carry my 30lbs backpack to the room.', "Actually, I haven't ever had a memorible trip as this trip. More luckyly, I found Spring Hotel like as a wonderful place for my selfie purpose. everything is so beautiful with high quality but without expensive. The receptionist is very kind and make me satisfy a lot. Thank for everything, I will comeback in next trips. Love!!!", "I traveled with my wife. Both I and she were very love this hotel because of all services they brought to us.- Room was cleaned everyday. Bedsheet & towels was changed new every 2 days. And they was all like fresh & fragrant.- Friendly staffs - always there when we need, I guess they always hang the smile on their mouths.- Nice room room amentities, I especially like the bathroom - really clean toilet & luxury shower.- Impressed by the location, it only took us around 5 mintutes to the airport by walking.You must stay here if you're foreign traveller.", "The location is near the airport, friendly staff . There're no many thíng to talk about ít quality!!!", 'Avantages : la proximité de l aéroport , le personnel agréable et à l écoute  Inconvénients: la literie , les matelas sont en mauvais états , et au niveau de la propreté , c est très moyen !']

address: 7 Nguyễn Trãi, Quận 1, Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam, 70000
reviews: ['Thất vọng vì phòng ko như hình ảnh. Tới nơi ks bảo đang đổi chủ và đang sửa chữa cho lên tầng 6 . Giường thì cũ lò xò lòi lõm nằm đau lưng. Nghĩ ở 1 đêm nên chắc họ cho lên phòng chưa sửa chữa này thôi mình cũng ok vì nghĩ chỉ 1 đêm thôi. Tối có lấy thêm 1 phòng đôi cho bạn thì phòng cũ , tường nội thất dơ,  vô phòng còn đồ khách cũ dọn chưa xong. Mình có báo lễ tân ngay . Sáng thì dưới tầng 5 sữa chữa lục đục khoan búa ko ngủ được . Tóm lại là góp ý ks hãy sửa chữa xong hãy nhận khách chứ đừng nhận khách rồi cho ở phòng ko xứng giá trị khách mua phòng như vậy!', 'Vị trí trung tâm thuận tiện cho việc đi lại, giá phòng vừa phải, phòng ốc sạch sẽ. Bữa sáng miễn phí phục vụ quá lâu, đồ ăn dở. Khách sạn miễn phí nước suối, trà, cà phê gói nhưng chỉ ngày đầu tiên, còn các ngày sau không có! Tuy không là bao, nhưng đây là một điểm kém của khách sạn. Cho 7,8 điểm.', 'Ngày đầu tiên check in, booking đã ghi chú phòng ko hút thuốc nhưng bước vào thì nồng nặc mùi thuốc. Có xịt khử mùi cũng ko đỡ hơn. Nửa đêm mùi thuốc lá bay ra từ toilet dù trong phòng chẳng ai hút thuốc. \rTường phòng dơ, cột tường bị bể 2 bên rất lớn. Toilet hay bốc mùi hôi mỗi lần xả nước. Vòi nước kế bồn vệ sinh nửa đêm bị rỉ nước tràn cả sàn.\rNgày hôm sau chuyển qua phòng sạch hơn, nhưng mền lại là kiểu ko có duvet. Ko có máy sấy, trong khi phòng trước lại có. Nước uống miễn phí chỉ có ngày đầu tiên. \rĐồ ăn sáng dở, đợi lâu. Đèn led trong phòng làm chói mắt rất khó chịu, phòng tối, đèn ko đủ sáng cả phòng.', 'không phục vụ bữa sáng.', 'Địa điểm trung tâm, thuận lợi, đông vui.', 'Phòng sạch đẹp nhưng k có cửa sổ nên hơi bí', 'Sạch sẽ và thuận tiện đi lại', 'Địa điểm tốt. Nhân viên thân thiện. Nhưng Giường quá cũ ko thể ngủ được. Phòng tắm thiếu tiện nghi. Ko thể giới thiêu cho bạn bè được', 'Mọi thứ ổn chỉ tội hơi bị mùi và điện thoại trog phòng ko dùng đc', 'khong co gi dang noi', 'Khách sạn tương đối tốt, nhưng khi đặt phòng qua Agoda thì khách sạn lại nhét mình vào phòng trên cùng, giống như nhà kho của khách sạn vậy. Rất chán', 'No hand tissues in sitting area ,I have to wait almost an hour after I ask for hand tissue may be out of stock  but good staff👍👍👍👍👍', 'Ms Mai - receptionist was very helpful with beautiful smile. The location of hotel is convenient for shopping, traveling & business trip. However, a little bit of noisy due to opposite main road. Overall: 9/10', "The location is really great and the room is clean. The only thing that I didn't like is their policy that they need ko keep your passport throughout the whole stay. The girl who was in the reception was a bit petty, as we don't want to leave our passports behind since we will be needing it later for our tour. I'm referring to the recpetion girl who has fairer skin, the other lady was nice.", 'Not as per pictures. Worst dirty room ever stay. Imagine spider webs. Horrible!', 'Normally but its not secure..j stay for 1 night but suddenly another people can come and knock my door many times its so annoying to our privacy', 'Staff say NO to every request. Room was old. Staff was unhelpful. Set up free water only one time while check in. Bathroom smelt urine all the time. Blanket was torn.Not the 2nd time staying at this hotel.', 'Room was big and clean,wifi ok.Housekeeping after clean room did not refill coffee satchel and bottle water.Towel from 2 become 1 only...Was only given 1 breakfast voucher until talk to reception then was issue another one.', 'Everything was ok. But under agoda deal we suppose to get 2 breakfast for one room. But first day they allow only allow one meal. As i and my friend were rushing we did not confront them. The next day when we confront them then they give us 2 coupon for breakfast. The reason they give was so stupid. But overall the stay was pleasant. So would recommend', "Hotel near to Ben Thanh market and Galaxy cinema. Hotel staff speak English and there's tour counter where you can book tour for a reasonable price. Good breakfast and clean room with air con working well throughout my 4 days stay. The only thing I don't like is my room is without Window though I book deluxe family room with window city view and room furniture need upgrade."]

address: 181 Phạm Ngũ Lão, Quận 1, Quận 1, Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam
reviews: ['Khách sạn rất ồn, tiếng máy nc nóng phòng bên làm ko thể nào yên giấc, đủ loại tiếng ồn từ trong phòng ra đến ngoài. Đi chơi quá 12h khách sạn đóng cửa phải gọi cửa rất bất tiện. chắc đây là ks giá rẻ nên mọi thứ rất bất tiện. đc vị trí trung tâm tiện di chuyển !', 'vua qua gia dinh chung toi da co mot ngay nghi le o khach san kim khoi.ve vi tri tuong doi tot nhung phong thi hoi nho \r mot dieu nua la khong co phuc vu buoi an sang giong nhu ban dau gioi thieu', "The room is spacious and clean. Housekeeping was well done everyday. The doors are somewhat stuck. The worst is its location right across one of the most happening night spot in town. The music will be blaring since 7pm and taken up several notches after 12am. They won't stop until 3am. If you are looking for a good night sleep, this is not the place for you", 'Great staff, good location if I have a chance to visit Vietnam certainly choose this hotel.', 'The staffs are accomodating. Cozy, breakfast is not good.', "Pleasant staff.  New Food hall/mini mall straight opposite.  Close to ATM's, Mini Marts, Bus, pleasant park and places to eat.  In the Backpacker area.  A little noisy up to about 9 - 10 pm because of two entertainment areas nearby.  It is a pleasant 10 minute walk, mostly through a park, to the Ben Thanh Market.", 'Loved this Place, the wife Owner speaks good English and was a lovely lady, All the staff had big smiles. The room was good, The water was hot, and the mini bar prices were as you would buy at a Circle K.It is an easy walk to the Markets and the popular tourist night spots. Highland coffee was 10m away.', 'this hotel is close to many places around ho chi minh city,\rit is very convenient to get to. \rthe hotel staff is so very friendly and helpful.\rthe price was of the room was affordable. \ri would return to the same hotel next time i visit ho chi minh city, vietnam', 'Hotel was full when I turned up with my booking. They put me in a nearby place for the night. I was a bit disconcerted. However the staff are really nice at this hotel and that repaired the bad start. Rooms can be a little noisy. Traffic noise mainly (horns). I used ear plugs and slept really well.', 'We enjoyed our stay. People are very accommodating. The standard room is small but the rooms are well maintained. They made up our room everytime we leave. The place is located near Ben Tanh Market, about 10 mins walk. The hotel also has free fast wifi. :)', "i've stayed here several times before and visited again.\rpham ung lao, benthan market, and some other tourist spots are just near there.\rquite good breakfast is free though not many options are offering; some bread or instant noodle. you better try ice white coffee, vietnam style. yes, it's free with your breakfast.\r\rfriendly staffs, clean rooms, nothing disappointed.", 'i have only good things to say about this hotel. we were treated very nice by the staff the room was nice , cleaned everyday sheets and pillow cases changed everyday. felt very compfortable staff was nice and we enjoyed chattng with them at breakfast which also was very good . walking distance to everything. we saw many hotels in the area this was by far the best. booked all of our tours down stairs. was quite an enjoyable stay. great for familys and couples. not alot of noise and no strangers wandering around the hotel late at night. they run a first class hotel one of the best i have stayed in se asia.... oh wifi works great too and is free.', 'A very good hotel and managed by family. Friendly and smile. All staffs are kind-heart, honest and can speak little English. They were very detail and concern about cleanliness. Always feel cleanliness and refresh every time back to hotel.', "The staff are AWESOME. the rooftop restaurant is a great little breakfast nook, and the built-in travel agency down below can book you any trip anywhere in the area of Saigon. The owner and staff will bend over backwards to take care of you. The room is very clean. The shower is very good. The bed is very comfortable. The Wi-Fi is second to none.  It is quiet and within easy walking distance of most major attractions. Like I said, it's anything but fancy, but it's clean efficient and the staff are so friendly. Whenever we organized any tours or trips, the buses would come and pick us up right at the front door. They always had that bottles of water ready to purchase very cheap, soda, and there's a Shoppers Drug Mart right next door for all the little things that you need like toothpaste shampoo and toiletries. It is a perfect little hotel in a perfect little location with a perfect staff.", 'The funny thing is Vietnamese dont speak good english seem thay misinterpret your request but anyway its a good loacation food courts nearby. There is a massage SPA beside but be careful they force you to give tips. There is a corner tour agent who gives cheap options', 'The funny thing is Vietnamese dont speak good english seem thay misinterpret your request but anyway its a good loacation food courts nearby. There is a massage SPA beside but be careful they force you to give tips. There is a corner tour agent who gives cheap options', "Traveling with my mom. Chose this place because it's near Sinh Tourist and Futa Busline. We're traveling the next day to Da Lat. Didn't expect much from our short stay. Room was a little noisy as it's near the road. Overall I'd recommend it if you're on a budget.", 'Rude staff, poor facilities, no water dispenser, will sneak up to our room to switch off the lights etc. when we are away, so do not leave any valuables in the room, very far away from attractions, not worth the time & money spent at Kim Khoi Hotel. Will not stay again.', "Great location. Take bus No 109 from Airport and they will drop you right in front of the hotel. Check in is super fast. It's like they wait for you and know who you are the moment you walk into the hotel. Exchange of Agoda voucher with key to the room. Booked for large bed but was given single beds but I am ok. There were many airlines tickets sub in the drawer, showing they don't really clean the drawer. Other than that, i think this is a good place to put a night of two.", 'Good points1.The hotel is close to Ben Thanh Market (5-10 minutes walk) and bus stops. It is convenient to go around the city.2.The staffs are helpful and friendly. I got a hotel room upgrade without any charge because the room type I had booked was full.3.Eventhough the hotel is small, there is a elevator. It is good for a traveler with a big luggage.Unsatisfied points1.The breakfast is not enough for me. I needed to buy something else to fill my stomach.2.The room (superior type) is clean, but the devices and furniture are out of date. The bathroom door bolt is broken.']

The hotel also has free fast wifi. :)', "i've stayed here several times before and visited again.\rpham ung lao, benthan market, and some other tourist spots are just near there.\rquite good breakfast is free though not many options are offering; some bread or instant noodle. you better try ice white coffee, vietnam style. yes, it's free with your breakfast.\r\rfriendly staffs, clean rooms, nothing disappointed.", 'i have only good things to say about this hotel. we were treated very nice by the staff the room was nice , cleaned everyday sheets and pillow cases changed everyday. felt very compfortable staff was nice and we enjoyed chattng with them at breakfast which also was very good . walking distance to everything. we saw many hotels in the area this was by far the best. booked all of our tours down stairs. was quite an enjoyable stay. great for familys and couples. not alot of noise and no strangers wandering around the hotel late at night. they run a first class hotel one of the best i have stayed in se asia.... oh wifi works great too and is free.', 'A very good hotel and managed by family. Friendly and smile. All staffs are kind-heart, honest and can speak little English. They were very detail and concern about cleanliness. Always feel cleanliness and refresh every time back to hotel.', "The staff are AWESOME. the rooftop restaurant is a great little breakfast nook, and the built-in travel agency down below can book you any trip anywhere in the area of Saigon. The owner and staff will bend over backwards to take care of you. The room is very clean. The shower is very good. The bed is very comfortable. The Wi-Fi is second to none.  It is quiet and within easy walking distance of most major attractions. Like I said, it's anything but fancy, but it's clean efficient and the staff are so friendly. Whenever we organized any tours or trips, the buses would come and pick us up right at the front door. They always had that bottles of water ready to purchase very cheap, soda, and there's a Shoppers Drug Mart right next door for all the little things that you need like toothpaste shampoo and toiletries. It is a perfect little hotel in a perfect little location with a perfect staff.", 'The funny thing is Vietnamese dont speak good english seem thay misinterpret your request but anyway its a good loacation food courts nearby. There is a massage SPA beside but be careful they force you to give tips. There is a corner tour agent who gives cheap options', 'The funny thing is Vietnamese dont speak good english seem thay misinterpret your request but anyway its a good loacation food courts nearby. There is a massage SPA beside but be careful they force you to give tips. There is a corner tour agent who gives cheap options', "Traveling with my mom. Chose this place because it's near Sinh Tourist and Futa Busline. We're traveling the next day to Da Lat. Didn't expect much from our short stay. Room was a little noisy as it's near the road. Overall I'd recommend it if you're on a budget.", 'Rude staff, poor facilities, no water dispenser, will sneak up to our room to switch off the lights etc. when we are away, so do not leave any valuables in the room, very far away from attractions, not worth the time & money spent at Kim Khoi Hotel. Will not stay again.', "Great location. Take bus No 109 from Airport and they will drop you right in front of the hotel. Check in is super fast. It's like they wait for you and know who you are the moment you walk into the hotel. Exchange of Agoda voucher with key to the room. Booked for large bed but was given single beds but I am ok. There were many airlines tickets sub in the drawer, showing they don't really clean the drawer. Other than that, i think this is a good place to put a night of two.", 'Good points1.The hotel is close to Ben Thanh Market (5-10 minutes walk) and bus stops. It is convenient to go around the city.2.The staffs are helpful and friendly. I got a hotel room upgrade without any charge because the room type I had booked was full.3.Eventhough the hotel is small, there is a elevator. It is good for a traveler with a big luggage.Unsatisfied points1.The breakfast is not enough for me. I needed to buy something else to fill my stomach.2.The room (superior type) is clean, but the devices and furniture are out of date. The bathroom door bolt is broken.']

address: 208 - 210 Le Thanh Ton, Quận 1, Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam
reviews: ['Gần trung tâm thành phố', 'Khách sạn có vị trí tốt, ở khu trung tâm, thuận tiện đi lại. Nhân viên nhiệt tình, thân thiện. Phòng hơi nhỏ, nội thất bình thường.', 'Khách sạn ở khu trung tâm, tiện đi lại. Nhân viên thân thiện. Phòng hơi nhỏ.', 'Khách sạn mới đưa vào sử dụng, nội thất mới, ngay sát chợ Bến Thành rất thuận tiện', 'Ks ngay trung tâm, gần chợ bến thành, tiện đi lại', 'Good', 'I will recommended this hotel for whose love to shopping 🛍 so near and you just walk about 10 steps only to shopping. This hotel provides:-iron with board(request foc)-kettle-10 steps only to ben than market-breakfastIf i fly to ho chi minh,i will repeat booking this hotel again 😉', 'Good hotel amongst the best. Highly recommend, good clean, simple and safety. The Avanti B. is quite, clean and safety at the center of Saigon/Ho chi Minh city. It nears many stores, markets and other hotels as choosing. Many near, different and fast transportations with bookings to travel to other cities, countries, places, etc. Night times, a best places around the hotel and come back to the hotel without lost. Fine breakfast, combines with Vietnamese and Western foods, simple, light and fast breakfast for light stomach. Many Europeans and family with children as busy, fast and easy in accommodating guests. But most staffs do not known so much about traveling to other places nor have any knowledges on any historical/best places with best reasons to go. Such as River market/Island market/City market, and even a natural hot spring at nearby cities.. Thus, very good hotel, but it is not expensive with modernized looks. Extremely very good for family and couple.', 'The location is fantastic.  The shower water level is pretty low. water pressure not strong enough . Management should look into it .', "The location is close to Benh Tanh night market and can find a lot of food in surrounding area.The breakfast is good but if you stay for more than 3 days, you will feel bored of the same food everyday. A little problem on my room as the refrigerator will turn off when you are not in the room, while the TV will still on. Seems they plug it wrongly and I didn't get a chance to ask them to fix it as I go out everyday from morning and just come back at night. But overall it's OK.", "I'm very happy with this new hotel, staff are very friendly, polite and very nice, all the bellman are very friendly and helpful. The only one thing need to address to this hotel was breakfast was no good, location was very good", 'The toilet is leaking water on the floor and make it wet all time, very iritating. And the receiptionist charged me the wrong amount upin check out, and luckily noticed by me and rectified it, eventually got refunded the over charged amount. Do be careful when makes payment on this hotel.', 'If late check out till 1pm is allowed, the experience will be more positive', 'The service team was attentative, they were polite and always had a smile! My husband and I stayed 3 nights and the room was clean, affordable and location was on the same street as Ben Thanh Market. Highly recommend this hotel to anyone who needs an affordable clean room!', 'Great location and quiet rooms in the heart of district 1 and almost opposite the market. Super friendly staff, room was clean and only issue was with the limited selection for breakfast. However , they were kind enough to give a breakfast voucher for their sister property next door Avanti Hotel and I could enjoy their buffet breakfast for free. That was lovely.', 'Nice, clean roomHopeful staff', 'Good location however cleanliness is an issue. Room was dusty, bed bugs found on bed, small black ants was crawling all over the table.', 'A bit smaller the room', 'Room size is fine. Overall staff is great but the bath room water not strong enough', 'The toilet has water leakage that constantly wet the floor around toilet seat, makr it very uncomfortable. The breakfast is nice and simple.']

address: Phạm Ngũ Lão, Quận 1, Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam, 700000
reviews: ['Pros, super friendly staff who speak English fluently.  Two free beers every night. Small chill place to meet people and just two minute walk to the Walking Bars Street.', 'Pros:Dividers and curtain for each bedGood ACGood prices on tours, buses, drinks Breakfast included (avg) 2nd floor has its own balconyExcellent location Super friendly staffCons:Only one bathroom per floorHallway and bathroom could use updating Top bunks are open to light on top', "AC was working, room was nice and the beds comfy. Just 3 lavatories with a single shower in each for the entire building, which caused some queues. The bathrooms didn't really strike us as too clean, there were some ants in one of the lavatories and it took a lot of patience to wait for the warm water to come. Staff was friendly and breakfast was alright. For the value it's a definitely decent hostel, but you shouldn't expect anything special.", 'Nice atmosphere with the other travelers, and the staff is very nice and helps you with anything(:', 'I am WenDi wu.i like jungle house.it is nice.', 'very central. helpful and super friendly staff', 'I wanted to stay for long term but the managers kept cancelling my bookings. I think these people are not serious and very disrespectful', 'I had a good stay, breakfast was very good and great service. Beds are big and toilet was good and clean. Service was great. It is located near the main party street but in a very quiet street which is relaxing. Totally recommend it 😊', 'staff is friendly and glad to allow you early check in when bed is unoccupied. very near to Bui Vien street. big and clean single bed', 'This place is nice tucked away down an alley behind Bui Vien party street. The staff are friendly and the rooms are comfy. Very causal hostel and did the perfect job for a couple of nights.', "Rapport qualité prix bon. La personne de l'accueil est tres sympa", 'Llegué a las 3am y me recibieron con una sonrisa (el chico estaba durmiendo)!La atención es excelente, el chico que está en recepción (perdón me olvidé tu nombre!) es divino, sabe muchísimo español por el poco tiempo que está estudiando. Siempre dispuesto a ayudar y conversar!El desayuno muy bien, ofrecen servicio de toallas dejando un depósito. Las camas cómodas, baño muy bien. Había venido por recomendación de unas chicas y desde luego lo recomendaría.Denle un aumento de sueldo a ese chico, que se lo merece! Gracias por todo!!!!', '接代人员态度友善，早餐很好。地点优越。', '인도놈이랑 둘이 잠자는데  내가 술이조금 되어 한밤중에 이놈이 내바지에 들어있던 베트남돈 4,400,000동을 가져가버린것도 모르고 나중에 체크아웃하고 식당에서 지갑보니 돈이없어 너무 황당하네요. 싼게 비지떡이네요. 태국에서는 파키스탄,베트남에서는 인도노ㅁ한테 여행이 기분 안좋네요. 이게 다 아고다실수로 호텔 체인지해서 일어난일.누굴 타하랴,']

address: 233 Phạm Ngũ Lão, Quận 1, Quận 1, Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam,
reviews: ['Vị trí đẹp, bo biển đẹp, biển ngay dưới chân nhà, một mình một biển, Biển đẹp và sạch ko kém biển Hyatt. Nằm giữa làng tranh Bích Hoạ. Tuy nhiên tiện nghi homestay đơn giản quá, nhà mình có trẻ con cần vứt rác cứ phải vào toalet vứt, mà trẻ con thải khá nhiều rác. Neu dawtj the, gio rac tromg phong thi tot. Nước toalet yếu, thingr thoảng đang tắm lại hết nc ấm. Nhưng nói chung chất lượng như thế là rất tốt so voeis các homestay khác. Bạn chủ rất nhiệt tình, mình rất thích kỳ nghỉ ở đây, trẻ con nhà mình cungc rất thích.', 'Khách sạn nằm trên đường Phạm Ngũ Lão, ko quá xa phố Tây Bùi Viện, đi vài bước tới các quán bar, nhà hàng, quán xá..., đối diện cũng có 1 trung tâm mua sắm rất tiện lợi.Giá cả phải chăng, nhân viên dễ thương, phòng ốc sạch sẽ.', 'PHòng sạch, nhỏ, yên tĩnh', 'hôm nhận phòng tôi ngồi ở sảnh thì được bạn lễ tân mang cho một cốc nước chanh leo, khá ấn tượng nhưng hôm về chỉ xin một cốc nước lọc nhỏ để uống nước cũng rất khó khăn, xin từ nhân viên đến lễ tân mà cuối cùng cũng k được, cảm thấy khá thất vọng, nhất là về phía lễ tân, thái độ khá lạnh nhạt với khách hàng, hay vì tôi là khách hàng trong nước nên các bạn có thái độ như vậy?', 'Khách sạn ngay trung tâm, phòng ks sạch sẽ, đẹp', 'Tiện nghi tương đối tốt , vị trí đẹp , cạnh công viên. Nhân viên nhiệt tình', 'Vị trí tốt, ở trung tâm và đối diện công viên. Nhân viên thân thiện', 'Tuyệt vời', 'áie quay lai', 'Vị trí tốt, ăn sáng chán, phòng sạch sẽ', 'Toi rat hai long va se quay tro lai ks nay lan nua. Ks nam tai trung tam doi dien la cong vien, rat thuan tien cho viec luu tru va thu gian.', 'Very clean and comfortable', 'Giá phòng qua agoda rất hợp lý so với chất lượng ks.', 'Chung ta da co mot ki nghi tuyet voi tai day!', 'Khach san tot nhung thuc an sang qua ngheo nan.', 'Khu nhà hàng có view rất tốt, phòng sạch, có công viên ngay trước mặt khách sạn', 'Nhưng điều này là rất cũ, và giữ sạch sẽ.Nhân viên thân thiện và có thể giao tiếp bằng tiếng Anh.', 'Giá không đúng khi đặt phòng với Agoda. Khi đến nhận phòng phải trả thêm 30USD, tổng cộng là hơn 60USD/ngày', 'Đèn phong màu vàng thực sự ko đẹp lắm. Nhân viên phục vụ tốt.']

address: 214/1 Nguyen Trai, Quận 1, Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam, 70000
reviews: ['mình đặt phòng có báo có ăn ság, nhưng tới thì k thấy có bất cứ hướng dẫn j về việc ság ăn ở đâu mấy h tới mấy h, phòng uki nhưng cửa khá là ồn, k bik do các bạn ý thức kém đập cửa mạnh hay do bản thân cái cửa', 'Vị trí tốt, phòng xinh, sạch, nhân viên dễ thương. Lần sau sẽ quay lại ;)', 'Nhóm mình 3 người có đặt 1 phòng standard 3 người. Tới nơi thì nhận được phòng tập thể không giống như phòng mình đặt trên Agoda. Khá chật và tù túng. Cũng không được sạch sẽ cho lắm. Mình thật sự không quen. Có lẽ sẽ phù hợp với các bạn du lịch bụi hay muốn tiết kiệm. Mình thấy toàn tây ở đây thôi :D', 'Phòng sạch sẽ, nhưng hơi nóng. Địa điểm phù hợp.', 'Ks nên bổ sung thêm máy sấy tóc và nước uống', 'Hostel ngay trung tâm tt, tiện đi lại và có rất nhiều hàng ăn xung quanh', 'Tôi sẽ quay lại nếu có dịp', 'Nhỏ, hẹp, ko có lỗ thông hơi, nếu hoả hoạn chắc chết.', "You can't beat GoCo's price. Really affordable and great staff.Once they repair the curtains and improve their breakfast I will say they are 10/10. Currently they are very close to perfect but a few small improvements are needed.ProsFree beer 6-8pmWashroom has shower seperate from toilet (only in 8 person dorm) This means your feet don't get wet everytime you use the bathroom.", "Location - only 10 mins to main backpacker area. So quiet area and can get decent sleep as there are curtains. ( Repair needed as some bed curtains are coming off the track)Other guests - mostly Vietnamese and Chinese meaning it's a bit hard to meet people who speak English but this is nice if you want to be antisocial.Free beer offered between 6-8Breakfast is only toast, jam, coffee and tea", "This hostel has amazing staff. Ming in particular is amazing and super helpful. The hostel needs the bed curtains to be repaired as many are in disrepair and half falling off. All in all its decent value for the price.Some of the staff doesn't speak the best English but this is the norm in Vietnam.  Breakfast wise please note they serve only coffee, tea with some white bread and 3 jams. Appreciate it being free but I wouldn't really call it breakfast.  Location wise it's a 10 minute walk from where most backpackers stay. This means for the most part it's quiter which is nice but you'll have to walk farther if you want to hangout in the main area. Additionally, this means it's a bit harder to meet other backpackers as many people staying at this hotel are Vietnamese travelers and Chinese travelors who don't speak any English.", "This hostel has amazing staff. Ming in particular is amazing and super helpful. The hostel needs the bed curtains to be repaired as many are in disrepair and half falling off. All in all its decent value for the price.Some of the staff doesn't speak the best English but this is the norm in Vietnam.  Breakfast wise please note they serve only coffee, tea with some white bread and 3 jams. Appreciate it being free but I wouldn't really call it breakfast.  Location wise it's a 10 minute walk from where most backpackers stay. This means for the most part it's quiter which is nice but you'll have to walk farther if you want to hangout in the main area. Additionally, this means it's a bit harder to meet other backpackers as many people staying at this hotel are Vietnamese travelers and Chinese travelors who don't speak any English.", 'Positives:Very clean and staff is really nice. Definitely a fair price for with you get and the bed curtains allow you privacy.Everyone gets a free 450ml beer between 6-8pmNegatives: They need more of a "kitchen" then just a microwave. A stove top burner and some pots and pans is a kitchen. Also, they don\'t serve breakfast. It\'s jam, margarine and bread, coffee and tea . It\'s misleading to say this is breakfast. Offer some protein. Like boiled eggs, peanut butter etcBeer is great but free water bottle refills would be really nice', "The hostel was a bit hard to find for the taxi driver as it's in a small alley, but it's not really off the main street. Very comfortable beds, clean room, shampoo , toothbrush, towels provided. The staff is super friendly. I checked out but my bus was at night and they let me hang out at the hostel offering new towels if I wanted to take a shower before I leave for free. Location is great. Walking distance to the main tourist street but far enough to avoid the noise and craziness. Highly recommend place!", 'I chose this hostel because of central location, they have a kitchen you can use, breakfast (dont expect too much only toast and jam and instant coffee), its quiet and not crowded. Its not the best place to mingle and meet people because there is only a small common area. If youre looking for a quiet space centrally located for couple days its a very good choice. They offer free beer every evening. Big plus for the staff for letting me borrow a helmet!', 'although the location is not near to the central , but take a grab only cost 20k dong , and nearby got few restaurant serve with nice food, and all the price is not tourist price! Moreover, at the morning , you can experience the local life by visiting the street nearby to this hostel!', 'Stayed one night in the double room on forth floor. The room was clean, had a nice modern design and a small balcony. Looks just like in the pictures! Staff was very friendly and helpful. There is also a shared kitchen downstairs. We would definitely come back!', 'I rent a couple room with a queen bed but when we come and checked in. I had to stay in a Family with old children. I do not understand why they did it.. i am very disappointed.. the room is too old, everything is oldddddd...', "I decided to test out this hostel for a night because it is part of the same company as Luci hostel.It is what you pay for a bed, secure and quiet.But there were a few things that made me want to leave the first hour in.- Too hot, the room was so small that the fans were ineffective- Soo dark, you couldn't see anything in the room, even their bed light was dismal.4th Floor, the dorm room is on the 4th floor so you have to climb flights if stairs to get up there.- hot water didn't work.The room was clean, , beds comfortable.I've gone back to their other hostel Luci house, much better there.", 'We are in a group of 5.. All female. We booked at GoCo hostel but we were transfered to Luci House. The place and the room was clean and near the city center. The breakfast was bread and tea.']
