address: 283/21 đường Phạm Ngũ Lão, Quận 1, Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam, 70000
reviews: ['Khách sạn sạch sẽ, vị trí trung tâm thành phố nên dễ dàng mua sắm, ăn uống và tiết kiệm chi phí đi lại. Nhân viên thân thiện, vui vẻ. Bữa sáng đơn giản nhưng chấp nhận được với giá phòng ksan. Khách sạn nhỏ nên không có thang máy, khách sạn nằm trong hẻm nhỏ, xe taxi có thể đi vào nhưng tốt hơn vẫn là đón xe ở ngoài hẻm.', 'Nhan vien vui ve, nhiet tinh, giá cả hợp lý, dich vu tot', 'Ăn sáng mì ăn liền thì nh nơi có, nhưng phở ăn liền thì hơi bất ngờ, thà ko đưa vào thực đơn còn hơn! Phòng ăn bé cho 6 ng, nóng và muỗi', "I spent 6 nights here and thoroughly enjoyed it.  It's located right next to backpackers street but it is tucked up a little lane so it is surprisingly quiet.  The staff are fantastic. Very welcoming, courteous and extremely helpful. The rooms are a decent size, the bed very comfortable, the aircon worked well and the tv had plenty of channels in English. The rooms are cleaned every day and the towels were also changed daily. The hotel also does a laundry service should you need anything washed. I would highly recommend this place to anyone considering staying in HCM. I will certainly be back.", 'Staff are really nice and honest. Buy your sim  card and tours through them. Its in an alleyway (safe atnight) a few mins walk from backpacker st yet quiet for sleep. The rooms have fan, aircon, safe, fridge etc.  Be prepared for stairs if your room is upstairs.  I would stay again.  Good value as breakfast included. The staff very helpful and some speak English so was easy for me.', 'For the cost, it was quite good. Staff was really friendly and always happy to help. I arrived late (very late - missed my flight and arrived the next day at 7am) and they happily checked me in and offered me some breakfast. Great location. Overall a good experience', 'The hotel is located in the main backpacker quarter. It’s clean with air-conditioned rooms (our machine broke but was quickly fixed). The manager has great recommendations (he pointed us towards a delicious bánh mì stall) and speaks good English. Breakfast is basic but nice. We would recommend!', 'The location very good and staff very good. Facilities a little bit old, especially the WiFi every floor use as different standalone, and difficult to use at night.  If can upgarde Will much better', 'The location of the hotel is accessible. There is an English-speaking staff who assisted us. The hotel offers tour and transport arrangements which is quite cheaper than online. The room and breakfast are also good.', 'A very warm welcome with helpful local information.  I had an early morning flight and I was still seen out with some fruit to eat on my journey as I would miss breakfast by a few hours. The bed was very comfortable. Air conditioning worked well plus an extra fan provided good white noise for my early evening.  The location is convenient being one block off the major street so its quieter but quick to get a taxi or grab.  Had very good pho a few blocks away too.   If you have lots of luggage ask for a lower floor to make it an easier climb. Would stay again', 'This is close to the backpacker area but not so loud and dirty. I even extended my stay. Staff was helpful. It’s easy to get your laundry done here and they made it smell so nice!', "Rooms are straightforward, clean, stocked with shampoo, soap, toothbrushes, and tissues (a plus in my book). My room had decent air conditioning and wi-fi proximity. Prices through Agoda are likely better than on other services, and the hotel will accept Vietnamese Dong (VND) or US Dollars, which is a lovely feature if you have not exchanged currencies yet. Great location, but quieter than the backpacker hell-hole called Bui Vien Street. On the downside, there is no elevator, so if you are above the 2nd floor, you will get a dose of exercise. Also, the hotel offers motorbike rentals for 150,000 VND per day, but they insist on keeping the passport or leaving a high-amount deposit. This is an issue for many foreigners who need their passports during the day, such as obtaining legitimate SIM cards or visiting embassies in town. Other hotels will let you keep your passport as they already have a copy of your passport and aren't as paranoid. Breakfast is decent and provided, and overall this is a good value.", 'I was really enjoyed my stay at ngoc linh, the staff performance was very attentive, they even booked me a bus ticket soon after I checking in, very supportive, the hotel was small but clean, room and bathroom also.  Their location is within a walking distance to all sightseing around ben tanh market, you can just walk to reunification museum, saigon sky deck, notre dame cathedral of saigon, and also local eatery around hotel, even the limousine bus such as mekong express stop just across the street outside this hotel.Would definitely stay at ngoc linh if I come visit saigon again, highly recommended for budget traveller One minor complaint is ngoc linh not provide a smoking room, so it was rather exhausted to back and forth 4th floor to 1st floor just to smoking', 'This was a nice hotel. Close to the main party area of Bui Vien/Pham Ngu Lau and the all the major attractions of District 1. The only negative of my stay was the large bed I requested was two single beds pushed together (which would have been fine except the matresses were different heights). I would stay here again.', "Room was clean, staff friendly, location v central. It's only a street away from the busy backpacker street, but surprisingly quiet. RoomIsn't large but reflect location. Bed was hard, but pretty much all beds are hard in Vietnam!", "Where it could feasibly fall down in its maintenance, it's more than made up for in the sweetness and helpfulness of the staff.  Nhu literally walked me to my bus several blocks away and waited outside in the noonday heat until I was comfortably seated on the bus. It's that kind of beyond-the-call-of-duty courteousness that I appreciate.  Both she and her business partner are so very welcoming, one feels so extraordinarily at home here. I love the feeling they create, even, at the time of arriving. If you should stay here, say 'hi' to them from me.", 'Location was perfect.🤗 Excellent staff -arranged our tour and transpo to airport, proactively offered in transferring us to lower room and always there to help when we have questions about the place. Will definitely come back here soon.😀', 'The hotel itself  is in a great location. Tucked away in the backpackers alley. Makes for a quite stay (request top floor). They only thing is you have to hike it up everytime but you get your daily workout.', "Pros: access to a computer, hotel has decent breakfast, employees are really nice, bed was clean. Guest friendly.Cons: ants appeared everywhere on my last day in the bathroom around the sink, no elevator. Annoying to climb the stairs. And there's a kid crying or yelling every morning that woke up everyone around 7:30am", "This is an awesome hotel! It's right in the middle of the backpacker scene but also walking distance to all the major attractions like the War Remnants Museum. Our room was clean and very well air conditioned. Staff were great always happy to help out and point us in the right direction. We even got our first night refunded even though it was our mistake that we didnt stay the night"]

hotel name: Khách sạn Giang Sơn 3 (Giang Son 3 Hotel)
address: 35/4 Bùi Viện, Quận 01, Quận 1, Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam, 70000
reviews: ['tốt', 'Khách sạn ở trung tâm phố tây, phòng sạch sẽ tuy nhiên còn một vài điểm mình không hài lòng: phòng khách sạn quá nhỏ, bí, lối đi vào phòng zích zắc; khách sạn chỉ phục vụ ăn sáng từ 7h không thuận tiện cho nhóm du lịch như bọn mình; phòng tắm không có móc treo quần áo.', 'Đi công tác nên ko cảm nhận đc hết khu vực xung quanh khách sạn này.', 'ks nhỏ. vị trí ngay khu phố tây tiện ăn uống đi lai vui chơi. nhân viên thân thiện. bữa sáng cần cải thiện.', 'Khach san khong co thang may. That vong tran tre khi fai di bo len tang 4 voi em be nho va hanh ly. Khong quay lai khach san nay nua', "The street is very beautiful and very lively in the evening where we passed good times. The hotel is in a very quiet alley. It's a good place.The welcome is friendly, the staff attentive and the rooms clean.Good place |", 'they speak French and English very well, they booked a taxi for me', 'Situated right in the Bui Vein walking street in an alley away from the traffic. Within walking distance to Ben Tanh market, War Remnants Museum, Post Office, Cathedral, Opera House, Fine Art Museum etc . Bare basic room but clean . Set breakfast provided .Breakfast is sufficient . Maybe can be expanded to include toasts and cereals as well.The walking street can be noisy at night especially weekends with many pubs and food joints. Luckily, you can hardly hear anything in the room . Day tours can be booked from the hotel . We visited the Chu Chi tunnels and Cao Dai temple in a day trip . Good outing.Walked to the other places  of interest. You can get good quality roasted coffee beans or ground coffee at the big cafes like Trung Nguyen Legend, Phuc Long etc much cheaper than elsewhere.Takashimaya has a wide range of local food products at reasonable prices. Saigon Square opposite is a good shopping place for clothes, shoes etc.The street next to Ben Tanh caters to Muslims.', 'The guesthouse was clean and the rooms are well insulated from the noise on Bui Vien. Breakfast was fruit and a mini baguette with either eggs or jam and butter, and hit the spot each morning. Air conditioner worked well but was rather noisy.', 'Pros : Nice staff with smile and clean room. No bugs during our stay. Good location. It’s on the walking street so it’s easy to go bars or restaurants which is good. Breakfast is simple but you can choose among 3 menus.Cons : Because it’s located on walking street surrounded by bars, it’s little bit noisy at night till around 12. But not that problem to sleep. Water pressure for shower was bit weak.', 'Stayed in the cheapest, no-window room as I\'m travelling alone.  Satisfied. Initially when I entered the room I thought "Oh, right. I booked the cheapest," as it looked a bit too barren, but as I unpacked I realized it was very well-managed. Very clean, linens smelled lovely, fridge and A/C powerful (with no musty smell), clean working bathroom, hot shower. Only gripe is met a young girl on the 2nd day who was idling away on the reception sofa with a green facial mask all over her face. Inquired about extending half a day and her attitude was lackluster. Can only imagine she was the owner\'s daughter with such attitude? Unacceptable for me guests have to talk to an unfriendly, no smiles green face. Rules for outside guests are also very strict. ID check is necessary, which I understand, but still states they can stay only during the daytime. I didn\'t have a need to bring in a guest, but found it unreasonable. Breakfast never tried, but heard is good enough. Not noisy as inside alley!', 'The hotel has a perfect location. It is in the middle of bui vien street. But the location inside the street makes it so comfortable and quite. It is my favourite hotel in ssigon, close to the bus stations. Bars. Clubs and market. The rooms are clean and tiny. Staff soon be like family😊', 'this hotel is in city centre, in entertainment area, but cleanliness is doubtful and staff could be more helpful. Breakfast is not good. If you choose eggs, you cannot get butter. I have never seen a worse breakfast before in Vietnam.', 'Always stay here when I’m in HCM', 'The  best you can get for the Value for money', 'This hotel is hidden down an alley which actually made it quite quiet for sleeping. It’s right off the Main Street where you can find anything from food to clothes to entertainment. I would for sure stay here again. They booked me a taxi to the airport at 6am and the driver was actually early. Overall no complaints. The bed was also pretty comfy.', "Hotel is inside a alley inside the night market.  It's quite at night, but just a few steps, you can reach the night market with lots of bars and restaurants.Friendly and helpful staff.Room is clean.  Reasonable price.", 'A comfortable room in a great location. A comfortable clean bed and a good a-la-carte breakfast. The staff is friendly and helpfu.I had booked room without window. My only problem was the fact, that there was no light switch next to the bed (arriving after a long flight I was a bit disoriented).', "We spent one night here before flying out early in the morning. The staff were incredibly helpful with organising a taxi for the morning and settling us into our room. It's in the heart of backpacker town, which is great if that's where you want to be. It's quiet in the hotel despite the crazy shenanigans going on in the streets. Breakfast was nice. Overall, really good value for money."]

address: 40/18 Đường Bùi Viện, Quận 1, Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam, 70000
reviews: ['Giá tốt, nhân viên vui vẻ, nhiệt tình, địa điểm náo nhiệt, sầm uất, giải trí về đêm tuyệt vời. Tuy nhiên phòng hơi nhỏ và tấm trải giường màu hồng nên nhìn không được sạch sẽ lắm, mặc dù điều kiện vệ sinh là khá tốt', 'Giá cả vừa phải, khách sạn thân thiện, đáng yêu, địa điểm tuyệt vời. Tuy nhiên phòng hơi nhỏ, khăn trải giường màu đỏ hồng làm cho cảm giác giường ngủ nhỏ lại và cảm giác không sạch sẽ. Nếu khăn trải giường màu trắng hoặc sáng thì tốt hơn', 'Chúng tôi uống bia bệt suốt đêm ở Bùi Viện', "Perfect location and great staff. Indulge yourself with a balcony room. Always happy to return to Kim's hotel.", "always a warm welcome . Right in the heart of district 1 bit set back on a quiet steet McDonald's 5 min walk .The bus from the airport costs 20.000dng and drops u within a few min walk .taxi to airport back is cheap at 16.000dng Internet is perfect And if u choose a balcony room a bath tub too be it a bit small .Highly recommended", 'I enjoyed my stay at Kim hotel. Im surprised to receive a bunch of longan fruits and a bottle of mineral water upon arrived at the hotel. Wow experience I had from the owner. They are flexible with my requests and im pleased with the stay. As a frequent traveller, I feel this hotel provide a good homestay experience.', "Hotel is situated at a good location.  I was greeted with a warm smile, a welcome drink and fruits. Something that is not normally associated with a budget hotel. There is a small lift that goes up to the 5th floor.  Amenities are very basic but considering the price that I paid, it's great value for money. The only complain that I have is the poor wifi connectivity.  Other than this, I am happy with the place.  I will come back again.", 'It was a comfortable place with good and friendly staff. Do inform them if u want to laundry white clothes to seperate from the others as my friend had a stain on it. There is a bus 152 that drops u off at ben thath market which is only 10k dong (less than 1 USD) instead of cabbing from the airport or asking for an airport transfer. it is just a 10 mins walk from ben thanh market.', "The room is big and clean with a small balcony. The lock on the room was pretty basic I felt it wasn't safe leaving my valuables. But I didn't lose anything. They clean the room everyday and replenishes the supplies. They have a restaurant downstairs that offers breakfast which is good when you book an 8am tour. The staff are nice, they will try to accommodate all your needs. Try chatting with them if you have time. They also offer tours but try to check the tour agencies along Pham Ngu Lao and Bui Vien to score a better deal.", 'Balcony rooms with bath Perfect location Mc ds the bars and bus to airport all a few min walkLovely staff ex internet and clean rooms', 'I stayed in a deluxe room. It was spacious and clean. Great stay', 'The  staff  greeted  me by  name  when  I  arrived . They  took  me  straight  to  my  room . Check  in took less  than  a minute . The  room  was  clean and  as advertised . The  street  is  quite  at night  with  plenty  of  places  to  eat  near  by . It is  only  1/2 a block  off walking  street .', 'This lovely budget hotel is situated in the centre of all the local activity. The staff were very welcoming and let us know that they could organize trips for us if necessary. In fact we had not arranged for a pick-up from the airport and a couple of days earlier rang to ask if it was possible for Kim to arrange it. They were very obliging and picked us up from our delayed flight. The hotel was also very clean, it had wi-fi, drinks were very reasonably priced. I would highly recommend it as it was certainly value for money.', 'It was fine. Bathroom was quite small but it did the job. Excellent location just off main tourist road but heard nothing in the room. Great staff, except for one minor disagreement over what was taken from the minibar.', 'nothing wrong with the hotel, but while you book for 20 bucks here, you can find the same room for 10-12 just walking on same street. Lots and lots of rooms available these days. No need to book online and pay more.', 'The room wiht balcony is very clean and good! Everything you need and also aircon. The location is in the traveller area and you find restaurants and shops around. As long as Miss Kim is there everything is working perfect!!! Only the others do not know what to do....', 'I had a great time at Kim Hotel 1. I booked the economy room but when I arrived at the hotel, the owner upgraded me to a double room. The room was clean and comfortable. The location was perfect because it is just a walking-distance away from Ben Tanh Market, and the area is full of tourists which makes it safe to walk around.', 'Stay was good. Room was big for 1. Balcony was only big enough for one chair to fit, its small but ok.Foods served at breakfast was nice. Location was easy to walk to nice eateries and close to benh tanh market where i always went to buy sweets and food.The street behind is justwhere pwople would sitaround and drink by the side walk. So its in the middle of a happening place. Lots of nice cafe.', 'e were warmly welcomed from the start and the friendly staff did everything possible to help us. Rooms were very clean and comfortable, the street outside quiet. Large room safe. Centrally located in quarter 1 with easy walking access to almost anything you want to see in HCMC. I would definitely stay there again.', 'The staff was very friendly and helpful.  The rooms were very nicely designed with a safe in the room and very fast internet. The bed and furniture was great and could not ask for a better layout with balcony.']

address: 238 Bui Vien, Quan 1, Quận 1, Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam, 256125
reviews: ['Khách sạn sạch sẽ, ở giữa trung tâm, tiện lợi đi thăm quan.Nhan viên thân thiện', 'The best part of the hotel was the staff. Everyone was very friendly and made it very easy to arrange tours and onward travel. Location has in the heart of the action, but, inside was a haven. Very clean.', 'we are very satisfied with our room ,clean and well attended everyday. All are nice except in booking for transport from hotel to airport. There is no proper coordination between hotel staff and private transpo bec we were ask to pay when advance payment was already made at the hotel. Gave us hassle in going  to the airport', 'Everything was great in the hotel except we got put on the top floor. This means up 7 flights of steps in the heat and humidity. They have no rooms on the 1st or 2nd floor. Otherwise if you are looking to be near the nightlife, this is the perfect location.', "If you are looking for budget price accommodation which is spotless; well managed with attentive caring staff; right in the centre of the action in hcmc, then look no further.I stayed here for 3 nights with my two sons aged 18 and 20 for the first leg of our Vietnam adventure.Admittedly, the Hong Han is not for everyone. The rooms are located on the five floors above the lobby and there is no lift, therefore strong legs and lungs are required, especially if your room is on the upper floors. The rooms to the front of the hotel are fronting onto one of the busiest and loudest tourist traps in the city which doesn't quieten down until 4am so those with a disposition to noise should probably look elsewhere.The rooms are spacious and well appointed for guesthouse standards. The cooked complimentary breakfast served on the first floor balcony is simple but delicious. The staff will help you any way they can.  We all thoroughly enjoyed our stay and would definitely make a return visit.", "The hotel is very nice. Even though it's in a busy area, I didn't hear the busy city ar night. As soon as you're out of the door, you are in a busy part of town. Just a (15 minute) walk away from the Benh Than markets, the war museum, sky deck etc. Lot's of bars and restaurants just around the corner. Breakfast is quite a lot you can choose different options.Staff is friendly and rooms are big enough and clean. Overall a good place to explore Saign for a few day's.", 'I enjoyed my stay at the hotel. The staff were very very friendly. They were the best staff I had so far!  Though they didn’t have an elevator, our room was at the 3rd or 4th floor (i kind of forgot) but they helped us with our bags. They also helped us book a tour and the location of the hotel was very convenient. :)', 'We only stayed one night but this hotel left an impression on us! The room was clean and surprisingly quite for the location. The staff was very considerate and accomadaing! We highly recommend staying here!', 'The hotel is in the heart of the city with great resturants bars and shops everywhere but once you step inside the hotel doors you leave all the madness and noise behind you and just chill out in this  lovely  little place', 'Location is good. Near resto and walking distance to Ben Than market and Saigon Square. Clean and descent. The staff are polite and very attentive. They made my booking in Mekong tour via KIM Travel which is cheap compare to other. And also, they book me for bus going to cambodia. Breakfast is good.Cons: No elevator. You need to exercise walking the stairs. But, they have a lifting machine incase you have luggage.In recommed this hotel. You get what you pay.', "Pros:- the staff work super hard and are very kind! - location - this can be a pro or con depending on how you look at it...it's in the middle of the action and the bars, restaurants etc., and a pretty good walking distance to many of the major city attractions - close to the first/last stop of the 109 Yellow bus to/from the airport (at 23/9 Park)- the rooms are not new or fancy, but they were comfortable and kept well (ours was quite large)- they close the gate at 11pm, but you can ring the bell at any time and they will open it for youCons:- location (can be a pro or con)...it can get quite loud at night when everyone's out, but we were fine with it. We had a room on the 4th floor at the front of the building and we got over the noise by the second night (or join the fun or use ear plugs:P).- there is no elevator, so expect to get in a good exercise before relaxing in aircon if you're on an upper floor", "Staff are SO nice! Made me feel right at home and helped arranged bus tickets. Room was very spacious and even though it's right off the main backpacker street, you couldn't here any outside noise. Lovely stay, would come again.", "Centrally located in the backpacker area, nice big, clean rooms with a compact ensuite. Friendly staff who use an electric hoist to lift luggage to your floor (you have to walk). The street below is very busy  but we were on the third floor and really didn't notice any noise. Nice little, alfresco breakfast balcony, (it was a tad crowded and service was a bit slow; it seemed everyone wanted an early meal and check out and the poor waitress was managing both.) (Poor girl was run off her feet but continued to smile)", 'The hotel is located in a very lively street with bars, shops and plenty of restaurants, the rooms are quiet, clean and modern. Delicious breakfast is served on a cosy little terrasse on the first floor. But what really makes the difference here is the friendly and very helpful staff, that helped us sort out e very urgent passport problem upon arrival:)', 'Hotel was located at a very convenient location with eateries, bars, and convenience stalls all around. Staff was very friendly and patient and ensured that you had a comfortable stay. Would recommend you to stay at this hotel!', 'we stayed at the hong han for a week and returned for a couple of days prior to our return flight from hcmcthe hotel was exceptionally clean and very efficiently run by friendly and very helpful staff.the rooms we used were light and spacious with good aircon and fans, the roof terrace is a plus for breakfast and for me reading after the kids were in bed.the 11pm curfew was fine for us with kids though party party backpackers would probably find it too restrictive.we travelled saigon dalat bmt and nha trang. and this was the best hotel by a wide margin', 'My second visit to Saigon and I returned to the Hong Han because my previous experience had been so good.  The faces behind the counter may have changed but the service is still the same Located right at the heart of the action, the Hong Han offers great value for money', "Hong Han staff were wonderfully helpful, the rooms were clean, and the hotel was conveniently located. I walked pretty much everywhere.  If you're not looking for anything crazy fancy but totally affordable, then this is a great option. The backpacker street is also convenient with lots of restaurant choices, spas, etc. it's louder at night, but I have to say, even as a light sleeper, I had no trouble sleeping.", '-live high floor will have trouble climbing stairs\r-live low floor may have trouble being interpreted by noise coming from the street\rhard choice.\rhost is helpful. location is the most crazy and popular place in HZM. \rnear Fan Wu Lao Jie.\rnear the Sihn Tourist', 'Cons: A bit noisy from all the bars and general street revelry, also the doorbell ringing all night to let people in is a bit frustratingPros: immaculately clean. Ok sized rooms - not large but big enough. No lift but an ingenious electronic pulley to bring luggage up and down the stairs. Breakfast, coffee, juice very good.Staff so friendly and helpful, knowledgeable about all kinds of travel arrangements and happy to book for you']

They have no rooms on the 1st or 2nd floor. Otherwise if you are looking to be near the nightlife, this is the perfect location.', "If you are looking for budget price accommodation which is spotless; well managed with attentive caring staff; right in the centre of the action in hcmc, then look no further.I stayed here for 3 nights with my two sons aged 18 and 20 for the first leg of our Vietnam adventure.Admittedly, the Hong Han is not for everyone. The rooms are located on the five floors above the lobby and there is no lift, therefore strong legs and lungs are required, especially if your room is on the upper floors. The rooms to the front of the hotel are fronting onto one of the busiest and loudest tourist traps in the city which doesn't quieten down until 4am so those with a disposition to noise should probably look elsewhere.The rooms are spacious and well appointed for guesthouse standards. The cooked complimentary breakfast served on the first floor balcony is simple but delicious. The staff will help you any way they can.  We all thoroughly enjoyed our stay and would definitely make a return visit.", "The hotel is very nice. Even though it's in a busy area, I didn't hear the busy city ar night. As soon as you're out of the door, you are in a busy part of town. Just a (15 minute) walk away from the Benh Than markets, the war museum, sky deck etc. Lot's of bars and restaurants just around the corner. Breakfast is quite a lot you can choose different options.Staff is friendly and rooms are big enough and clean. Overall a good place to explore Saign for a few day's.", 'I enjoyed my stay at the hotel. The staff were very very friendly. They were the best staff I had so far!  Though they didn’t have an elevator, our room was at the 3rd or 4th floor (i kind of forgot) but they helped us with our bags. They also helped us book a tour and the location of the hotel was very convenient. :)', 'We only stayed one night but this hotel left an impression on us! The room was clean and surprisingly quite for the location. The staff was very considerate and accomadaing! We highly recommend staying here!', 'The hotel is in the heart of the city with great resturants bars and shops everywhere but once you step inside the hotel doors you leave all the madness and noise behind you and just chill out in this  lovely  little place', 'Location is good. Near resto and walking distance to Ben Than market and Saigon Square. Clean and descent. The staff are polite and very attentive. They made my booking in Mekong tour via KIM Travel which is cheap compare to other. And also, they book me for bus going to cambodia. Breakfast is good.Cons: No elevator. You need to exercise walking the stairs. But, they have a lifting machine incase you have luggage.In recommed this hotel. You get what you pay.', "Pros:- the staff work super hard and are very kind! - location - this can be a pro or con depending on how you look at it...it's in the middle of the action and the bars, restaurants etc., and a pretty good walking distance to many of the major city attractions - close to the first/last stop of the 109 Yellow bus to/from the airport (at 23/9 Park)- the rooms are not new or fancy, but they were comfortable and kept well (ours was quite large)- they close the gate at 11pm, but you can ring the bell at any time and they will open it for youCons:- location (can be a pro or con)...it can get quite loud at night when everyone's out, but we were fine with it. We had a room on the 4th floor at the front of the building and we got over the noise by the second night (or join the fun or use ear plugs:P).- there is no elevator, so expect to get in a good exercise before relaxing in aircon if you're on an upper floor", "Staff are SO nice! Made me feel right at home and helped arranged bus tickets. Room was very spacious and even though it's right off the main backpacker street, you couldn't here any outside noise. Lovely stay, would come again.", "Centrally located in the backpacker area, nice big, clean rooms with a compact ensuite. Friendly staff who use an electric hoist to lift luggage to your floor (you have to walk). The street below is very busy  but we were on the third floor and really didn't notice any noise. Nice little, alfresco breakfast balcony, (it was a tad crowded and service was a bit slow; it seemed everyone wanted an early meal and check out and the poor waitress was managing both.) (Poor girl was run off her feet but continued to smile)", 'The hotel is located in a very lively street with bars, shops and plenty of restaurants, the rooms are quiet, clean and modern. Delicious breakfast is served on a cosy little terrasse on the first floor. But what really makes the difference here is the friendly and very helpful staff, that helped us sort out e very urgent passport problem upon arrival:)', 'Hotel was located at a very convenient location with eateries, bars, and convenience stalls all around. Staff was very friendly and patient and ensured that you had a comfortable stay. Would recommend you to stay at this hotel!', 'we stayed at the hong han for a week and returned for a couple of days prior to our return flight from hcmcthe hotel was exceptionally clean and very efficiently run by friendly and very helpful staff.the rooms we used were light and spacious with good aircon and fans, the roof terrace is a plus for breakfast and for me reading after the kids were in bed.the 11pm curfew was fine for us with kids though party party backpackers would probably find it too restrictive.we travelled saigon dalat bmt and nha trang. and this was the best hotel by a wide margin', 'My second visit to Saigon and I returned to the Hong Han because my previous experience had been so good.  The faces behind the counter may have changed but the service is still the same Located right at the heart of the action, the Hong Han offers great value for money', "Hong Han staff were wonderfully helpful, the rooms were clean, and the hotel was conveniently located. I walked pretty much everywhere.  If you're not looking for anything crazy fancy but totally affordable, then this is a great option. The backpacker street is also convenient with lots of restaurant choices, spas, etc. it's louder at night, but I have to say, even as a light sleeper, I had no trouble sleeping.", '-live high floor will have trouble climbing stairs\r-live low floor may have trouble being interpreted by noise coming from the street\rhard choice.\rhost is helpful. location is the most crazy and popular place in HZM. \rnear Fan Wu Lao Jie.\rnear the Sihn Tourist', 'Cons: A bit noisy from all the bars and general street revelry, also the doorbell ringing all night to let people in is a bit frustratingPros: immaculately clean. Ok sized rooms - not large but big enough. No lift but an ingenious electronic pulley to bring luggage up and down the stairs. Breakfast, coffee, juice very good.Staff so friendly and helpful, knowledgeable about all kinds of travel arrangements and happy to book for you']

hotel name: Khu nghỉ dưỡng Melia Núi Ba Vì (Melia Bavi Mountain Retreat)
address: Ba Vi, Ba Vì, Hà Nội, Việt Nam
reviews: ['Khách sạn nằm ở một vị trí không thể đẹp hơn trong lõi của vườn quốc gia Ba vì. Phòng nghỉ rất tiện nghi với đầy đủ các opt. của một khu nghỉ dưỡng 5 sao. Bữa sáng buffet khá ổn với món phở bò rất đáng thử. Nhân viên khách sạn tương đối thân thiện dễ mến, đặc biệt là em nhân viên tên Hằng ở nhà hàng Tonkin.Điểm trừ duy nhất là bữa tối. Do khu nghỉ dưỡng gần như là biệt lập trong lõi rừng quốc gia Ba vì, nên lựa chọn ăn tối tại nhà hàng của khách sạn gần như là lựa chọn duy nhất. Tôi gọi món gỏi cá hồi và hải sản nấu kiểu Thái. Thực sự khi đồ ăn mang ra tôi hơi thất vọng, món gỏi cá hồi là một mớ lổn nhổn ko rõ đâu là cá hồi nữa, còn món hải sản nấu kiểu Thái thì thực sự là thất vọng, quá mặn, tôm hùm, tôm, cá tuyết (không biết có phải cá tuyết hay là cá chép nữa), mực, vẹm tất cả đều là đồ đông lạnh lâu ngày. Miếng mực thậm chí dai đến mức cảm giác như ăn một miếng cao su. Bữa ăn bao gồm 2 ly vang trắng, 1 đĩa gỏi cá hồi, 1 bát canh hải sản nấu kiểu thái, 2 bát cơm trắng giá gần 2 triệu mà thực sự ăn xong ko thấy có tí chất nào vào người cả 😂😂😂 Rất mong melia cải thiện lại bữa tối tại khu nghỉ dưỡng.', 'Một chỗ nghỉ đáng giá tiền, tiện nghi, tiện ích đầy đủ. Cây xanh, không khí trong lành, thân thiện môi trường', 'Mọi thứ đều tuyệt vời ngoại trừ phòng cách âm kém.', 'Khu nghỉ dưỡng được xây trong rừng nhưng không có cảm giác bị ẩm ướt. Phòng sạch sẽ. Nhân viên thân thiện. Bể bơi nước ấm ngoài trời rất thú vị. Đồ ăn ngon nhưng hơi mắc tiền.', 'vị trí khá xa trung tâm Hà Nội. dịch vụ một số như wifi kém, tiện nghi thấp.', 'Mọi thứ ở đây đều ổn, tuy nhiên khu vực lễ tân khá là nóng, xe điện bố trí chưa hợp lí để khách phải chờ khá lâu ngoài trời nóng, nhân viên lễ tân chưa theo sát và hỗ trợ khách', 'Vị trí đẹp, lạ, không bị đông do còn chưa nhiều người biết tới. Không gian thoáng đãng, khung cảnh hùng vĩ. Bữa sáng đồ ăn khá ngon. Tuy nhiên... resort cần cải thiện mấy điểm sau: 1) khu vực lễ tân check in nóng, chỉ có quạt rất nhẹ ở giữa (khu khách ngồi không có quạt trực tiếp), điều hoà nhân viên bảo có mở mà như không, 2) check in lâu (mình đến chiều chủ nhật mà hơn 2h mới cho vào), 3) không có xe túc túc đưa đi giữa các khu vực trong resort trong khi đó nhà có người già, trẻ nhỏ, lối đi thì dốc, muốn cho cả nhà ra khu vườn chim mà đi bộ xa nên ko đi đc, 4) có xe thăm phế tích lúc 11h lên xe đi một đoạn rồi mà bảo dừng đợi 3-4 khách mới đến đang đợi check in muốn đi cùng, lúc chờ phải dừng xe nên rất nóng trong khi có người cao tuổi trẻ nhỏ (điểm khen là bạn lái xe hơi mập chút rất nhiệt tình nhẹ nhàng), 5) có 4 viên cà phê để cạnh các đồ free (có sẵn máy pha cà phê) nên gây hiểu nhầm là miễn phí, lúc sau bị charge, mọi người lưu ý', 'cực ưng resort này', 'Ok', 'Ưu: giữ cảnh quan tốt, bể nước nóng tốt . Nhược: bể bơi hơi bé , khu tắm tối ẩm , vòi ít nước( cả khu spa), không có dép đi ngoài trời. Trơn trượt vì rêu.', 'Không gian tuyet voi,  nhung nhan vien ko than thien. TV ko hoat dong, nhan vien goi y doi phong nhung khi nhan phong moi la mot bai rac, chua don dep. Kho goi dien lien he le tan, order do rat lau...', 'Nhà mình có đưa ông bà và các con tới , đi khá gần HN và khá là thú vị. Highly recommend', 'Khách sạn khá xinh xắn, nằm gọn trong rừng quốc gia. Nói chung phù hợp với nghỉ dưỡng.', 'Phòng Premium- Cần chuẩn bị thêm 1 đôi dép đi lại  : đi bơi, đi dạo, đi trong nhà vệ sinh ( vì sàn nhà vệ sinh luôn bị ướt do bố trí thoát nước chưa  tốt(...để tránh ướt cho giày dép của khách ( ngoài đôi dép bông đi trong phòng)- Phòng tắm cần ngăn khu vực tắm bằng vòi sen với các khu còn lại ( bồn rửa mặt, khu đi vệ sinh...) bởi vì khi tắm, do lỗ thoát nước bố trí chưa hợp lý nên nước chảy lênh láng ra sàn, rất ướt và trơn trượt.', 'Melia Bavi nằm trong một khu rừng quốc gia, ở độ cao 600m, giữa thiên nhiên hoang dã. Cách không xa hà nội. Có rất nhiều hoạt động cho gia đình và trẻ con. Hồ cá koi rất đẹp, hồ bơi 4 mùa, có thể điều chỉnh nhiệt độ của nước. Điều đặc biệt là resort này còn có cả menu các loại gối nằm cho khách lựa chọn, sàn nhà có thể sưởi ấm vào mùa đông. Nếu có dịp mọi người nên trãi nghiệm, Chắc chắn mình sẽ quay lại đây.', "Gorgeous, mysterious, atmospheric get-away! The pool and paths are beautiful, although the activities provided are not. The spa is overpriced and the masseuses were untrained.Go for the atmosphere and enjoy exploring/experiencing the grounds by yourself - don't expect to be entertained.", 'Great atmosphere, fresh air and beautiful green scenery. A sweet summer escape from the crazy heat and noise of Hanoi. The outdoor pool was heavenly amazing. However the food varieties  and staff service skills were limited especially for a 5-star standard.', 'We enjoyed every moment spent in this place. Everything was gorgeous there starting with cozy bungalows , picturesque surroundings up to nice and welcoming staff!Important!!! STUDY WEATHER FORECAST IN ADVANCE unless you want to spend your time in complete fog!!! In sunny weather you will enjoy your time completely. As far as continental breakfast is concerned I would assess it 4 out of 5.', 'Located in Ba Vi National Park, this resort has a great environment for relax. outside pool is very relaxing. Good buffet breakfast and restaurant. It is far from Ha Noi City (it takes about 1-1.5 hour by car).', "I can't believe there could be this amazing resort in the heart of the national forest Bavi. If you really want to detox, relax and refresh your mind and soul, you need to come to this place. The moment you arrived in the lobby, you feel calm by the atmosphere and the enchanting scent they use. The entire resort is covered by thousands of trees, the room is even designed to blend in nature.  I absolutely enjoyed walking around the place, uphill and downhill to enjoy the fresh air, watching birds, the view of the big lake....Inside the room (deluxe) is very spacious nice as well, with premium wooden furniture and a balcony. Breakfast buffet was a little bit limited in terms of choice, probably because there are only few guests stayed those days. But a la carte menu for lunch and breakfast at the western restaurant was very delicious.  Staff were very polite, helpful and attentive everywhere, at anytime. This is such a gem and Cant wait to come back and have longer stay here."]

hotel name: La Siesta Premium Hàng Bè Hà Nội (Hanoi La Siesta Premium Hang Be)
address: 27 Hang Be, Phố Cổ, Hà Nội, Việt Nam, 10000
reviews: ['Khách sạn đẹp, sạch sẽ. Duy có bồn rửa ở ngoài và tách biệt với phòng tắm nên hơi bất tiện.', 'Diện tích phòng ko lớn nhưng thiết kế rất tinh tế và thông minh. Dịch vụ thì quá tuyệt vời.', 'Ở đây quá tuyệt vời, từ nhân viên đền thiết kế, rất chi tiết từ cái nhỏ nhất.Vị trí rất thuận lợi.', 'giá hợp lý, gần trung tâm, sạch sẽ, nhân viên thân thiện, hỗ trợ khách hàng tốt', 'Mình rất hài lòng về dịch vụ của ks trong thời gian lưu trú. KS đẹp và sạch sẽ, nhân viên nhiệt tình và vị trí đi lại thuận lợi.Sẽ quay lại nếu có dịp ra HN.', 'Trải nghiệm đầu tiên là nhân viên khách sạn khá niềm nở vui vẻ đón khách, nhưng khi check in được thông báo phải dời vào khách sạn khác do hệ thống nước bị hư. Không rõ có thật không nhưng khách sạn mình chuyển qua hơi cũ, trang trí không đẹp. Mình khá thất vọng về khách sạn', 'Khách sạn ngay trung tâm đi lại rất tiện. Nhân viên tạm ổn. Phòng cỏ kính nên rất tối , chăn ga có vẽ không được sạch lắm', 'Dù lúc đến do khách khác không trả phòng đúng giờ và không báo lại bên khách sạn nên mình phải sang ở bên Mã Mây, nhưng cách xử lý của các bạn nhân viên của Siesta rất chuyện nghiệp, xứng đáng 5 sao.', 'Phòng đẹp, nhân viên tốt, gần bờ hồ thuận tiện việc đi lại', 'vi tri thuan tien,phong dep,an sang ok', 'Nhân viên thân thiện, quan tâm đến khách,  đồ ăn ngon, giá hợp lý.', 'Phòng ngủ hơi lạnh cho mùa này. Đã tắt máy lạnh nhưng đêm nằm vẫn lạnh. Phía khách sạn ko có giải pháp nào về việc làm ấm phòng. Sáng hôm sau ngủ dậy ho luôn :(', 'Phục vụ rất tốt , nhân viên nhiệt tình hỗ trợ khách , chỉ có cách âm khá tệ !!!', 'Nhân viên rất thân thiện trong thời gian tôi lưu trú và hỗ trợ tốt trong việc nhận nhận phản hồi và giải quyết về tiếng ồn vào ban đêm do cách âm. Khách sạn tuy thiết kế đẹp nhưng cách âm không tốt.', 'Tôi book phòng loại Excutive view phố Gia Ngư. Nhờ chuyển hộ vali lên phòng trước, 6h chiều sẽ quay lại nhận phòng! Và khi nhận phòng thì không phải loại phòng Excutive view phố Gia Ngư tôi đã book trước đó, hành lý cũng không có sẵn trong phòng. Nhân viên tiếp tân ban đầu lươn lẹo “nội thất tương tự Excutive”, lúc sau lại khẳng định là “đúng loại phòng tôi đã đặt, nhưng nếu khách không hài lòng sẽ chuyển phòng khác vào sáng mai”. Thật sự không hài lòng cách làm việc của khách sạn này lắm!!!', 'Ksan đẹp, vị trí tốt, nhân viên thân thiện', 'Chỗ ở đẹp, giao thông thuận tiện', 'Khách sạn mới đi vào hoạt động có không gian sạch sẽ. Giá cả hợp lý. Nhân viên nhiệt tình. Tôi sẽ trở lại đây....', 'Khách sạn ngay trung tâm. Nhân viên cực kỳ dễ thương & thân thiệt . Phòng đẹp & nội thất đầy đủ', 'Khách sạn đẹp, mới, sang trọng, vị trí thuận tiện']

hotel name: KHÁCH SẠN HÀ NỘI ROYAL PALACE 2 (HANOI ROYAL PALACE HOTEL 2)
address: Phố Cổ, 95 Hàng Bông, Hoàn Kiếm, Phố Cổ, Hà Nội, Việt Nam
reviews: ['Khách sạn mới, phòng đẹp đầy đủ tiện nghi. Nhân viên thân thiện, sẽ quay lại trong chuyến công tác tiếp theo.', 'Khách sạn mới tốt, nhân viên thân thiện. Nằm trong trung tâm có nhiều món ngon để lựa chọn.', 'Chủ và nhân viên khách sạn cực kỳ thân thiện và hỗ trợ khách hàng tối đa!', 'Mình rất hay đi công tác  tại Hà Nội, thường mỗi lần ra mình hay chọn một nơi khác nhau để ở nhưng lần này mình lựa chọn khách sạn Royal palace ấn tượng cực mạnh. Phòng đẹp giá tốt mà địa điểm di chuyển ra Hồ Gươm cực kì gần luôn chỉ 5p đi bộ là tới. Các bạn nhân viên cũng hỗ trợ mình rất tận tình. Nói chung cực kì thích và sẽ quay lại.', 'Tất cả các ban đều rất thân thiện và nhiệt tình, cho thuê xe máy và đổi xe cũng rất thoải mái mà không hề có bất kì yêu cầu hay làm khó gì mình. Mọi thứ đều sạch sẽ và gọn gàng từ sảnh lobby cho đến phòng mình ở. Cảm ơn khách sạn Royal palace đã cho mình một kì nghỉ tuyệt vời.', 'Chỗ nghỉ sach sẽ , nhân viên thân thiện, chúng tôi rất hài lòng, nếu quay lại Hà nội tôi sẽ chọn hotel này.', 'Đánh giá cao về khách sạn này: từ nhân viên, đến vị trí khách sạn và dịch vụ mọi thứ đều trên cả tuyệt vời. Khuyến khích các bạn đến đây.', 'Phòng mới đẹp, gầ hồ hoàn kiếm, nhà thờ, và các địa điểm nổi tiếng hà nội.', 'Nhân viên vui vẻ, nhiệt tình. Phòng mới, sạch sẽ, thiết kế bát mắt. Nói chung đánh giá cao khách sạn này.', 'Vị trí trung tâm phố cổ, gần các địa điểm nổi tiếng của hà nội. Phòng đẹp, đầy đủ tiện nghi, thiết kế đẹp mắt. Nhân viên thân thiện nhiệt tình, sẽ quay lại đây thường xuyên.', 'Khách sạn sạch đẹp, phòng decor đẹp, giá rất hợp lý, trung tâm phố cổ hà nội.', 'Phòng sang, sạch sẽ, trung tâm', 'Gia đình cảm thấy thích khách sạn này, lần sau sẽ tiếp tục ở đây.', 'Căn phòng rất tiện nghi, sạch sẽ và ấm cúng. Bạn có thể tìm thấy hầu hết mọi thứ bạn cần trong phòng. Vị trí tuyệt vời, trung tâm phố cổ.', 'Phòng sạch, đẹp, giá hợp lý, ở trung tâm phố cổ nên đi đâu cũng tiện. Nhân viên thân thiện, giúp đỡ khách tận tình. Nhược điểm duy nhất là khăn không trắng, xỉn màu cần phải thay mới.', 'Phòng tiện nghi, đẹp, rất sạch sẽ, rộng rãi. Không có gì để phàn nàn về phòng nghỉ. Vị trí rất tốt, dễ dàng đi bộ khắp khu phố cổ. Cực kì hài lòng.', 'Sạch sẽ, đẹp và tiện nghi và giá rất tốt.', 'Giá hợp lý  nhất so với các khách sạn cùng địa điểm và chất lượng. Sẽ quay lại.', 'Phòng đẹp, vị trí trung tâm.', 'Nằm khu vực trung tâm, thuận tiện di chuyển. Khách sạn sạch sẽ. Dịch vụ tốt.']

hotel name: Khách Sạn The Oriental Jade (The Oriental Jade Hotel)
address: 92 & 94 phố Hàng Trống, Quận Hoàn Kiếm, Hà Nội, Việt Nam, 100000
reviews: ['Giá tốt', 'Khách sạn ngay trung tâm, cách hồ Gươm vài trăm mét, xung quanh nhiếu quán ăn.Khách sạn sạch sẽ, tiện nghi, nhân viên thân thiện.', 'Ngay sát hồ gươm, nhà thờ lớn,  vị trí thuận lợi để đi loanh hoanh ăn uống, giải trí...là một trong vài khách sạn đáng ở nhất lúc này.', 'Ks ngay phố cổ rất tiện.  Nv thân thiện,  dễ thương.Cách âm rất kém.', 'tốt', 'tốt lắm', 'Điểm cộng lớn nhất của The Oriental Jade là ở ngay trung tâm của trung tâm thủ đô Hà Nội, khi mà chỉ cần đi bộ 1 dãy phố là ra Hồ Gươm. Xung quanh là rất nhiều streets food, bạn có thể ăn uống thỏa mái mà không cần đi xe, hay chỉ cần đi bộ 100m là ra Hồ Gươm. Phòng rất sạch sẽ, và mới. Nhân viên rất dễ thương!Tôi sẽ giới thiệu cho bạn bè hoặc sẽ quay lại nghỉ vào lần sau khi có dịp đi Hà Nội!', 'Vị trí ngay phố cổ gần nhiều nơi ăn uống. Khách sạn phòng hơi nhỏ tuy nhiên rất đáng tiền nếu bạn đi du lịch Hà nội', 'This hotel is beautiful. Brand new with a roof top pool that had the best view of the lake and surroundings. The location was great and the staff were amazing. They all spoke excellent English and could not do enough for us. They made us feel very special and went above and beyond. We will definitely stay here again.', 'Hotel new. Need to keep up with the cleaning. If not it will soon be dirty and unclean. I am very picky with cleaning.', 'I booked this hotel last-minute and it was one of few available options. It\'s a few minutes walking from the lake, right in the heart of the Old Quarter. I was "upgraded" to a room with windows, although the view from the windows is nothing worth bragging about. However, the kindness of the staff and their continuous willingness to make every effort to ensure you have a pleasant stay is one I haven\'t experienced thus far. My first night there I had no time for dinner and starved at 11PM, called reception - who offered to get KFC or what not, after which I requested something local. About 15 minutes later the bellboy knocked and gave me one of the best tasting chicken noodle soups I have had (45k for the soup, 25k for the service) which outmatched all the >100k foods I had prior to that in restaurants (not necessarily because I was starving). The team is very young and very kind, and made up whatever may be lacking in the room (which to me was none).', 'Good', 'Staffs are great and helpful, Maybe provide a better baby cot is a good idea.', 'Brand new hotel. Prime location. 5 mins walk from the Lake and the night market.. Staff is responsive and very attentive. All in a lovely hotel with all the benefits of a large chain hotel but with a boutique feel. Service was excellent on all levels', 'The front desk people and managers were all nice and very helpful. The breakfast was great and the airport transportation service was good and the price is reasonable ( cheaper than the taxi we got from the airport) As it is a new hotel, everything was just so tidy and clean. The location is the best. You can easily walk to the lake or the night market within 1-2 mins. It was a wonderful experience to stay with this hotel.', 'Everything is perfect,  clean and comfortable, staffs are nice and helpful. Highly recommended.', 'buffet was out of this world!!!!', 'Fantastic location, great breakfast, helpful staff,  Stay Here!', 'Perfect hotel!!!', 'just avoid the spa, it was like the one staff there had no idea what was going on. For the rest , as they work slow coz reopening : no room service for food, and breakfast limited.  But staff tries its best to accommodate. .']

address: 83A Lý Thường Kiệt, Quận Hoàn Kiếm, Quận Hoàn Kiếm, Hà Nội, Việt Nam
reviews: ['Ở các khách sạn sang trọng, du khách thường có cảm giác là sẽ được phục vụ tất cả các thứ (từ những thứ nhỏ nhất) - tôi hơn ngạc nhiên vì khi cần cạo râu lại không thể đựoc, không có dao cạo trong phòng, cũng không có bán ở quầy phục vụ???Nhân viên phục vụ nhiệt tình, chuyên nghiệp nhưng sẽ tốt hơn nếu các bạn sử dụng tiếng Việt khi giao tiếp với người Việt', 'Một kỳ nghỉ đẹp tại thủ đô Hà nội, được đi tham quan phố cổ, thưởng thức các món ăn ngon và cảm thấy thật sự thỏai mái khi mỗi tối dạo bước trên những con đường thân quen.\r\rHà nội thật sự đáng yêu và thanh bình', 'Chúng tôi đã có một kỳ nghỉ tuyệt vời tại khách sạn. Chúng tôi đã dùng bữa tối tại nhà hàng của khách sạn, món ăn ở đây thật tuyệt vời. Nếu lần sau ra Hà Nội, tôi sẽ tiếp tục ở lại khách sạn Movenpick', 'Chung toi da co nhung ngay luu tru noi day rat thoai Mai, khach San rat dep va dat chuan! hotel name: Hanoi La Siesta Hotel and Spa
address: 94 Mã Mây, Hoàn Kiếm, Hà Nội, Phố Cổ, Hà Nội, Việt Nam, 10000
reviews: ['Khách sạn rất tốt~', 'Rất tốt', 'Rất hài lòng', 'Khách sạn ngay trung tâm phố cổ. Ấn tượng nhất khi đến ks vẫn là thái độ thân thiện, nhiệt tình của nhân viên tiếp tân. Phòng rộng, sạch đẹp. Sẽ quay lại khi có dịp!', 'Khách sạn tốt', 'Phòng hơi nhỏ nhưng bù lại chất lượng và dịch vụ rất tốt. Vị trí thuận tiện', 'Địa điểm ở Mã Mây không hoạt động nhưng cũng không báo lại cho khách biết để khách có lựa chọn khác. Tuy nhiên ks cũng bố trí khách sang địa điểm khác ở 32 Lò Sủ trong cùng hệ thống, mặc dù qui mô không bằng ở Mã Mây nhưng cũng chấp nhận được. Các đánh giá ở đây là dành cho 32 Lò Sủ', 'Nhân viên FO và F&B chuyên nghiệp, nhiệt tình, vui vẻ, sẵn sàng hỗ trợ khách tối đa.', 'Khách sạn đẹp quá. Nhân viên vô cùng dễ thương, luôn chăm chú vào công việc và chăm sóc khách rất kĩ. Tất cả những gì các bạn nhân viên làm với chúng tôi đều vượt ngoài mong đợi.Các con của chúng tôi nhất định lần sau đến Hà Nội chỉ ở khách sạn La Siesta thôi!', 'Tốt', 'La Siesta hôtel and Spa was being renovated so we stayed at the newly renovated La Siesta Premium which is just a few metres away and was a lovely French colonial style hotel with great rooftop bar. We were a family of four with two teenagers. It was right in the middle of the old quarter. The service and location was excellent.', "They are very kind and helpful. They can help me whenever I need.I wanna go back to this hotel when I go to Hanoi definitely.Unfortunately,air condition doesn't work one day. But their service is perfection.Should go visit the hotel:)", 'Absolutely amazing, beautiful hotel and lovely staff. Everyone makes you feel welcome and personalizes your stay. 100% would recommend to anyone visiting Vietnam.', "There are many La Siesta's located in the Old Quarter of Hanoi but this location in particular was extra special due to the wonderful staff!  They were very accommodating and took care of our group which included my spouse and mother with special TLC.  We stayed a total of 5 nights with the first stay being 4 nights.  We had reservations for our return from Ha Long Bay & Hoi An and they were so great to securely hold our purchased painting and luggage.  Prior to our return, Scarlett (who was amazing) reached out to see when our departure flight would be to help with Airport arrangements!  What a surprise, you typically do not find attention to detail unless you stay at a 5 or 6 star hotel and even then, La Siesta rivaled their customer service!  I should also add that when we first arrived, the AC in our assigned family room was being repaired and the manager, I believe her name was Tran offered another upgraded room along with complimentary spa sessions for all 3 of us!", 'I have stayed at this hotel 3 out of 4 times that I was in Hanoi.  The rooms are beautifully appointed, and the food at Red Bean is of high level. Last but not least, in fact the most important, is their team of lovely and professional staff. Well trained, and  always anticipative.', "Room facilities are relatively new compared to other cheaper hotels of the same range, with an amazing service. Breakfast buffet is excellent, with an addition of a menu to order from. Hotel concierge personnel treat each guest as an individual and gives personalised service. Polite and helpful, they will try to cater to our needs whenever possible. It's amazing how they recognise their guests and are able to give updates on our requests (like tours) the moment we stepped into the hotel.", 'We booked a 4N stay from 18-22Mar to celebrate our wedding anniversary. After reading all the good reviews about the hotel, we decide to give it a try.And true enough, the hotel service is excellent. The staffs are friendly and helpful. The service quality is consistent thru out all the staffs. Location is also very centralised with many eateries and restaurants all within walking distance.Would recommend the hotel for their excellent service n location.  :)', 'This place is amazing and the staff are all excellent. They are attentive to every need.', 'Upon getting out of airport immigration, we were received by hotel staff and were taken to the hotel lobby without worrying the surcharge of taxi driver.  We were then greeted with a welcome drink before being informed of room upgrade to a duplex room on the top floor. The room was decorated with rose petal and welcome fruit plate. It was worth noting that hotel staff, Kaylee worked professionally and gave us useful advice on Ha Long Bay trip and so on.  She deserved a commendation as well.  In general, staying at the hotel is highly recommended to anyone.', 'Staff are very polite and willing to help no matter on travel recommendation or room late-out request, they provided good advice. They are also very sweet as it was my birthday, they gave us a big surprise to make the travelling more unforgettable . Highly recommended if you are going to Hanoi for relaxation!']

reviews: ['Địa điểm, dịch vụ, thái độ đều tốt', 'Đây là khách sạn tốt nhất, đẹp nhất, tiện nghi nhất và chuyên nghiệp nhất mà tôi từng biết đến. reviews: ['Ngày 9/7/2019 Mình đặt phòng bên Agoda Khách sạn Halais Hotel  2 đêm check in ngày 17/7/2019 check out ngày 19/7/2019 .Mã xác nhận đặt phòng bên Agoda 379980269 Giá phòng Superior Double 1 đêm  900k hai đêm là 1800k , thanh toán tiền tại khách sạnĐến ngày 17/7/2019 trên chuyến đường dài chạy ô tô hơn 400km đến khách sạn halais Hotel lúc 3 giờ chiều . Mình vào khách sạn gặp hai cô tiếp tân và đưa mã đặt phòng bên Agoda , thì hai cô tiếp tân thông báo với mình khách sạn hết phòng , Kêu mình hủy đặt phòng Bên Agoda . Giúp mình tìm phòng khác và dắt mình đến 1 khách sạn nhỏ 1 sao bảo 900k 1 đêm 2 đêm là 1800k và kêu mình thanh toán , mình không chịu và bỏ đi Chứng tỏ hai cô tiếp tân khách sạn Halais tính lừa đảo mình , Mong Agoda làm việc lại Halais Hotel ,để những người khách sau không rơi vào cảnh giống như mình , đi du lich Hà Nội lần đầu mà bị cảnh như vậy thật là thất vọng về khách sạn Halais , mất cả cảm tình với Thủ đô hà nội  và nên tránh khách sạn Halais khi đến hà nội ,', 'Khách sạn đẹp.', 'Sạch sẽ,book qua agoda giá ổn,nv nhiệt tình. Mùi phòng hôi', 'Tuyệt vời', 'Tốt', 'Hiện tại, Chất lượng & giá cả hợp lý.', 'Khách sạn khá tốt, ổn, đầy đủ tiện nghiNếu bạn không phải đi xe cá nhân đến thì rất ổn, nhưng nếu bạn đi ô tô đến thì không có chỗ để xe ô tô, phải đỗ xa 100m và mất phí gửi xe khá là cao. Mình cũng không thích bảo vệ của khách sạn, chưa được chuyên nghiệp lắm.', 'Thực sự tệ ! Khách sạn tầm thấp mà giá trên trời ! Không xứng đáng', 'Gia đình tôi có 2 ngày nghỉ ở Ks rất ok, tiền đi lại, ăn sáng ổn.', 'Tôi rất hài lòng', 'Khách sạn 4 sao rất đầy đủ tiện nghi và hiện đại. Phòng ốc dọn dẹp sạch sẽ mỗi ngày. Nhân viên và dọn phòng hỗ trợ khách rất nhiệt tình. Gần trung tâm và nhiều hàng quán ăn uống, gần bến xe buýt đi sân bay.', 'Hotel vị trí rất trung tâm, ngay bên dưới có Highlands coffee. Mình ưu tiên chọn halais khi tới Hà Nội.Gần khách sạn có bến xe buýt Vietjet để ra sân bay. Xung quanh nhiều chợ, cửa hàng ăn uống, di chuyển tới hồ hoàn kiếm rất gần.', 'Tốt', 'Ks rat tot.co cho de xe o to.toi rat hai long', 'Khách sạn ở vị trí thuận lợi, gần trạm bus ra sân bay của Vietjet và gần trung tâm, nhiều địa điểm ăn uống và vui chơi (Vincom, hồ hoàn kiếm, v.v). reviews: ['Khách sạn đẹp, sạch, nhân viên lịch sự, chuyên nghiệp và bạn nam lễ tân tối rất nhiệt tình giúp khách mọi yêu cầu với nụ cười thân thiện, rất hài lòng. Thích màu xanh và decor của ks. Tuy nhiên,  toilet của ks thì xả nước ít và chậm, phải nhấn 5s do chế độ  tiết kiệm nước của anh Chủ tịch nên hơi bất tiện nhưng ko có vấn đề gì do phố cổ có lúc nước khan khiếm là bt. Nói chung mọi thứ đều rất tuyệt vời với giá tiền book phòng', 'Các bạn nhân viên nhiệt tình, đồ ăn ngon, phòng sạch sẽ, từng chi tiết trong phòng được chau chuốt Kỹ lưỡng. Nói chung rất hài lòng khi ở đây. Nhất định lần sau ra sẽ nghỉ tại khách sạn này. Hy vọng mạng sẽ mạnh hơn nhé.', 'Khách sạn có vị trí thuận lợi để tham quan, phòng đầy đủ tiện nghi sạch sẽ, món ăn chưa đa dạng nhưng ngon, nhân viên phục vụ nhiệt tình cởi mở.', 'Nhân viên vô cùng nhiệt tình và lễ phép!', 'Vị trí thuận lợi, phòng hơi nhỏ, trang trí nội thất chưa có bản sắc lắm', 'Địa điểm rất trung tâm, phòng ổn hơn so với giáĐiểm trừ là chỗ đậu xe hơi rất xa', 'Rất đánh giá cao nhân viên', 'Tốt', 'Khách sạn ko đúng với tầm cỡ 4 sao. Quản lý ko tốt và yếu kém, giá phòng thì ko rõ ràng. Đặt ở một nơi, dẫn khách đến một nẻo. Gọi đường dây line của hotel này thì chẳng ai bắt máy.', 'Nv ở đây hướng dẫn khách huỷ phòng trên agoda để lách phí trả agoda', 'Tốt nhưng mạnnhgi kém', 'Mình có lẽ là một trong những khách đầu tiên tới ở tại cơ sở mới 22 Lò Sũ của khách sạn, có vài nhận xét như sau:- Về vị trí: nằm đối diện khách sạn cũ, nên sự thuận tiện là tương đương - 10/10- Về view: khách sạn cũ có phòng view mặt đường thì khách sạn này phòng ko có view hoặc view nhìn ra ngách nhỏ (entry của khách sạn) - 5/10- về nhân viên: thân thiện, nhiệt tình, 10/10- độ sạch sẽ: 10/10, sạch, ko có gì để phàn nàn- về cơ sở vật chất: Khách sạn dù xin contact trước nhưng cũng ko báo cho mình về việc khách sạn cũ đóng cửa. Phòng không có dép đi trong nhà, sữa tắm/dầu gội (sau khi xin nvien thì các bạn ý đem lên), không có chỗ treo đồ (tủ để đồ nhỏ và lại đựng chăn), phòng mình đặt trên agoda là có ban công thì được đổi thành phòng 2 giường ngủ ko ban công cho 3 NL (rộng rãi nhưng ko đúng phòng mình đặt). - 5/10Tổng hợp: chưa that su hài lòng nhưng mình tin là khách sạn sẽ làm tốt hơn sau khi đi vào hoạt động ổn định.  Chỉ có điều vị trí và view phòng giờ sẽ không được như xưa.', 'KS nên chọn khi đến HN', 'This was my forth trip to Hanoi, but first time to stay at Hanoi Emerald Waters H&S.  The staff were all very friendly and helpful (which seems to be common in Hanoi).  The location makes it very convenient for getting around all the popular areas of the city.  They also have a nice breakfast that was included with the room.  Good selection and choice of eggs and other custom dishes.Another recommendation - the reception set us up with a free guided tour with two nice university students who did a great job taking us around and explaining things.', 'Clean, close to Ho Guom, the staffs are friendly', 'Overall nice in location, room size, breakfast, services and budget, etc.', 'Very friendly staff', 'Staff were very kind!', 'The hotel was clean the breakfast was very good and the location in the old quarter was good. However we wanted to leave a few days early to continue our travels and the hotel insisted we pay for the nights we were not there. Only after contacting Agoda for their help was it arrange for us to only pay for the nights we stay there. Ridiculous that the hotel would not allow us to leave and still pay for time we did not occupy the hotel .  One electrical outlet could not plug-in lamp by the bed for two phone chargers  anywhere else in the room    A lot of compromises for relatively high price hotel', 'The hotel is strategically located at the heart of the Old Quarter which is quite convenient as the famous attractions such as the Hoan Kiem Lake, Water Puppet Show, Hoa Lu Prison, the Opera House in French quarters, and many other famous restaurants in the Old Quarters are all within walking distance. The hotel staff contacted us prior to our visit via email for airport transfers to-from the hotel, and recommended some nice Halong/Sapa/Tam Coc tours at fair price, which is extremely helpful for travellers like me who wish to have a hassle free trip.  The hotel is not very big and does not have a lot of facilities execept for Spa and restaurant, but the room was clean, cosy and living spaces were definitely sufficient for two persons, although sound isolation is not that good and you can literally hear sound room the corridor.  Housekeeping is excellent and decorated the bed with flowers and towels everyday. Overall,  great value for money and excellent service! Highly recommended!']

hotel name: Khách Sạn & Spa Silk Collection (Silk Collection Hotel & Spa)
address: 58 Hàng Gai, Quận Hòan Kiếm, Phố Cổ, Hà Nội, Việt Nam, 70000
reviews: ['Khách sạn khá tiện nghi, nhân viên thân thiện , chu đáo!', 'Quản lý và NV tại đây rất thân thiện', 'Nước nóg bị hư trog thời gian ở', 'Gần hồ gươm và quán ăn. Nhân viên vui vẻ nhiệt tình.', 'Khách sạn có vị trí gần hồ gươm, trung tâm quận hoàn kiếm, nhân viên thân thiện và trợ giúp tốt. Sẽ quay lại khách sạn này trong chuyến du lịch tới.', 'Mọi thứ đều ổn, trừ việc 2 hôm mình ở lại thì khách sạn có vấn đề với nước nóng nên không trọn vẹn lắm', 'Khá tốt nhưng nếu ko mua đồ uống mặc dù bạn là khách của khách sạn những cũng không được ngồi trên sky vả và sẽ bị nhân viên mời xuống cái này thấy quá buồn cười', 'Vị trí trong khu Phố Cổ, nhân viên thân thiện, phòng đẹp, tiện nghi và sạch sẽ. Di chuyển dễ dàng đến mọi nơi.', 'Trong khu vực phố cổ Hà nội khó mà tìm được khách sạn như vậy, rất sạch sẽ, điạ điểm thuận lợi, đồ ăn sáng ngon, nhân viên rất chuyên nghiệp và thân thiện. Thank you so much.', 'The staffs were really friendly and helpful. Only feedback for improvement will be the room service switch in the room. Once you remove your hotel card, the lights for room service is no longer there, which should not be the case.', 'We stayed here for just one night when our Ha Long Bay cruise was cancelled and the staff was so wonderful. The room was clean, the views were awesome and it was very comfortable. I would definitely recommend.', "Beautiful hotel with perfect location in Old Quarter, close to weekend night market (food + shopping) and pond (great for jogging). We're greeted by Ms Lan who is very nice and provided us useful info in Hanoi. Breakfast included was good (their pho is a must-eat), upgraded to bigger rooms with early check-in.  We tried massages at the hotel spa one night but service was below expectation and not professional (some are freelance masseuses). We talked to Ms Lan about that the next morning and she quickly escalated the case to hotel manager Tony. Tony is efficient to look into our case and offered us options as compensation to rectify. Appreciated their understanding, sincerity and flexibility. Despite the spa experience, everything is recommendable and we will be happy to stay there again. There is also water leakage for shower place in the rooms due to the design but Tony already noted and we understood this is an issue for all rooms which fixing it will take time.", 'Bathroom needs to be fixed. The glass door is a bit dangerous and makes people cant move much.', 'Superb breakfastPerfect locationVery nice staffNice designSkybar with a stunning viewOnly problem:   In our room there was a bad WIFI (it was the last room in the corridor on the 7th floor, probably far from the router....the wifi was very good in the common areas of the hotel)', 'Unfortunately I got no window room. It was felt like a prison.', 'Good location easy to walk nearby attractions...so many stalls around near to lake night market..extremely clean...delicious breakfast...jz superior room no window and abit small but ok for afew days....glass door in toilet made abit uncomfortable..especially if u coming with friends...overall excellent', 'We had to check out early and very suddenly due to a family emergency; the staff were very understanding and helped us cancel our day-trip package as well as arranged for transportation to the airport. During our short stay, the staff were always ready to answer any questions we had about Hanoi. The rooms were comfortable and were well-maintained. Location was good as well, with most of the key attractions in the old quarter within walking distance.', 'Location best to none. All the staff (front desk, restaurant) wonderful. To recommend the place.', 'Beautiful room, nice view, friendly staff. I was really comfortable when I stayed here', 'The room was good, perfectly clean and the bed soft for Asia.  The staff were fantastic, especially the breakfast staff. Overall a great hotel in an excellent location.']

hotel name: Khách Sạn & Spa Hà Nội L'Heritage Centre (Hanoi L'Heritage Centre Hotel & Spa)
address: Số 14A, Phố Lương Văn Can, Phường Hàng Đào, Quận Hòan Kiếm, Phố Cổ, Hà Nội, Việt Nam, 10000
reviews: ['Nhân viên của khách sạn các bạn rất thân thiện, vui vẻ và luôn hổ trợ chúng tôi rất nhiệt tình, Khâu vệ sinh của ks cũng khá tốtBuffet sáng hơi ít món, nhưng cũng tạm ổnVị trí thuận tiện đi lại trong khu phố cổTôi sẽ quay lại đây vào dịp gần nhấtCảm ơn các bạn vì góp phần giúp gia đình chúng tôi có 1 kì nghỉ tại Hà Nội trọn ven', 'Khách sạn có vị trí quá trung tâm, đi ra các tuyến phố chính đều quá gần, bạn có thể đi khoảng 40m để ra hồ gươm, hay đêm đến chỉ cần 20m lượn lờ chợ đêm, hay ngồi uống bia mực ngấm phố xá hà nội. Nhân viên khách sạn nhiệt tình, lịch sự, phòng ốc sạch sẽ. Duy chỉ có 1 điểm trừ đó là buffe sáng đồ ăn không ngon', 'Vị trí khách sạn nằm tại trung tâm phố cổ,thuận tiện đi lại, rất gần hồ Hoàn Kiếm và chợ Đêm, nhân viên nhiệt tình , thân thiện, ăn sáng và dịch vụ tốt, phòng thoáng mát , mới ... lần tới tôi sẽ quay trở lại và ở khách sạn này.', 'Gần trung tâm, nhân viên nhiệt tình.', 'Cảm thaya rất hài lòng nhân viên rất dễ thương', 'Khách sạn đẹp , trung tâm', 'Khách sạn tọa lạc giữa trung tâm phố cổ, cách hồ Hoàn Kiếm và chợ đêm khoảng 100m, phòng mới sạch sẽ, nhân viên thân thiện.Ăn sáng tự chọn phong phú, giá cả hợp lý.', 'Nhân viên ks nhiệt tình, nhưng phòng bụi bẩn, giặt là chưa chuyên nghiệp.', 'phòng nhỏ không đúng như trên Agoda mô tả, các phòng cách âm không tốt, phòng bên cạnh nói chuyện có thể nghe thấy rõ, nhân viên thân thiện', 'Vị trí tốt,  gần hết tất cả mọi nơi. Có thể đi bộ ra Hồ Gươm.Buổi sáng ăn ngon, tôi hài lòng.Nhưng phòng bé hơn so với suy nghĩ của tôi.', "Điểm cộng tuyệt đối của Hanoi L'Heritage Centre Hotel là nhân viên rất thân thiện, nhiệt tình, chu đáo với du khách. Khách sạn làm vệ sinh phòng hằng ngày và rất sạch. Điểm tôi còn thấy phiền là hành lang giữa hai dãy phòng hẹp nên một số du khách đi lại nói chuyện rất ồn ào, cách âm chưa tốt.", 'Ưu: vị trí tốt, sạch sẽ, ấm cúng, giá chấp nhậnKhuyết: bữa ăn sáng cần cải thiện về chất lượng', 'vi tri thuan loi', 'Mỗi khi về nươc tôi đều ở khách sạn Hanoi Lheritage Centre, Khách sạn trung tâm phố cổ, nhân viên thân thiện, phòng sạch sẽ.', 'Nhân viên thân thiện,nhiệt tình. Phòng đẹp, sạch, vị trí thuận tiện đi lại .', 'Tôi đã ở khách sạn Hanoi Lheritage Centre 2 lần, rất ấn tượng về phong cách phục vụ của nhân viên , phòng rất sạch sẽ, gần phố đi bộ, chợ đêm, hồ Hoàn Kiếm. Ăn sáng tự chọn phong phú.', 'Khách sạn vị trí đẹp, nhân viên lịch sự thân thiện. Tuy nhiên thì dịch vụ dọn phòng quá kém, luôn quên bổ xung dầu gội, sữa tắm trong phòng. Điện thoại thì hỏng không kết nối được lễ tân. Ăn sáng không ngon, chất lượng đồ ăn, tay nghề nấu kém.', 'Excellent location at the edge of the Old Quarter, but close enough to walk to more busy tourist areas. The staff is outstanding. Very helpful and courteous. We stayed last year, and returned because we had such a nice experience. Breakfast was excellent as well.', 'This was a great find. An amazing hotel and excellent value for money. The staff were all so friendly they speak very good English and just could not do enough for us. The hotel is perfectly located within the vibrant old quarter area and close to the lovely Hoan Kiem lake. We booked a deluxe room which was a good size very comfortable with a king size bed and with all the facilities you would expect from more expensive hotels. The breakfast food was excellent with a good variety of everything you could want including waitress service for freshly cooked items such as pancakes an omelettes. Would highly recommend and definitely use again.', 'Great hotel location and helpful staff.  It felt like home, the staff were incredible and the bed soft, the area perfect and the hospitality unmatched in our whole three week tour of Vietnam. Love it here.']

hotel name: Khách Sạn & Spa Babylon Premium (Babylon Premium Hotel & Spa)
address: 5-7 Hang Hom, Hoan Kiem, Phố Cổ, Hà Nội, Việt Nam, 10000
reviews: ['Lễ tân làm khó khách book phòng qua Agoda', 'Khách sạn đẹp sạch sẽ gần trung tâm nhân viên nhiệt tình thân thiện. Rất tốt 👍🏻', 'Trong khu phố cổ địa điểm rất thuận lợi để đi thăm quan', 'Mình book phòng Family.Nhân viên dễ thương, phòng đẹp, sạch sẽ.Sẽ tiếp tục ở đây khi có dịp ra Hà Nội.', 'Phòng sạch, đẹp, ngay phố cổ , nhân viên quá nhiệt tình', 'nv rất chu đáo nhiệt tình, ks đẹp và mới , vị trí thuận lợi', "Everything's good there. Recommend to all for staying there", 'My room was clean and cozy, the staffs were very helpful. Great location btw.', 'Good location. Nice staffs.', 'I stayed here for 4 days and was very satisfied. The room was clean and staff was helpful. The location is perfect, only minutes to Hoan Kiem lake.', 'Very good', 'a newly built hotel located in the old town of hanoi, takes just 7m to go to Hoan Kiem lake, room is new and clean but a little bit tidy.Staff is friendly.', 'Staffs are nice, hotel is located in the Quarter  Town,. Street food around the hotel.Have a great stay at this hotel', 'Great staff and manager was so professional and helpful. This is how a hotel should be run :) room very clean and quiet and bed comfy and breakfast was lovely.', 'Babylon Premium Hotel was closed when I arrived so they got me a room (upgraded) in their sister hotel Babylon Garden Hotel and Spa. Reception was smooth and the staffs can speak English well. Very friendly and helpful. The staffs help us checking the available tour (most tours were shut down due to Covid 19) and tirelessly updating us of the current condition.We were upgraded to Premium Twin room which was super clean and spacious for us. Bed was comfortable and we had a good night sleep. Breakfast was sufficient buffet and alacarte. Location is also perfect, 5 minutes walk to Hoen Kiem Lake. Very safe area if u happen to go back late at night. We had a great stay. Recommended!!!', 'The best service from the hotel staff especially Sarah. The room was clean and comfortable. We stayed for 5 days and the breakfast was good! Will definitely stay at the same hotel when I go back to Hanoi.', 'Had a chance to stay at this amazing hotel in Old Quarter Hanoi for 3 nights and it was beyond our expectation. The location is great, near many good local restaurants, cafes and Circle K minimart, walkable distance from pretty much  highlight in Hanoi, the Hoan Kiem lake, Beer corner, night market, Bus stops (from and to the airport). The room was new, clean and had comfortable bed. Breakfast was good. Mr. Henry, the hotel manager and all staffs are very friendly, attentive and polite, with positive vibe and service mind. Would come back again if we visit Hanoi.', 'Extremely helpfull staff, rich tastefull breakfast with buffet and a la Carte menu, nicely decorated rooms, spacious bathroom.', 'Very nice and friendly staff... definitely a good choice in the old quarter.', 'We spent a couple of days in the old hanoi town, the hotel was perfect. Very nice staff, rooms were perfectly clean and we slept super well. would definitely recommend.']

hotel name: La Sinfonia del Rey Hotel and Spa
address: Hàng Dầu, Quận Hoàn Kiếm, Hà Nội, Việt Nam
reviews: ['Nội thất khách sạn mới, đẹp, thiết kế ấn tượng. Trà chào mừng rất ngon, nhân viên lịch sự và nhiệt tình. Vị trí ko thể trung tâm hơn, quầy bar trên cao view đẹp, đồ uống ok. Điểm trừ nhỏ là cách âm chưa thực sự tốt, tiếng ồn ngoài hành lang vang vào phòng khá rõ và ks ko có hầm để xe.', 'Phòng khách sạn ở thoải mái, ăn sáng ngon, thức ăn tuy ít món nhưng tươi và vừa miệng. Rất gần phố đi bộ và hồ hoàn kiếm.', 'Mọi thứ đều tuyệt vời', 'Vị trí khách sạn ngay Hồ Gươm, thuận tiện cho khách muốn thưởng thức phố đi bộ cuối tuầnPhòng đẹp, sạch sẽ và tiện nghi.Đặc biệt nhân viên vô cùng thân thiện, dễ thương, còn upgrade phòng miễn phí cho tôi do còn phòng trống. Xin cảm ơn các bạn', 'Đây là khách sạn tốt nhất khu phố cổ mà tôi từng ở, vị trí thuận tiện, bước ra là ngay khu phố đi bộ , xung quanh nhiều hàng quán , ks có thiết kế rất đẹp  , điều khá thuận lợi của chúng tôi là đi vào mùa ít khách du lịch + covid nên giá ks khá rẻ so với với giá bt , nv rất nhiệt tình , ks còn có nhà hàng và sky bar sang trọng .Rất hài lòng và sẽ quay lại ks này !', 'Ngay hồ Hoàn Kiếm và khu phố cổ. Thuận tiện đi lại và nhiều món ăn uống.', 'Địa điểm ngay cạnh hồ Gươm rất tiện', 'Khách sạn sạch sẽ, thơm mùi hoa ly, kiến trúc đẹp, nhân viên dễ thương và rất nhiệt tình, vị trí thuận tiện, đi vài bước chân là tới cầu thê húc, mọi thứ đều rất hài lòng🥰🥰🥰', 'Khách sạn đầu tư đẳng cấp, thiết bị đầy đủ, diện tích vừa phải, quá tốt cho 1 lựa chọn khách sạn trong nội thành', 'Vị trí tốt, sát hồ Gươm và từ ban công nhìn được ra hồ. Bay trí tại sảnh và các phòng đẹp. Nhân viên tốt. Có bar trên tầng thượng.', 'Dù là 4sao, nhưng tính thẩm mỹ của khách sạn cực kỳ cao. Từng góc ngách đều được chăm chút kĩ lưỡng.Thức ăn sáng rất ngon và được phục vụ theo chuẩn nhà hàng sang chảnh, rất đẹp mắt.Nhân viên thân thiện, chuyên nghiệp và rất hữu ích khi bạn cần bất kì thứ gì đó. Tôi sẽ quay trở lại nếu có dịp', 'vị trí đẹp , khách sạn sạch sẽ', 'Best location and amazing  room decoration .friendly  and helpful staff specially Ms Hoai An at front desk and her colleagues were very helpful .', 'with nice comfortable room and good location in Sapa downtown take few mins walk can reach Cat Cat village.', 'Located right in the old quarter and short walking distance to Hoan Kiem Lake. Love the room decor style.', 'Great hotel very close to hoan kiem lake. Room was perfect. The sky bar also has a nice view of the lake. All staff were welcoming, thank you to Ngoc the supervisor at the front desk who was very helpful and kind. Will definitely return.', 'Location is very convenient. You can go a walk around Ho Guom, food, coffee, tea....very near.A bar on top of hotel is wonderful view.', 'Super helpful staff, the rooms were beautiful and clean. I would stay here again', "It's right on the Hoan Kiem Lake side. we enjoined food, folk musics, stret performance of the old quarter with a lot of funExcelent staff !", 'Good: location.Bad: Noisy lobby,  all amusement (even coffee) are not fee at room']
