address: Số 9, Lý Đạo Thành, Quận Hoàn Kiếm, Quận Hoàn Kiếm, Hà Nội, Việt Nam
reviews: ['Một đêm thật thỏai mái tại khách sạn. Khách sạn nhỏ nhưng rất tiện nghi với phục vụ rất tôt. Vị trí thuận tiện, đi bộ ra khu trung tâm. Phòng nhỏ nhưng rất ấm cúng và sạch sẽ. Khách sạn cũng có quán cà phê ngay trước lobby rất dễ thương và lịch sự. Thủ tục nhanh gọn, tôi sẽ trở lại đây.', 'Khách sạn nhỏ, sạch sẽ, phù hợp với khách du lịch ngắn ngày hoặc khách đi làm việc. Trước sảnh khách sạn có cafe ngòai trời khá đẹp. Vị trí khách sạn ngay gần trung tâm, có thể đi bộ ra bờ Hồ, gần các cửa hàng mua sắm đồ hiệu. Khách sạn ở trên một con phố khá ngắn nên nhiều người, tài xế taxi không biết tên.', 'sehr zentral gelegenes, schoenes sauber und ruhiges hotel, sehr höfflichem und sehr freundlich personal. Sehr empflehlenswert.', 'Ky nghi tuyet voi voi nhung trai nghiem thu vi. Nhan vien lich su an can va chu dao. Vi tri gan trung tam mua sam.', 'Very well located, in the French quarter, near Hotel Metropole. Thus, the place is quiet and at the same time a very good starting point for any walk in the French quarter or around the Hoan Kiem lake nearby.Nice rooms (I recommend the suites at floor 10, bigger and with a nice view).Breakfast quite disappointing though. But there is a French coffee place inside the French institute called L’Espace, in Trang Tien street, nearby. Or your could indulge yourself and have it at the hotel Metropole on the other side of street Ly Thuong Kiet.', 'We are frequent Hanoi Travellers - and thereby test different areas - this time, we were really pleased.Location:Within walking distance (10 - 15 min) to the old quarter (busy and overcrowded), the hotel is located between the tourist area and the French quarter - and combines the benefits of both. Many nice cafés and restaurants nearby, the lake within less than 10 min ….. and still, already rather quiet. I would consider this as the perfect location for a vacation with family.Hotel:The hotel has some signs of aging but is well maintained. Nice breakfast.If we ignore our tendency to explore new areas and hotels, this was the first hotel in Hanoi, which we would consider to revisit. We were very satisfied.', 'Staff very helpful & friendlyCafe on site nice fresh juices and Vietnamese soups but the sandwiches were not good very small with little fillingBar closes too early which is a shame as there’s a nice seating area out the front.Starbucks across the road and a bakery walking distance of opera house, old quarter & main shopping area with all designer shops', "This hotel has a great location very near to many tourist destination places, to many decent cafes and restaurants and to high profile stores like Prada, Omega etc. Starbucks is right in-front of the hotel.  Breakfast is great, cannot forget the very yummy creamy and cheesy pasta. We only got a problem with the lady receptionist the night we came, had a long discussion with her before we were able to finally checked-in, we came in very late around 9pm but we didn't receive enough consideration from them regarding the room we booked unlike with other hotels,  although I must say that the male staffs are all nice, helped us for a taxi going to another hotel in Hanoi in the following day. The facility is overall nice except that there's no sprinkler in the bathroom, not convenient at all. The room is small I think for its price.", 'Nice upgrade as it was my first time to stay. However I needed to borrow an iron  and without noticing there was a sharp edge which ruined my shirt when I ironed it. I complained to the reception, but all the guy said was sorry. Disappointing reaction from such a small and nice hotel.', 'Fantastic location right in the heart of Hanoi. Walking distance to a number of shopping options from markets through to big brand stores.The decor is a little dated, and rooms are limited with space, but you have everything you need. Service is fantastic and always willing to help.', 'Conifer Hotel is a boutique luxury hotel category. Located in the heart of tourist area of Hanoi.The area is quiet yet your at the City Center. Opera House, Lake, Post Office is within 5-10 minutes walk. There are plenty of proper restaurants. The staff at the reception,F&B and sales team will do their best to accommodate any reasonable request. In fact the two receptionist Mr. Hum & Mr. Nam has provided a great service that encouraged us to stay at the hotel. The F&B staff are good too and food is pretty good meal.The surrounding area is high end for Vietnam style both the hotel and as well as neighbourhood.', 'Room was a bit worn but very clean and functional. Bed was comfortable, basic amenities including toiletries and mineral water was available. The TV had international channels . As I arrived late, I didn’t realise until the next morning that the hotel was very well located with many international premium shopping boutiques nearby. Great stay and I’ll definitely come back,', "Rooms are a bit small and there are some fit out choices that are kind of surprising (e.g. bath/shower set so high it's hard to climb into and then the ceiling is too close for comfort).But I'm a repeat guest because the staff are great, the location is convenient for both work and tourism and the quality/cost works out in my favour.", "On our third visit to Hanoi and having stayed in 5-star hotels prior, I found a gem in this hotel. Located in the former French Quarter, it is in a rather quiet street (Vietnamese love blowing their car and motorbike horns) and very conveniently located within a short distance to the old quarter. The staff personnel, from the bell captain to the maids, were excellent, professional, and very responsive to one's needs. Although my room was rather small, it was very nicely appointed with a great balcony to sit and view the on-goings outside. Breakfast was adequate and although we did not eat at the hotel any other time, we did view some wonderfully prepared dishes. My wife, a Thai, stated that the massage was excellent and very professional. We booked the hotel car for our return to the airport and wished that we had booked it for our arrival also. Excellent service for about 9.00 USD more but well worth it. In sum, we had another memorable Hanoi visit and staying at this wonderful hotel made it even more so. True Vietnamese hospitality in a wonderful setting.", "Right around the corner from the Opera house, this small boutique hotel offers perfect value for money. Rooms are reasonably sized - make sure you get one with a balcony. They are well-maintained and clean, and have not really aged since I stayed here first a few years ago. Just shows management takes care of their establishment. Staff is very helpful and friendly and makes one feel welcome.\r\rBreakfast has improved over the years (it used to be this hotel's biggest downside). It's still nothing to rave about, the single choice of processed ham and cheese remains sub par. Be aware that the horrible mayonnaise is sweet like a dissolved candy cane. Freshly cooked scrambled eggs are absolutely delicious though.\r\rI recommend this place to anyone going to Hanoi.", 'I would reccomend the staff  (front desk staff) who were all very diligent, very professional and active.\rA little story which happened to me : I went to the market (north of the lake) by taxi, it costed 24.000 dong (around 1,5 dollars)\rwhen i came back, from the market i took a taxi but i didnt feel confortable, the box of the counter/taximeter was partially hidden. And i notices that the rate increased very fast... at the hotel the total was 107.000 dong. I asked the hotel to help me and they immediately came and barked at the driver who was definately a taxi/stealer... I paid 50.000 (The reception told me to pay only 40.000 but I didn t have change and didnt want to spend time on that)\rAnyway they helped....\rBe aware of fake taxi !...', 'The staffs were very attentive and helpful. We booked a tatami room, which was on the top floor with very nice view. But I will not suggest anyone taller than 180cm choose this room, for the ceiling is too low for the tall. The location is wonderful, nearing everything, but in a quiet alley. I think we will come back again.', "This is the second time I have stayed at the Conifer, it is just about 4 star but really a mid-range to budget choice, but what lacks in luxury is made up for by the wonderful staff, who will do anything to help you.  The Manager especially is very solicitous and will make sure that you are happy with your stay.  I stayed in the cheapest room this time (the 'tatami' room on the top floor - though there is no tatami, just a wooden floor, and the bed mattress is on the floor).  The room was OK with a small bathroom, but I kept waking up very early due to sunlight leaking into the room via the bathroom window. I mentioned it to the manager and by the second day they had taped a screen over the window for me which really helped.  On the down side, the wifi did not stretch well to this room (no router on the 11th floor) so I had to work in the restaurant, also the breakfast is not great - best to go for the pho or have the baguettes with some eggs.  All in all though, if you want a more peaceful location than the old town and you are looking for a good mid-range choice I can recommend the Conifer.", "I love staying here when I visit hanoi for personal travel. More upscale area than the normal tourist section of Hoan Kiem. Hotel is very nice for the cost. Very helpful staff, short walk from great food. Only complaint is the wifi is terrible on the upper floors. They do provide an Ethernet cable, so don't forget your adapter if you're a Mac user.", 'This is my third staff at this boutique hotel over the past 18 months.  The hotel is centrally located in the city and has some good restaurants nearby.  Staff is friendly and helpful, and the rooms are well maintained.  Great value!']

address: 29 Hang Manh, Phố Cổ, Hà Nội, Việt Nam, 100000
reviews: ['Hài lòng với mọi thứ, ngoại trừ việc có mấy con muỗi vo ve trong phòng làm tôi cảm thấy bất an.', 'Ưu: Nvien nhiệt tình chu đáo,Nhược: Đang trong quá trình thay khăn tắm', 'Nv ân cần', 'This is a boutique hotel. I would say that that the value is fantastic. Location js great with easy walking distances to many tourist attractions. The staff at the hotel are friendly and give many recommendations on where to go sight seeing. Overall a great place to stay I will definitely be back for a return stay.', 'This hotel is really worth recommending. Cheap hotel have five star service. The hotel manager Tommy was very attentive. Makes us feel like home. Each service staff is also very friendly to meet all the needs of the guests and treat them as family members. Because this is my first time in Hanoi, when I entered the hotel, in addition to providing welcome drink and fruit, the lady staff also took out a nearby map, explaining one by one where there are delicious restaurants at reasonable prices and which important attractions to visit. The room is clean and tidy. Breakfast is very delicious and there are many choices, the preparation is very attentive and special. It is really good experience and good value for money. If you want to come to Hanoi, the best choice is this one.', "I booked La Castela for the later half of our time in Hanoi and I wish I had booked it for the first part of our stay, too. The staff went above and beyond to welcome us to Hanoi, provide us with valuable information, serve a delicious and filling breakfast, and make all the car arrangements we needed. The location is great for the Old Quarter with lots of good vegetarian restaurants right around the corner (important to me). I can't recommend this hotel enough.", 'Very friendly straff!', 'Very Good Location, near to the Lake and shops. Very nice and accommodating Hotel staff!', 'A lovely hotel. •Every staff there is really warm,nice and friendly. •The location of the hotel is excellent!•The breakfast was tasty! •The room was clean and elegant. I enjoy staying here.Strongly recommend.', 'Perfect hotel! The location, the room and the staff are amazing! Had 1 night there and about to come back to another one. Very very recommended', 'Nous avons particulièrement apprécié les prestations de cet hôtel mais ce qui nous fera y revenir et le conseiller à nos amis et à nos familles, c\'est la qualité du service ! Mr Tommy Bui, le gérant et Alice, la réceptionniste, sont véritablement fantastiques ! De tous les voyages que nous avons fait, nous n\'avions jamais vu un personnel aussi dévoué, souriant et attentionné. Avec tous leurs bons conseils et toutes leurs attentions ils ont tout fait pour rendre notre séjour des plus agréable ! Nous tenons à les en remercier encore une fois !Pour ce qui est du reste, l\'hôtel est bien tenu et en plein coeur du "Old Quarter" de Hanoï. Les suites avec balcon sont spacieuses et lumineuses : grand lit, tv, réfrigérateur, mini bar, bouilloire avec biscuits, cafés et thés offerts, baignoire, sèche cheveux, nécessaires de toilette offerts, peignoires, chaussons, clim... Et même si vous êtes côté rue, vous n\'aurez pas à vous inquiéter du bruit, la baie vitrée bien fermée étouffe les klaxons.', '滞在中に誕生日を迎え、朝食時、サプライズでバースデイケーキとスタッフのみなさまにお祝いして頂きました。凄くビックリしましたが嬉しかったです。スタッフみなさんがとても親切でした。', '前台的tommy非常贴心，很热情。酒店位于还剑湖，36行街，位置很好。酒店设施很新～', '호텔 규모가 아담하고 직원들이 친절하며 가족 같은 분위기로 지낼수 있었다. 또한 호텔 위치가 호안끼엠 가까이 있어 주변의 명승지역을 모두 도보로 다닐수 잇는 장점을 지녔다. 먹거리, 볼거리, 쇼핑거리 등이 모두 해결되는 적합한 호텔이다. 호텔 규모는 비록 너무 아담하지만 여행의 목적을 달성시키는데는 아무런 장애가 되지 않는다. 적극 추천한다.', '직원들 친철로 운영되는 호텔 같아요.시설은 인근 다른 호텔에 비해서 낙후되어 있습니다.더불팀대를 붙여놨는데.. 가운데 잘못 앉거나 누우면 다칠정도로 딱딱해요.두팀대가 붙어 있는 부분이 딱딱하네요.그래도 이전보단 와이파가 조금 좋아졌어요.호안키엠 산책하러 가기 좋은 위치라서 자주 이용하는데... 이젠 다른곳도 찾아봐야 하는지 고민되네요.', '시설은 좀 오래된 느낌입니다만 직원들 서비스가 너무 좋습니다.조식도 주문하는 형태인데 생각보다 괜찮습니다.하지만 저는 밖에서 맛있는 쌀국수를 먹었습니다.와이파이가 많이 느려요.', '직원들이 너무 친절합니다.  살짝 부담되기도 하네요.오래된 호텔인데 관리는 잘하는 듯 합니다. 시티뷰로 업그레이드 해줘서 좋긴 했습니다만.. 창문이 큰 방같은 경우 개미가 있습니다. 테이블 색과 똑같아서노트북에 올라와야 확인하고 잡습니다. 먹을거 테이블 위에 못 놔둬요.어디서 개미가 올지 모르기 때문에.. 주변에 맛집도 많고 호안키엠 호수가 가까워서 좋습니다만시설대비 가격이 싼것 같진 않습니다.직원들 친절함이 후한 점수를 준것 같네요.이젠 같은 가격이면 다른곳을 찾아볼것 같아요.', 'Hanoi La Castela Hotel steff는 내가 본 베트남 사람들 중 가장 친절한 사람이었습니다.Tommy는 물론이고 모든 직원이 친절했으며 당황스러운 상황에 막힘 없이 문제를 바로바로 해결해 주어서 더 즐거운 여행이 되었습니다.아침식사 또한 먹어 본 모든 종류가 매우 만족스러웠습니다.꼭 다시 찾아가고 싶음 숙소입니다. 물론 친구들에게도 적극 추천해 주고 싶은 숙소입니다.', '가식적이지 않은 호텔직원의 친절이 너무 좋았습니다.영어도 잘하고 언제나 웃는 얼굴로 맞아주는 직원들입니다.아침을 안 먹으다고 괜찮은지도 물어봐 줍니다.호텔은 좀 갔낡습다니.  콘애어는 해약서 편불했습니다.아침식사는 뷔페가 아니었지만 깜짝 놀랄정도로 좋았습니다.쌀국수도 맛있고 햄버거는 예술입니다.파이와이는 느려서 일하기에 지쉽 않았습니다.친절한 직원들에게 감사하고 싶네요.', 'All the staffs were very friendly and kind. They took care of me with all their heart. Even After i checked out, they helped me for my trip. Thank you so much to all the staff. They gave me really nice trip. I will stay at this hotel if i visit Hanoi again.이 숙소 진짜 추천합니다 (누가 적으라고 해서 적는것도 아니고 자발적으로 적는거!! )일단 숙소 위치도 좋고 리모델링 한 지 얼마 안돼서 엄청 깨끗합니다 그리고 스태프들이 진짜 너무너무 친절하고 엄청 신경 써줍니다 체크 아웃하고 며칠 뒤에도 갈데 없음 자기 호텔 로비 와서 쉬라고 하고 빈방에서 샤워도 해도 된다고 하고(미안해서 하진 않았음) 진짜 이렇게 친절한 호텔은 본 적이 없음ㅠㅠ 미안할 정도로 친절하고 덕분에 너무 고마워씀 완전완전 강추합니다 다음에 하노이 또 가게된다면 이 호텔에 다시 갈거예요']

hotel name: Khách Sạn 7S Splendid Pearlight Hà Nội (7S Hotel Splendid Pearlight Hanoi)
address: No.18B Tho Xuong Lane, Hoan Kiem dist., Quận Hoàn Kiếm, Hà Nội, Việt Nam, 10000
reviews: ['Bị đau đầu xin thuốc được nhân viên mua cho mang lên tận phòng và rất nhiệt tình. Very good', "Breakfast and showering system are big failures.Don't expect such a great value at this hotel.Just good for budget stay for a short period of time.", 'Good location and cosy hotel within old quarters', 'Thank you all staff of Splendid Pearlight Hotel especially Chu Chu, Hannah and Fiona however not forgeting the rest of the staff that we do not know all their names. They are always friendly and helpful on our queries  about anything.  Thank you for the hospitality.', 'I booked 3 nights at Pearlight.  When I reached hotel, my room was occupied. They sent me to 500m away named Symphony Hotel ( lower star hotel , their hotel also. ) At first, I thought  Is upgrade my stay.  However,  Symphony hotel is dark ( lobby, lift )  hotel , noisy renovation next to the hotel for 2 hours during mid night and 5:50am start noisy again.  Another reason is location far away from St Joseph’s Cathedral .  I complaint then they sent me back to stay another hotel named S Central ( opposite Pearlight).  They group have Symphony ( 500m away ), Pearlight, Star Grand & S Central next to each other.   Beware if you booked higher grade hotel, but was arranged to stay at lower grade hotel .   Star Grand has better / more variety breakfast than others.    I used to do online booking, first time this incident happened to me.  And I think is not right because they want to earn more cos I early booked in lower rate,  they use my room to rent out to other guests in higher rate )', 'The hotel is clean and big. near to the shopping, many food, spa, and local tour there. The staff so friendly and helpful. They can arrange car for pick up and drop off to the airport', 'The location in old quarter, near to the hoan kiem lake just walking around 10-15 minute.And around hotel is a lot of store and food. So nice. The staff also so helpfull and friendly.', 'we Arrived with 3 suitcases and when we got to the hotel  found out there was no elevator and my room was on the 7th floor..the staff was really nice and changed me to there sister hotel roght opposit.all staff was really nice and helpful specially DONG &HAIthank you very much  to all the staffroom was really large and aircon should be left on 24/7', 'Cut-water for whole stay, terrible facility, never come back', 'I recommend it. The staff are really friendly. Meals are also good. It is cheap and good for family travelers with children. Please note that there is no elevator.', "I recommend it. The staff are really friendly. Meals are also good. It's best. Please note that there is no elevator.", 'I recommend you guys to check in here because, eventhough the building is small yet the room is big and nice. Plus, the receptionist are always in welcome mode which give positive vibes. The hotel give the very best hospitality and services in which you can imagine you were in 4/5 star hotel.', 'Not as good as the stars they have as a rating', 'Big thank', 'There was a reservation stuff up from Agoda. The staff organised a mattress for us , carrying a double up 4 flights. They helped us with a late check out and were more than helpful with any request. The location is great, the only downer was the church bells at 5 am. But everything was close.  The room was clean and big with 2 queen sized beds.  Breakfast was good with a decent selection of local and western foods. If we go back to Hanoi  will stay there again.', "We had a family room with 2 king sized beds, very comfortable. The room was spacious and had a balcony looking out onto St Joseph's Cathedral. Check in and check out were smooth and trouble free with a welcome juice and fruit provided on arrival. All staff were attentive, polite and ready to assist whenever they could. A great spot, close to the centre with restaurants and bars all around.", 'Very comfortable', "Your hotel is located nearly the Church, closely to walk to Old Quarter (5 mins).I need to leave the hotel early morning for taking bus to SAPA, and the staff is very nice to willing to help us to pack the breakfast to go.Besides that, when we come back again the day after, we are arranged the room with big king bed. It's comfortable for sleeping.For sure, I will stay here if I have chance to back to Hanoi. And recommend all people can stay here to earn the spirit of Hanoi.", 'thank you so much', 'Thank you so much for Amazon staying with beautyful bacony room. The room is big and nice. Stuff very freindly and breakfast has so many choice. I will be back. Would like to rezonans.']

hotel name: Khách sạn Authentic Hanoi (Authentic Hanoi Hotel)
address: 13 Lý Thái Tổ, Hoàn Kiếm, Quận Hoàn Kiếm, Hà Nội, Việt Nam, 0084
reviews: ['vợ chồng tôi thực sự đã có 1 kỳ nghỉ tuyệt vời tại đây, khá nhiều danh lam thắng cảnh, địa điểm ăn uống đáng để thưởng thức, 1 điều chắc chắn là vợ chồng tôi sẽ quay lại đây vào 1 ngày không xa, 1 kỳ nghỉ đáng nhớ :)', 'Rât tot,', 'Rất thích hợp cho đi công tác ngắn ngày.\rBuffet không đa dạng lắm. Khách sạn ở rất gần Hồ Hoàn Kiếm có thể đi bộ và khá yên tĩnh. Nội thất ấm cúng. Tuy nhien, có vẻ hệ thống thoát nuoc không tốt lắm', 'Phòng rẻ ,nhược điểm không sạch sẽ ,dịch vụ không tốt', 'very good', 'Staff very friendly and helpful. Good location and value for money. Okay breakfast as omelette was good. Our room had a bit of a mouldy smell, but that was probably bad luck, and the room size and bed were both good.', 'Right inside old quarter. Room is spacious. Staff is friendly and attentive. Reasonable spread of breakfast selection', 'I stayed here about 3 years ago and the condition of this hotel is showing its age. I think it needs an uplift soon. Other than that, nice hotel and great location. I didn’t have the breakfast nor used the gym so I cannot comment on that. I had 2 rooms. One room had a hard bed and one had a soft pillow top which was nice. Worked fo us. So if when you book, I would request for the bed that you prefer and hopefully they can accommodate. My only complaint is the shower in my room 704. The shower head needs replacing, more water flows through the sides than through the shower head. And the shower door/window leaks water a bit so when u shower, the floor gets a little wet and it’s slippery. The staff were wonderful. Spoke good English and attentive. Upstairs restaurant has a nice view of the lake. There is a great seafood restaurant near the hotel. When u walk out of the hotel, it’s to ur right. There’s 3 locations and they are the same restaurant.', 'I had a comfortable stay at the Hotel. They provide quality Halal food. The Hotel is near the old Quarters which is good for fellow shoppers. The room was comfortable The Hotel staff were pleasant and helpful and informative. Very easy to get Taxi from the Hotel.', "The check in is very fast, the staff served us ice tea whike waiting. The location is near to the old quater,  nearby there are many eating places. With the help of the front desk staff, we managed to rent  a motorbike. When we complained that it is faulty - the hotel staff help to contact the motorbike company to have it changed. There's anew Italian ice cream shop selling creep and various types of ice cream.", "Elsewhere this might get a better review, but in Hanoi visitors are spoilt for choice and there are better options in this price range (we stayed overnight in Hanoi on 3 separate occasions, each time in 3 star hotels). The room and bathroom were clean, new and well appointed. The breakfast was buffet style and typical of the high standard at this price point in Hanoi. There just wasn't anything exceptional about the room or service like we experienced elsewhere. Unfortunately the bed was also extremely hard, so much so that it was difficult to sleep.I had also ticked airport transfer when making the booking and as per Agoda's advice had tried to contact the hotel to confirm. They didn't reply and I therefore assumed that there would be no transfer. Nonetheless we looked for a sign when we arrived, but didn't see any so we proceeded to the hotel on our own. After we checked in, the manager called us and made his displeasure very clear that we had not taken the airport transfer which he claimed had been waiting for us. We thought we resolved this by explaining that we neither saw anyone waiting for us nor received any reply to my attempt to confirm the transfer. However, at checkout he presented us with a bill for the transfer. It took too much persistence from us to get him to withdraw it. This left us with a bit of a bad vibe about the place, especially compared the the warm friendly service (and comfortable beds) we experienced elsewhere in Vietnam.", 'It is a affordable hotel for traveler. The service very good, even i can print my web check-in boarding pass at the computer room and collect from the lobby. The staff very nice, helpful and try to facilitate. The location hotel also not so far from the old street, within a walking distance. Beside the hotel is a halal restaurant which suitable for muslim friends.', 'Since we were upgraded to a bigger room during our return from Halong Bay. It was the same layout as the suite room but only bigger in space. However, the same problem exists, that is, the wall is too thin and that we can hear the tv noise from the room beside us. However, this time, the neighbour was considerate and kept the volume to tolerable levels.\r\rOther than that, we liked the room very much due to its spaciousness. There is a huge bathtub, the biggest that we have ever had in our travels which was good for a nice long dip. Wifi was available and strong signal since the router is just outside the door.\r\rNice city view although the windows needed some cleaning. Close to the water puppet theatre and other eateries.', "This hotel was centrally located and affordable. It is just 3 mins walk to Hoan Kiem lake and there are many nice eating places and coffee shops nearby. The wifi was good and available throughout the hotel. The only problem is that the suites are placed next to each other and the walls are too thin, so the noise from the tv can be heard from the other room. We needed to get the staff to approach the next doors' guests to turn down the volume which they did so promptly.", 'This is my 2nd time staying in this hotel which I personally think is is underated at 3 star.The hotel is excellently located near shopping districts at old quarter but yet not nosiy that happens to most hotels nearby.Also it is very clean with modern layout and facilities with big bathtub.I would definately stay this hotel again.The only improvement it might consider to improve its star rating is more variety of food.', 'A new Hotel with convenient locations with access to food and entertainment within walkig distance. Hotel served with simple and yet acceptable breakfast and you have to ask for special serving like egg and noodles. Only set back is the water is not too hot and Air Con is too cold even with Max 32 degrees adjusted and I turned it off to keep warm but ended up too stuffy.', 'I have high expectations from the time I booked this hotel but unfortunately when arrived for\rcheck in was told by reception that Agoda had oversold the room\rso I have to transfer to a nearby boss hotel for 1 night stay.  The stay in boss hotel is so so\ras the hotel is just like any normal orinally Vietnamese run hotel.\rThe next day I was finally checked in with a room but as I have mentioned to them\rI want a king size bed so quite annoyed when given a twin room. But later on they did change for me. I thought the room size should be bigger on the photo in the web site but turn out to be quite average. I think with less money u can stay at Gondola or Golden silk boutique which is in same category. The Authentic hotel is closed to FIVI supermarket so will be quite convenience to get some drinks or titbits.\rI have breakfast and lunch in the 10 floor restaurant which nice view overlooking old quarter .', 'So close to the center and such a friendly staff! The hotel looks like completely new and the facilities are great (small gym) and the breakfast .... it is great! I was so surprised finding this hotel. It might be the reason to come back to Hanoi soon! We had a great stay and enjoyed every minute. I hope the can keep the price value rate, since that was the best ever for us!!', 'Beside the location and service also the rooms and facilities were excellent. The hotel is new and it feels, looks and experienced like that! They are even still building on the top of the hotel to extend it, but we had no any inconvenience of that building. The breakfast, welcome and front desk services were excellent too!! We will come back here!']

address: 38 phố Lò Sũ, khu phố cổ, Quận Hoàn Kiếm, thành phố Hà Nội, Việt Nam, Quận Hoàn Kiếm, Hà Nội, Việt Nam, 100000
reviews: ['Khách sạn đẹp, vị trí trung tâm thuận tiện tham quan, nhân viên chuyên nghiệp, ăn sáng ngon, đáng giá tiền', 'Khách sạn đẹp, tinh tế, nội thất hiện đại, sạch sẽ\rNhân viên nhiệt tình, cực thân thiện từ Tiếp Tân đến Phục Vụ\rVị trí đẹp ngay Phố Cổ và Hồ Gươm, rất thuận tiện tham quan và du lịch\rĂn sáng cực ngon. Hơi ngạc nhiên với chất lượng ăn sáng tốt như thế\rRất hài lòng. Sẽ quay lại tiếp', 'khách sạn có vị trí rất đẹp, cách 200m là hồ gươm. phòng óc trang trí đẹp và sạch sẽ. Nhân viên tại đây rất thân thiện, nhiệt tình giúp và chỉ dẫn những thông tin cần thiết về địa điểm du lịch tại Hà Nội, luôn nở nụ cười.', 'Khách sạn sạch sẽ. Nhân viên dễ thương và chuyên nghiệp.', 'Địa điểm trung tâm đông đúc nhưng nhân viên nhẹ nhàng , nói khẽ, tận tâm chu đáo làm cho mọi thứ trở trên yên tĩnh. Cám ơn các bạn đã hết lòng vì khách', 'khách sạn mới, rộng ở ngay gần bờ hồ. không gian khách sạn rất thoáng và thoải mái, dễ chịu. Phòng rộng, mới, bố trí hợp lý. cung cách và thái độ phục vụ của nhân viên rất tuyệt vời nếu cứ duy trì được phong cách như này. đồ ăn sáng ổn chỉ cần cải thiện đa dạng và tươi ngon hơn chút. duy nhất chưa hài lòng là điều hòa ko mát, vì check-in muộn nên ko muốn gọi nv, ks cần kiểm tra bảo dưỡng thường xuyên hơn.', 'lần đầu tiên đến với khách sạn, thật sự ko nghĩ khách sạn okay đến vậy , nhân viên lịch sự dễ thương, phòng ngày nào cũng đc dọn dẹp rất sạch. sẽ quay lại ks này khi đến Hà Nội', 'Gần Hồ Hoàn Kiếm, sạch sẽ và nhân viên nhiệt tình.', 'Vị trí khách sạn trung tâm nên đi chơi cũng thuận tiện, khách sạn hơi nhỏ và nhìn chung thì thấy chỉ tầm 3,5 sao là cùng chứ không đến 4 sao, ăn sáng ok.', '- địa điểm lý tưởng để tham quan vì ngay phố cổ rất nhiều hàng quán ăn uống - cơ sở vật chất: tạm ổn phòng được nhưng không đẹp tầm 3 sao- nhân viên thân thiện nhiệt tình', 'Đáng tiền, gần phố cỗ, nhân viên thân thiện , sạch sẽ', 'OK', 'KS hoàn hảo, dù phòng có hơi nhỏ, mọi điều khác đều tốt nhất là NV rất thân thiện và nhiệt tình.', 'Tôi sẽ tới đây vào lần tới', 'Là 1 KS đáp ứng rất tốt những yêu cầu của khách.', 'We came with no expectations but left with the highest regard for this boutique like hotel with excellent amenities - welcome fruit basket, multi channel tv, full toiletry kit, good lightings, nice sized room and an EXCELLENT breakfast. And how do we start with the service... Top notch and personable from ALL staffs .  We were made so welcomed and had our requests warmly catered to by Jasmine, Kelvin and Jake and every one we encountered. Outstanding and most highly recommended.', 'One of the BEST hotel especially the staff - namely jasmin, rosy, daniel, the other guy with eye glass and the 2 bellman. Arrived 3am and was really tired. Luckily, my room got upgraded to a family room. Very clean and service was exceptional, everyone was doing extra mile qnd asking if you need anything. Location is right at the center of the tourist area. I will DEFINITELY go back and stay again here. Kudos to the staff 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻', 'Highly recommended! It’s a nice hotel. Clean, beautiful and have the best staffs.  All the staff are friendly and always smile. Especially Ms.Jasmine, she is so kind and always helpful. I stay there for 4 nights, if I come back to Hanoi, I’ll choose Hanoi emerald waters hotel trendy again.', 'I stayed here In between 3 day excursions for a total of 7 nights. My room for the first 3 nights was smaller than I expected for a deluxe double, but it was clean, quiet and the bed was quite comfy. I was upgraded to a lovely large room on my second 3 night stay.  The staff is amazing. When I returned for my second stay they were so excited to see me you would have thought I was long lost family. Everyone from the doorman to the reception staff to the concierge and manager ALL bend over backwards to ensure you have a great stay.  They booked a Hanoi city tour with car, driver and separate English-speaking guide who offered my friend and I a separate motorbike tour of farmlands just outside the city after the first tour ended that turned out to be so much fun!  They recommended fabulous vegetarian and non vegetarian restaurants and always greeted us so warmly whenever we returned to the hotel.  The doorman even walked us to our spa appointments! I highly recommend this hotel!', 'We were upgraded to city view room. Room size is similar to the one we booked. The room can be quite noisy during day time. Toliet is a bit small. Staff are mostly very friendly and helpful. They would check on us and see if we need any help whenever we pass by the reception.']

hotel name: Khách Sạn 7S Splendid Pearlight Hà Nội (7S Hotel Splendid Pearlight Hanoi)
address: No.18B Tho Xuong Lane, Hoan Kiem dist., Quận Hoàn Kiếm, Hà Nội, Việt Nam, 10000
reviews: ['Bị đau đầu xin thuốc được nhân viên mua cho mang lên tận phòng và rất nhiệt tình. Very good', "Breakfast and showering system are big failures.Don't expect such a great value at this hotel.Just good for budget stay for a short period of time.", 'Good location and cosy hotel within old quarters', 'Thank you all staff of Splendid Pearlight Hotel especially Chu Chu, Hannah and Fiona however not forgeting the rest of the staff that we do not know all their names. They are always friendly and helpful on our queries  about anything.  Thank you for the hospitality.', 'I booked 3 nights at Pearlight.  When I reached hotel, my room was occupied. They sent me to 500m away named Symphony Hotel ( lower star hotel , their hotel also. ) At first, I thought  Is upgrade my stay.  However,  Symphony hotel is dark ( lobby, lift )  hotel , noisy renovation next to the hotel for 2 hours during mid night and 5:50am start noisy again.  Another reason is location far away from St Joseph’s Cathedral .  I complaint then they sent me back to stay another hotel named S Central ( opposite Pearlight).  They group have Symphony ( 500m away ), Pearlight, Star Grand & S Central next to each other.   Beware if you booked higher grade hotel, but was arranged to stay at lower grade hotel .   Star Grand has better / more variety breakfast than others.    I used to do online booking, first time this incident happened to me.  And I think is not right because they want to earn more cos I early booked in lower rate,  they use my room to rent out to other guests in higher rate )', 'The hotel is clean and big. near to the shopping, many food, spa, and local tour there. The staff so friendly and helpful. They can arrange car for pick up and drop off to the airport', 'The location in old quarter, near to the hoan kiem lake just walking around 10-15 minute.And around hotel is a lot of store and food. So nice. The staff also so helpfull and friendly.', 'we Arrived with 3 suitcases and when we got to the hotel  found out there was no elevator and my room was on the 7th floor..the staff was really nice and changed me to there sister hotel roght opposit.all staff was really nice and helpful specially DONG &HAIthank you very much  to all the staffroom was really large and aircon should be left on 24/7', 'Cut-water for whole stay, terrible facility, never come back', 'I recommend it. The staff are really friendly. Meals are also good. It is cheap and good for family travelers with children. Please note that there is no elevator.', "I recommend it. The staff are really friendly. Meals are also good. It's best. Please note that there is no elevator.", 'I recommend you guys to check in here because, eventhough the building is small yet the room is big and nice. Plus, the receptionist are always in welcome mode which give positive vibes. The hotel give the very best hospitality and services in which you can imagine you were in 4/5 star hotel.', 'Not as good as the stars they have as a rating', 'Big thank', 'There was a reservation stuff up from Agoda. The staff organised a mattress for us , carrying a double up 4 flights. They helped us with a late check out and were more than helpful with any request. The location is great, the only downer was the church bells at 5 am. But everything was close.  The room was clean and big with 2 queen sized beds.  Breakfast was good with a decent selection of local and western foods. If we go back to Hanoi  will stay there again.', "We had a family room with 2 king sized beds, very comfortable. The room was spacious and had a balcony looking out onto St Joseph's Cathedral. Check in and check out were smooth and trouble free with a welcome juice and fruit provided on arrival. All staff were attentive, polite and ready to assist whenever they could. A great spot, close to the centre with restaurants and bars all around.", 'Very comfortable', "Your hotel is located nearly the Church, closely to walk to Old Quarter (5 mins).I need to leave the hotel early morning for taking bus to SAPA, and the staff is very nice to willing to help us to pack the breakfast to go.Besides that, when we come back again the day after, we are arranged the room with big king bed. It's comfortable for sleeping.For sure, I will stay here if I have chance to back to Hanoi. And recommend all people can stay here to earn the spirit of Hanoi.", 'thank you so much', 'Thank you so much for Amazon staying with beautyful bacony room. The room is big and nice. Stuff very freindly and breakfast has so many choice. I will be back. Would like to rezonans.']

hotel name: Khách sạn Authentic Hanoi (Authentic Hanoi Hotel)
address: 13 Lý Thái Tổ, Hoàn Kiếm, Quận Hoàn Kiếm, Hà Nội, Việt Nam, 0084
reviews: ['vợ chồng tôi thực sự đã có 1 kỳ nghỉ tuyệt vời tại đây, khá nhiều danh lam thắng cảnh, địa điểm ăn uống đáng để thưởng thức, 1 điều chắc chắn là vợ chồng tôi sẽ quay lại đây vào 1 ngày không xa, 1 kỳ nghỉ đáng nhớ :)', 'Rât tot,', 'Rất thích hợp cho đi công tác ngắn ngày.\rBuffet không đa dạng lắm. Khách sạn ở rất gần Hồ Hoàn Kiếm có thể đi bộ và khá yên tĩnh. Nội thất ấm cúng. Tuy nhien, có vẻ hệ thống thoát nuoc không tốt lắm', 'Phòng rẻ ,nhược điểm không sạch sẽ ,dịch vụ không tốt', 'very good', 'Staff very friendly and helpful. Good location and value for money. Okay breakfast as omelette was good. Our room had a bit of a mouldy smell, but that was probably bad luck, and the room size and bed were both good.', 'Right inside old quarter. Room is spacious. Staff is friendly and attentive. Reasonable spread of breakfast selection', 'I stayed here about 3 years ago and the condition of this hotel is showing its age. I think it needs an uplift soon. Other than that, nice hotel and great location. I didn’t have the breakfast nor used the gym so I cannot comment on that. I had 2 rooms. One room had a hard bed and one had a soft pillow top which was nice. Worked fo us. So if when you book, I would request for the bed that you prefer and hopefully they can accommodate. My only complaint is the shower in my room 704. The shower head needs replacing, more water flows through the sides than through the shower head. And the shower door/window leaks water a bit so when u shower, the floor gets a little wet and it’s slippery. The staff were wonderful. Spoke good English and attentive. Upstairs restaurant has a nice view of the lake. There is a great seafood restaurant near the hotel. When u walk out of the hotel, it’s to ur right. There’s 3 locations and they are the same restaurant.', 'I had a comfortable stay at the Hotel. They provide quality Halal food. The Hotel is near the old Quarters which is good for fellow shoppers. The room was comfortable The Hotel staff were pleasant and helpful and informative. Very easy to get Taxi from the Hotel.', "The check in is very fast, the staff served us ice tea whike waiting. The location is near to the old quater,  nearby there are many eating places. With the help of the front desk staff, we managed to rent  a motorbike. When we complained that it is faulty - the hotel staff help to contact the motorbike company to have it changed. There's anew Italian ice cream shop selling creep and various types of ice cream.", "Elsewhere this might get a better review, but in Hanoi visitors are spoilt for choice and there are better options in this price range (we stayed overnight in Hanoi on 3 separate occasions, each time in 3 star hotels). The room and bathroom were clean, new and well appointed. The breakfast was buffet style and typical of the high standard at this price point in Hanoi. There just wasn't anything exceptional about the room or service like we experienced elsewhere. Unfortunately the bed was also extremely hard, so much so that it was difficult to sleep.I had also ticked airport transfer when making the booking and as per Agoda's advice had tried to contact the hotel to confirm. They didn't reply and I therefore assumed that there would be no transfer. Nonetheless we looked for a sign when we arrived, but didn't see any so we proceeded to the hotel on our own. After we checked in, the manager called us and made his displeasure very clear that we had not taken the airport transfer which he claimed had been waiting for us. We thought we resolved this by explaining that we neither saw anyone waiting for us nor received any reply to my attempt to confirm the transfer. However, at checkout he presented us with a bill for the transfer. It took too much persistence from us to get him to withdraw it. This left us with a bit of a bad vibe about the place, especially compared the the warm friendly service (and comfortable beds) we experienced elsewhere in Vietnam.", 'It is a affordable hotel for traveler. The service very good, even i can print my web check-in boarding pass at the computer room and collect from the lobby. The staff very nice, helpful and try to facilitate. The location hotel also not so far from the old street, within a walking distance. Beside the hotel is a halal restaurant which suitable for muslim friends.', 'Since we were upgraded to a bigger room during our return from Halong Bay. It was the same layout as the suite room but only bigger in space. However, the same problem exists, that is, the wall is too thin and that we can hear the tv noise from the room beside us. However, this time, the neighbour was considerate and kept the volume to tolerable levels.\r\rOther than that, we liked the room very much due to its spaciousness. There is a huge bathtub, the biggest that we have ever had in our travels which was good for a nice long dip. Wifi was available and strong signal since the router is just outside the door.\r\rNice city view although the windows needed some cleaning. Close to the water puppet theatre and other eateries.', "This hotel was centrally located and affordable. It is just 3 mins walk to Hoan Kiem lake and there are many nice eating places and coffee shops nearby. The wifi was good and available throughout the hotel. The only problem is that the suites are placed next to each other and the walls are too thin, so the noise from the tv can be heard from the other room. We needed to get the staff to approach the next doors' guests to turn down the volume which they did so promptly.", 'This is my 2nd time staying in this hotel which I personally think is is underated at 3 star.The hotel is excellently located near shopping districts at old quarter but yet not nosiy that happens to most hotels nearby.Also it is very clean with modern layout and facilities with big bathtub.I would definately stay this hotel again.The only improvement it might consider to improve its star rating is more variety of food.', 'A new Hotel with convenient locations with access to food and entertainment within walkig distance. Hotel served with simple and yet acceptable breakfast and you have to ask for special serving like egg and noodles. Only set back is the water is not too hot and Air Con is too cold even with Max 32 degrees adjusted and I turned it off to keep warm but ended up too stuffy.', 'I have high expectations from the time I booked this hotel but unfortunately when arrived for\rcheck in was told by reception that Agoda had oversold the room\rso I have to transfer to a nearby boss hotel for 1 night stay.  The stay in boss hotel is so so\ras the hotel is just like any normal orinally Vietnamese run hotel.\rThe next day I was finally checked in with a room but as I have mentioned to them\rI want a king size bed so quite annoyed when given a twin room. But later on they did change for me. I thought the room size should be bigger on the photo in the web site but turn out to be quite average. I think with less money u can stay at Gondola or Golden silk boutique which is in same category. The Authentic hotel is closed to FIVI supermarket so will be quite convenience to get some drinks or titbits.\rI have breakfast and lunch in the 10 floor restaurant which nice view overlooking old quarter .', 'So close to the center and such a friendly staff! The hotel looks like completely new and the facilities are great (small gym) and the breakfast .... it is great! I was so surprised finding this hotel. It might be the reason to come back to Hanoi soon! We had a great stay and enjoyed every minute. I hope the can keep the price value rate, since that was the best ever for us!!', 'Beside the location and service also the rooms and facilities were excellent. The hotel is new and it feels, looks and experienced like that! They are even still building on the top of the hotel to extend it, but we had no any inconvenience of that building. The breakfast, welcome and front desk services were excellent too!! We will come back here!']

reviews: ['hop li gia tien', 'Nằm trong phố cổ, khách sạn khá tiện trong việc đi lại', 'khách sạn sạch sẽ, tiện lợi', 'Tốt', 'Địa Điểm Thuận Tiện Gần TRung Tâm Bờ Hồ & Phố Cổ 👍Đèn F Cần Sáng Hơn Nước Yếu & Bồn Tắm Cũ Ko Có Quạt Hút Gió Nên Thường Xuyên Kiểm Tra Pin Remote Máy Lạnh và TIVI', 'Nhân viên vui vẻ, hoà nhã, thức ăn buổi sáng không đa dạng, ít lựa chọn,', 'Ưu: Địa điểm trung tâmNhược điểm:  Nước rất kém, máy air conditioner không hoạt động. Tính phí 40% nếu viết hóa đơn, rất rất không thân thiện và thô bạo.', 'Ưu điểm: Vị trí cực tốt. Nhân viên tận tình. Nhược điểm:- Hệ thống vòi nước như vậy không hiểu sao còn tồn tại. - Thức ăn sáng quá dở, nguội, quá mặn.', 'Rât tuyet', 'Rat tot, và gan dia diem lan sau ghe lai', 'Toi book 2 booking, moi booking 2 phong/2 dem.Chung toi den khach san luc 16:30 dua xac nhan cua Agoda de nhan phong thi nhan vien bp dat phong xem va bao la khong co phong cho chung toi.Toi that su shock va khong hieu tai sao?Co ta bao chung toi ngoi doi, roi goi hoi khach san khac hoi con phong khong de gui chung tôi sang.Toi den quay le tan hoi thi nhan vien le tan bao la 4 phong a book bi hu may lanh nen gio chung toi se chuyen cac a sang ks khac.Toi bao vo li the, toi co ki su dien o day, cho len kiem tra co dung khong? Sau toi bao la toi se goi cho vu khach san cua tong cuc du lich de ho xu li thi nv le tan bao a cho chut.Sau do co mot co chac la chu hay quan li ra noi chuyen voi nhan vien chu cung khong noi chuyen voi chung toi.den 17:30 thi nhan vien le tan goi chung toi lai cho nhan phong va bao la chung toi nang cap mot phong deluxe len phong family.Thai do cua nhan vien rat la kem.Toi se khong book ks nay du vi tri dep. Phai huan luyen lai nhan vien.', 'Vợ tôi tới khách sạn trễ (máy bay chậm nên tới 12h30 đêm mới tới KS) và được trả lời là hết phòng, họ tìm cho vợ tôi khách sạn khác, nhưng không tương đương nên vợ tôi đã không nhân phòng đêm hôm ấy và nghỉ lại nhà của một người bạn. Họ hẹn trả lại tiền hoặc tiếp tục ở 2 ngày còn lại và trả lại tiền của 1 ngày hôm đầu tiên. Các bạn nên rút kinh nghiệm nếu tới khách sạn muộn thì nên gọi báo trước cho lễ tân vì họ thấy mình tới muộn nên nghĩ là không tới và bán phòng đó cho người khác. Hôm sau vợ tôi quay lại và lễ tân đã xếp cho vợ tôi phòng đẹp, có view ra hồ Gươm, trong phòng có ghế massage (tôi dự kiến đây có thể là một trong những phòng đẹp nhất của khách sạn này). Trả lại tiền cho 1 ngày đầu không nhận phòng 530K (không trả lại chi phí 10% và 5% do agoda thu). Đánh giá chung thì chúng tôi tạm cho là hài lòng, nếu không có trục trặc ngay từ đêm đầu tiên thì đã có thể nói là tuyệt vời. Hãy cẩn thận khi check in muộn các bạn nhé!', 'Ở phòng 40m2 thì Ok', 'phòng ơ đáng giá tiền', 'Mình book phòng có yên cầu phòng trên lầu cao, nhưng khi đến nhận phòng thì cho mình vào phòng ở ngay sảnh, rất ồn ào, lý do là không nhận được booking của agoda. Cũng may là chỉ ở 1 đêm.', 'Địa điểm đẹp, thức ăn khá ổn, tuy phòng không được rộng lắm', 'Ks rất thuận tiện đi lại, nhân viên nhiệt tình và vui vẻ.Phòng cũ cách âm cực kì kém. Cần nâng cấp cơ sở vật chất.', 'sau khi trở về mình có liên hệ tiếp tân, để dọn lại phòng thì họ khẳng định là đã dọn rồi. Sau đó check again thì mới chịu dọn. các dịch vụ khác ok. đồ ăn sáng bị rập khuôn', 'Phòng tương đối nhỏ nhưng khá sạch sẽ, mình tới cho phòng ở dưới đất nên bị ồn ào, không nghỉ ngơi được. Nói chung vị trí tốt, đồ ăn tạm ổn với các món đơn giản. Giá hơi chát.']

reviews: ['máy lạnh đồ cổ chạy ồn lắm lắm. nhưng nhìn chung thì cũng thoải mái, tivi có thêm con android box để coi phim nữa thì ngon.', 'Mình hay phải ra HN dịp cuối tuần nên thường lựa chọn istay 2 để nghỉ ngơi.', 'Mình ở xa nên lúc nhận phòng muốn nhận trước khoảng 2 tiếng. Quan trọng là mình cảm giác giống như đang ở nhà, rất thoải mái.', 'Nhân viên nhiệt tình, dịch vụ tốt', 'Definitely will stay here again', 'Whenever I visit in Hanoi alone, usally go to this hotel because of reasonable pice and kind staffs, but it has a little weak point as big noise of aircondition.', "It's a serviced apartment with basic cooking facilities; large enough for a convenient stay.", "Best I've ever stayed with the price I paid. Room is big and glean, good enough to stay. Can easily reach to Korean restaurants etc... but located in narrow path. Not easy to find and hard to reach by car.", 'i felt cozy when i stay there, very good.', 'good', 'it is near the my dinh that is korean town in the VietNam. nice placement', 'I book a single hotel room but they offer me a mini apartment room', 'good', 'Good', '环境差点，但瑕不掩瑜', '性价比高。满意。如果能够加床就更加好了', '골목길에 위치한것말고는 나름 가성비 좋은 호텔넓고 나름깨끗했어요 전자렌지도 있고 식기세트도 구비되어있어 과일 깍아먹을때 편하더라구요다음에 미딩에 방문할일 있으면 재방문 의사 있습니다', '일단 직원이 친절하고 웃는얼굴로 반겨주고문제있는거잘해결해주고호안끼엠에서 5일정도있어봤는데눅눅한침대와더러운방상태에비해이호텔은 한국이나 해외 5만원 모텔 그이상입니다아파트먼트라는 장점답게 부엌도있고일단너무깨끗하고 한국티비도 나옵니다위치가 찾기 좀어렵지만 구글맵키고 찾아오면문제없습니다근처에 한국식당이나 한국사람도많아서한국 같은분위기도납니다아주아주만족!!!!직원분고맙습니다', '좋은위치', '원배드 룸을 예약했는데 아무런 말없이 그냥 스튜디오로 줌. 항의했더니 내일 바꿔준다 함. 오전 10시까지 방에 있었는데 아무런 말이 없어 나갔다 왔더니 밤에나 바꿔준다 말하길래 됐다 함. 알람을 맞출 필요가 없음. 밑에 있는 과일주스가게임가에서 믹서 돌리는 소리가 엄청남. 여기 세탁기도 있다고 표시되어 있는데 일단 내 방에난 없었음. 미딩 한인촌이랑 가까워서 좋기는함.']

address: 89 Bùi Thị Xuân, Quận Hai Bà Trưng, Quận Hai Bà Trưng, Hà Nội, Việt Nam
reviews: ['phòng ốc sạch sẽ, nhân viên hào nhẫn dễ gần. mình chấm điểm 10/10', 'Khách sạn đến tiện nghi trong phòng mình đều cảm thấy hài lòng. Xung quanh phòng đều là view nhìn ra ngoài. Nếu có dịp tôi vẫn sẽ lựa chọn đây là ksan đáng để trải nghiệm cả về giá cả và chất lượng dịch vụ', 'Đặt 3 đêm nhận phòng sớm và trả phòng trễ có 3 tiếng mà thu bằng cả 1 đêm. Trong khi khách đã đặt cả 3 đêm ở mà không hỗ trợ chút nào.Phòng cách âm không tốt. Địa điểm ok, gần khu trung tâm ăn uống. Nhà vệ sinh bị tắc...', 'Nhân viên nhiệt tình, vui vẻ. Có thêm phòng gym nhỏ phục vụ khách. Phòng rất sạch và mới. Nếu có phục vụ ăn sáng nữa thì quá xuất sắc.', 'Nhân viên rất nhiệt tình, chu đáo!', 'Phòng ốc sạch sẽ, lễ tân lịch sự, chu đáo và ân cần. Sẽ tiếp tục ở đây nếu có dịp công tác tại Hà Nội', 'Tất cả nhân viên ở đây rất rất vui vẻ và hoà nhã, tôi cảm thấy rất hài lòng về thái độ phục vụ cũng như chất lượng dịch vụ ở đây! Đặt biệt là bạn nam làm ca night!', 'Đạt yêu cầu!', 'Thái độ của Lễ Tân và nhân viên đón khách ở cửa rất tốt 👍🏻 Đã quay lại lần t2 và sẽ còn quay lại', 'Chỗ ở sạch sẽ, ấm cúng, nhân viên thân thiện, vị trí thuận lợi, tốt trong tầm giá', 'Phòng sạch sẽ, nhân viên rất hết mình.', 'phòng đẹp, phục vụ tốt,giá rẻ', 'Tôi rất hài lòng về khách sạn, nhân viên phục vụ tốt, phòng ốc sạch sẽ, mùi thơm dễ chịu. Lần sau khi tôi có việc nhất định vẫn sẽ ở khách sạn này.', 'Lần đầu tiên tôi ở một khách sạn đầy đủ tiện nghi, phòng ốc sạch sẽ mà giá cả lại vô cùng hợp lý. Xung quanh khách sạn nhiều chỗ ăn ngon, ngay gần trung tâm thương mại vincom, Hồ Gươm và khu vực phố cổ. Và đặc biệt nhân viên ở đây rất thân thiện, giúp đỡ khách nhiệt tình.', 'Phòng không có cách âm nên hơi ồn,bên ngoài hay bên trong phòng nói gì đều nghe được thấy hết', 'Rất cảm ơn sự thân thiện của nhân viên khách sạn .', 'Thích', 'Giá quá hợp lý so vs địa điểm ks, phòng ốc siêu rộng thoáng, giường to ở gia đình tiện', 'Đi HN mà book vé ở đây thích lắm, nhân viên thân thiện, phòng tiệnghi', 'Nhân viên thân thiện. hotel name: Little Charm Hostel Hà Nội (Little Charm Hanoi Hostel)
address: Số 44 Hàng Bồ, phường Hàng Bồ, Quận Hoàn Kiếm., Phố Cổ, Hà Nội, Việt Nam
reviews: ['Chất lượng phòng ốc tốt, có hồ bơi, nhân viên nhiệt tình', 'Nơi ở thuận tiện cho việc đi lại và có hồ bơi để thư giản.Sẽ quay lại.Hôm đó chỉ bị 1 lỗi nhỏ đặt view hồ bơi nhưng khi nhận lại ko giao đúng nhưng cũng ko phải là lỗi lớn.', 'Tôi đã ở đây 3 đêm ,mọi thứ ở đây đều rất tuyệt . Sẽ quay lại khi đến Hà Nội .', 'Location is in the heart of the Old Quarter, walking distance to plenty of sites, museums, restaurants. Breakfast was adequate. Staff was very helpful in suggesting activities to do during the day. Hostel also offers a free walking tour but I didn’t not have time to do this.Hostel can be a little noisy in the afternoon and early evening around beer hour, so may not be the best for people looking for some quiet. But if you’re out and about doing stuff until late it’s not a problem.', 'A lot of shop and also the night is near there.. that is very convenience..', "This is a luxury hostel. It's a perfect combination of the social vibe of a good hostel, and the cleanliness and comfort of a nice hotel. Clean towels, comfortable beds with very air conditioned rooms, and curtains around the dorm beds for privacy!", "The hostel is really nice and clean, they offer a delicious breakfast with many choices and free beer in the evening, there's a pool too and the staff is great, especially Phuc who was very friendly and super helpful. The free walking tour with him was great and insightful as well. I recommend Little Charm.", 'I had an enjoyable stay at Little Charm.  The location was perfect and right in the middle of all the happs.  The big Turtle lake is a 5-7 min walk away maybe.  The facilities were clean and the staff is amazing at helping with anything you need to get around.  I would definitely recommend this hostel', 'Apart from that aazing buffet breakfast and free beer, that Free Walking Tour should be on your list because Mr.Ha and Mr.Phuc will never disappoint. They were both patient with me knowing I walk too slow with my cane and helped me all the way. Being PWD is not a problem in this place. I will definitely be back! I loved my stay here.', 'If only all hostels could be like this one. Tidy and smart decor, everything was clean and in good repair. The beds were comfy, the linens were clean, and you get a fresh towel everyday if you want one. The lockers were spacious and the privacy curtains were great at keeping the light out. The pool was clean and a nice treat. The showers were hot and the bathrooms were clean with good facilities, great lighting and plugs for hair and make up. The breakfast was superb and the staff spoke reasonable english and could help with anything. The restaurant was also very tasty and reasonably priced. Great location in the old quarter. And the best laundry service I have ever used, it was all so fresh smelling and actually clean.', "It's a remarkably pretty hostel and has nice amenities.The shower stalls are a bit tight and it'd be nicer if they had a place where you could place your things so they don't get splashed on while you shower, but it wasn't that big a deal.Good breakfast selection and the free beer from 5:30-6:00 was a nice touch.", "I've tried three top hostels in Hanoi and I can say this is the best among the best. It's still very new (6 months if I'm not miskaken). It has a very cool swimming pool. Staff were very polite, extremely friendly and very helpful. I highly recommend this hostel.", 'Breakfast free beer free bedroom clean', 'As lovely as this hostel is I can not recommend it to others until it’s policy on providing drinking water from sustainable sources, i.e. not plastic bottles, changes.Initially I asked to refill my water bottle but was refused as its against hostel policy, despite seeing staff drinking from a filtered water tap at the bar. A few emails later I was given approval to have my bottle refilled from this tap. The reasons given for this policy are half baked. #1 the pipes are old, #2 one customer said the water upset their stomach when the hostel previously offered this service. I doubt they’d shut the kitchen if the same happened with the food. We all have a responsibility to treat our planet with care and this hostel is falling short.Other than that the hostel was great apart from staff checking guests into the dorm at 1am and turning the lights on.', 'Really nice hostel in the Old Quarter area. Nice facilities (including swimming pool), staff is very friendly, attentive, and well versed in English; one of the staff speak Spanish.I gave a four star to facilities due to an incident (not serious, at least)... the stairs to the swimming pool are very slippery; I slid on them and fortunately nothing serious happened. I talked with the staff and they said they will report to management. Hope they really do something for the safety of guests using the pool.Besides that, highly recommended place, good value for money, and location is superb!', 'Alex is friendly and helpful so are the other staff. Free day tour by Ha was very enjoyable. The bartender Tung is a great guy, had good conversations with him, very helpful too. This hostel has an atmosphere unique of its own, a great place to hang out with other backpackers. I made good friends here.The Pho Ga that I had here is the best I ever had anywhere in Vietnam.', 'First impression was my first step into this lovely hostel. I stayed there 4 nights. Staff were doing amazing job. I love breakfast choices as well as other foods and beverages. Room, bed, bathroom were super clean. Fast WiFi (as I have to work I need this). Great location, easy to walk around Old Quarter. I will stay here again next time.', 'Super nice staff, especially Mr. Ha!', "I had only one night stay but it's really nice. They offering 3 hrs free walking tour it quite nice. Mr. Ha and Mr. Phuc are from local guys have more in-depth knowledge about the area. We were 10 ppl from the hostel started from Temple Bach ma then we went to food street (dong xuan).. many local foods availabile. Good for street photography. Then we went famous local market complex. After that we went to the long bien bridge. They told history of the bridge. View from the bridge was amazing. In last we went to the train street. We waited for the train between we all had some beers and coffees. The view is so good. With little drizzle we reached to the hostel. If any one visiting Hanoi stay in little charm and your first would be walking to thats you can make new friends... Chit chats.", 'I will recommend this hostel to every backpacker!I stay in this hostel for seven days.The environment is clean and good.The locker are all new and safe.The staff are polite and kind.I like free draft beer time and good music in afternoon and I always drink three bottles!I will book this hostel when I visit Hanoi next time!']

address: 39 Phố Hàng Trống, Quận Hoàn Kiếm, Quận Hoàn Kiếm, Hà Nội, Việt Nam
reviews: ['nhân viên phục vụ rất nhiệt tình, khách sạn sạch, đáng tiền', 'Tôi đã có một kỳ nghỉ thật tuyệt vời tại khách sạn. Trước tiên phải kể đến là vị trí giao thông thuận tiện, và kế đó là những tiện ích tại đây, thái độ phục vụ của nhân viên khách sạn làm tôi thật sự hài lòng. Nếu có cơ hội tôi sẽ đưa gia đình đến để tận hưởng cuộc sống ở khách sạn này.', 'Gần nhà thờ và mọi nơi', 'rat tot toi se som gap lai, cach phuc vu tot cua nhan vien, tu nha hang den bao ve khach san. tuy o lan dau , cung tao cho toi an tuong tot, neu co dip toi se dan doan khach cua toi som gap lai khach san nay, neu cac ban den ha noi mong cac ban den nghi tai khach san gollden lurs, xin cam on agoda da cho toi mot chuyen cong tac y nghia . xin cam on cac ban', 'Nhân viên lễ tân rất thiếu chuyên nghiệp.Khách sạn tự động upgrade phòng khách đặt lên phòng loại khác (phòng bé, k cửa sổ rất bí)Chúng tôi k cảm thấy thoải mái khi lưu trú tại đây.Thái độ của nhân viên tại đây cần được xem lại.Không khách sạn nào lại để 2 chai nước uống trong wc.Rất nhiều thứ khiến tôi không hài lòng', 'Khách sạn sạch sẽ, nhân viên nhiệt tình', 'Tôi và gia đình sẽ quay lại lần tới', 'Nhân viên phục vụ ân cần, nhiệt tình. Phòng sạch sẽ, ấm cúng. Chỉ wifi hơi yếu.', '••••', 'Gần hồ gươm,,,,', 'Rất tốt, tuy nhiên khách sạn sẽ không xuất hóa đơn tài chính nếu bạn đặt phòng qua Agoda.', 'Khách sạn đẹp, sạch sẽ', 'Địa điểm khách sạn thuận tiện cho việc di chuyển. Nhưng khi vào ở thì feel mọi thứ thật ko chuyen nghiệp, thất rối giữa 1 bên ks grand và 1 bên căn hộ khi đăng bài ko rõ ràng để khách có sự nhầm lẫn giữa ks va căn hộ.Sau đó khi nhận phòng cũng ko có sưk hướng dẫn rõ ràng về cách đi lên căn hộ.Sau đó lễ tân gây khó dễ trong việc check in, họ ko có thái độ hỗ trợ khách. Ngoài ra khi mình đã báo check out trễ, họ đồng ý cho check out trễ 1h, set luôn hệ thống, đến hôm sau chưa đến 12 h( giờ check out) lễ tân gọi báo trả phòng sớm với thái độ như đuổi khách, xuống mình nói là mình đã báo check out trễ và bên em ok, thfi dc trả lời vs thái độ rất coi thường khách. Thật tình trong lúc dịch, mọi thứ kinh doanh sẽ khó khăn, nhưng thiết nghỉ mọi nguoi kinh doanh cũng nên tích cực taok sự hiếu khách và tăng cường thái độ phục vụ để bù lại những sự cắt giảm nhằm giữ khác, tăng uy tính doanh nghiệp và thúc đẩy khách nội địa tăng cuòng các hoạt động du lịch lại.', 'Khá sạch sẽ, phục vụ tốt', 'Chỗ ở rất gần với trung tâm, gần ngay bờ hồ Hoàng Kiếm. Khách sạn mới, sạch sẽ. Tuy nhiên, nhân viên chưa thể hiện sự chuyên nghiệp.', 'Khách sạn nằm ngay trung tâm khu phố cổ, thuận tiện dạo bộ các con đường và khu hồ Gươm. Diện tích nhỏ nhưng đầy đủ tiện nghi , sạch đẹp.', 'Rất thuạn loi', 'Ăn sáng không nằm trong cùng mot nơi. Phòng nhỏ, vi trí gần trung tâm.', 'Khu pho co, gan ho Hoan Kiem, phong toi tăm, khong duoc thong thoang, ăn sáng ngon, nhân viên phòng ăn dễ thương.', 'Có thể đi bộ quanh phố Cổ và Hồ Gươm. Nhân viên thân thiện. Phòng nhỏ, tủ đồ lớn chiếm hết không gian trong phòng. Nhà vệ sinh còn bẩn, ga giường có cát.']

address: 48, đường Xuân Diệu, quận Tây Hồ, Hà Nội, Việt Nam, Quận Tây Hồ, Hà Nội, Việt Nam, 100000
reviews: ['Tốt', 'We checked into the hotel. The entrance is quite nice and has statues of dragons etc.  Then we were taken to our lake view room. We found 3 “off” bananas with approx 20 fruit fly around them. Not what you want really and not very appetizing either!After the looking at the room I requested a higher floor room as the view was not so good. Also the bed linen looked “used” which were pointed out to the hotel staff who seemed to think it was acceptable to walk around in your room with bare feet. We were moved to another room. Multiple cleanliness issues; under bed hadn’t been cleaned properly in a long time, bedside table had coffee/tea cup stains on from the previous guest - worst was the toilet with an assortment of hairs left for us in full view. Also massive mark on bedsheet which was visible as soon as you walk in. The whole lot of issues brought into question my trust for them and in turn we decided it best to check out. Therefore unfortunately I would not recommend this hotel', 'No elevator, but they have staff who will carry your luggage.Breakfast is not buffet, but they have really good food!They allow you to leave your luggage at the reception for storage. And they gave us free water when we went back for our bags even if we were checked out already.', 'No elevator but the staff will carry your luggage to the room.Plated breakfast, but food is good.', 'This is a a great place to stay at. Across the street from West Lake the hotel is archtecturally beautiful, the rooms are spacious and everything works efficiently. The breakfast was quite good. The staff are very hospitable and courteous. The main guy at the front desk is a young man who lived in England for a while and speak a very good English. He was very helpful in providing me with all kinds of information about Hanoi. I would want to stay at this place again if I went back to Hanoi. I would give this hotel a rating of 9.0.', 'Interesting style. Large room for price. Usable fridge. Oldish fittings but in keeping with place. Breakfast inedible, but lots of places nearby.', 'Really nice place - large rooms .   Only thing that upset me was the minimal selection of breakfast and inability to get a refill cup of coffee - even if you offered to pay.   ( ultra small coffee cup not sufficient)One star meaning breakfast was very disappointing', 'Good hotel nice and clean , staff were relaxed and helpful', 'Very relaxed hotel, near to everything you need', 'Good location near good restaurants on Tay ho  lake', 'The staff is very supportive and friendly, the space is clean. The hotel is very unique in term of decoration. And since it is located by the West Lake, you can get a chance to walk around this beautiful lake with a great view. Def coming back!', "A good location, staff very helpful, you couldn't ask for more.", 'Rooms were unclean. Especially bathrooms.My Air-conditioner only worked on occasion.Mosquitoes in the room.', 'A good room that was very suitable for my family while visiting me here. Staff were very accommodating and helpful.', 'Architecture was really nice, room spaceous, shower water heater perfectlly working, staff were nice.', 'I booked 3 nights at this hotel based on reviews on this site. When I arrived I was given a filthy room reeking of cigarette smoke. After complaining the room was supposedly cleaned however the filth behind the fridge and bathroom was still there but at least the smoke smell was gone. After travelling for more than14 hours I needed sleep so I was forced to stay the night but left the next day and had to find alternative accommodation myself. This was my 5th visit to Hanoi and this was the most expensive and worst hotel I have every stayed in. Despite complaints to agoda they are still changing me for the one night I had to endure in this dreadful place.', "Don't miss the fish pond.  Great staff and services.", 'Good', 'Big clean room with west lake view is really good. I love their chinese style statues decorated in room and lobby. Without  lift, hotel staff has provided good care for us. Hotel also provide 1 day trip it may suit to anyone who travel alone. All of that, thank all staffs there for your good take care.']

hotel name: Khách sạn Hồng Hà (Hong Ha Hotel)
address: Số 204, Đường Trần Quang Khải, Quận Hòan Kiếm, Quận Hoàn Kiếm, Hà Nội, Việt Nam
reviews: ['Bữa sáng rất ngon, khách sạn nằm ở khu trung tâm nên đi bộ thăm quan được khá nhiều. Điểm trừ là khách sạn ghép 2 giường nhỏ thành giường King nhưng chúng không bằng phẳng nên nằm cực kỳ khó chịu, mong khách sạn kiểm tra và kê lại cho khách', 'Rất ấn tượng với các bạn nhân viên của khách sạn , nhiệt tình chu đáo và phòng sạch sẽ . Lần sau có dịp về hà nội gia đình mình sẽ vẫn tiếp tục lưu trú tại đây', 'Gia hop ly vi tri tot', 'Gần trung tâm, thuận thiện di chuyễn, phòng hơi bí, hành lang đẹp nhưng không thuận tiện để di chuyển, trang thiết bị phòng được. Ăn sáng oke', 'Quá tuyệt', 'Buffet đơn điệu và không ngon lắm, sóng TV kém, phòng tắm hơi nhỏ còn các thứ khác đều tốt, khá hài lòng khi ở đây.', 'Nhân viên thân thiện, phòng đẹp nhưng hơi bí và thiết kế hành lang chưa thuận tiện', 'Thoải mái, rất hài lòng', 'Mình mua chỗ qua Agoda nhưng trang này làm việc rất thiếu chuyên nghiệp, gây nên sự bất tiện vô cùng cho khách hàng ví dụ tôi đã đặt chỗ trả tiền nhưng đến ks báo là chưa thấy agoda báo, rồi gây nên nhiều nhầm lẫn dẫn đến việc mua phòng 2 lần cho 1 ngày, lần sau mình sẽ không bao giờ dùng trang Agoda nữa, đánh giá vô cùng tệ.', 'Vị trí thuận lợi, Ksan rất tốt trong phân khúc 3 sao !', 'Sẽ khá ổn nếu ở khách sạn này, đặc biệt cho những người phải đi công tá c. Hưởng thụ một tối cuối tuần sau khi làm việc xong, mình có thể tranh thủ đi một vòng hồ và khám phá khu chợ đêm. Bữa sáng ngon miệng, tiện lợi và nhân viên thân thiện, tận tình chỉ cho mình những chỗ ăn ngon. Rất vui khi ở đây. Sẽ ghé lại trong chuyến công tác lần sau.', 'Sẽ khá ổn nếu ở khách sạn này, đặc biệt cho những người phải đi công tá c. Hưởng thụ một tối cuối tuần sau khi làm việc xong, mình có thể tranh thủ đi một vòng hồ và khám phá khu chợ đêm. Bữa sáng ngon miệng, tiện lợi và nhân viên thân thiện, tận tình chỉ cho mình những chỗ ăn ngon. Rất vui khi ở đây. Sẽ ghé lại trong chuyến công tác lần sau.', 'Mình đến thăm họ hàng ở Hà Nội và tình cờ tìm được khách sạn  này , tất cả các trang thiết bị đều đầy đủ và dễ dùng. Đặc biệt ấn tượng với chiếc thang máy có thể mở được ở cả 2 bên. Bữa sáng ở đây ổn với nhiều lựa chọn và phù hợp với những người có khẩu vị kén như mình. Sẽ quay trở lại vào một ngày không xa.', 'Tôi rất muốn đến lưu trú ở đây !', 'Rất tiện cho đi lại do ở vị trí thuận lợi.  Lễ tân chưa thực sự chuyên nghiệp. Phòng nồng sặc mùi thuốc lá, yêu cầu nhiều lần mới có người xử lý. Ăn sáng phong phú. Phòng rộng rãi, tiện nghi vừa đủ, sạch.', 'Đệm nằm đau lưng chút vì lún quá', 'Nhân viên vui vẻ, nhiệt tình. Phòng ở sạch sẽ. Bữa ăn sáng ngon miệng.', 'Không giữ uy tín với khách agoda. Đừng book ks này.  Dù đã thanh toán tiền trước nhưng nhân viên vẫn khg nói khg nhận được thông báo từ agoda.', 'Staff were very plesant and always there to help, nothing a problem for them. Free parking was a bonus as its expensive to park car over night in Hanoi. Suggest anyone booking they go for the delux double as more room and not much more expensive. I will stay again next time I am in Hanoi.']

reviews: ['ok', 'Tôi đặt 02 Phòng SUP loại có cửa sổ song đến nơi KS giao cho loại Phòng nhỏ diện tích  khoảng 8-9m2, không có cửa sổ, máy lạnh hoạt động quá yếu phải dùng quạt.  Căn phòng chật chội chỉ có 01 gường 1,4m. Tôi  rất thường xuyên đặt Phòng qua Agoda, song lần này thật thất vọng và mất lòng tin....', 'Phòng khách sạn đẹp nhưng diện tích không đúng như AGODA mô tả là 30 m...nhưng thực tế chỉ khoảng 20 m, giá phòng tại thời điểm nhận phòng chỉ khoảng 900 VND/ 1 đêm x 2 = 1,8 tr..nhưng AGODA thu cao quá 2,721,600 cho 2 đêm.', 'Phòng ốc tốt, sạch sẽ', 'phòng đẹp ,sạch sẽ , nhân viên lịch sự , vị trí thuận lợi , giá phòng hợp lý .  Tuy nhiên phòng ăn sáng hơi bé', 'Rất thuận tiện để ra bờ Hồ , đi bộ qua Hàng Bông rất gần , nhân viên ok , giá thuê  khá hợp lý phù hợp với gia đình có con nhỏ', 'vị trí rất thuận tiện, ngay phố ẩm thực đêm Tống Duy Tân giáp 1 bên là phố Hàng Bông, 1 bên là đường Điện Biên Phủ - nhân viên nhiệt tình và vui vẻ - phòng sạch đẹp - giường êm thoải mái!', 'Rất hài lòng', 'Có chút sự cố với máy lạnh nhưng cuối cùng cũng được giải quyết.', 'Good.', 'Rất có cảm tình với nhân viên phục vụ. Trang trí nội thất đẹp, tiện lợi tuy diện tích phòng nhỏ hẹp mà vẫn thoải mái. Bữa sáng chưa đa dạng và đơn điệu.', 'Phòng không quá to nhưng đầy đủ tiện nghi sạch sẽNgay trung tâm quận hoàn kiếm nên ăn uống hay tham quan đều rất tiện. Đi bộ cũng được', 'Khách sạn tốt', 'Cũng được', 'Ks xinh đẹp nhưng phòng hơi nhỏ, dành công tác và mua sắm hợp lý. Đi sân bay hơi xa', "Good value with agoda discount, went out for 2 days staff said I'd pay same rate when I return, but person didn't honor that when I returned for last night.... charged me double agoda low rate. Breakfast was good, bed and bath good. I had to be as close to embassy as possible for budget hotel", "Located right on the street food centre in the old quarter, it's in a great spot for exploring the centre of town. Comfortable beds, decent bathrooms and clean rooms. The rooms at the back are a little quieter. The staff were very helpful and friendly. The breakfast is of good quality; eggs, ham, waffles, salad cereals fruit and coffee.", 'the tour spots was within walking distance from the hotel.  There were two or three good cafes  in the vicinity of the hotel.  The city map provided by the hotel had good tips and info on the reverse for shopping,museums handicrafts and eateries.  One must visit the craft link on van mieu street for wonderful silk scarfs and souvenirs.']

hotel name: Khách sạn Halo Hà Nội (Halo Hanoi Hotel)
address: Số 33, ngõ 71, phố Đỗ Quang, Phường Trung Hòa, Quận Cầu Giấy, Hà Nội, Việt Nam
reviews: ['Khách sạn sạch, nhân viên thân thiện', 'Nv ksan thân thiện, ksan sạch sẽ, phòng hơi nhỏ vs giường hơi bé nếu kèm trẻ em!', 'Do recommend for Business Travelers. Only one suggestion to the hotel staff - Please turn off the sound of lift-door. When it opens and closes, regardless of the time (1 AM or 2 AM or even anytime lift door is opened or closed), the beeping sound comes. As the hotel is small, every person in the room can hear it and it bothers the sleep as many times as the door is opened or closed. Otherwise all the services are good.Also recommend the staff to:- Have breakfast for Vegans (such as Fruits, Milk, Egg-less bread, Yogurt, Butter, Jam etc.) as well.- Charge less for Laundry as the rates are over $1 per piece. So the cost can be very high for someone to have clothes washed.Overall, a great stay ! Highly recommend !', 'The staff is friendly , the room is clearing .', 'Thanh, their front desk staff is really very helpful and accommodating in spite of some language barrier.  Though place might be a little difficult to find by grab drivers.', "Clean and tidy but it's so difficult to find this hotel.", 'Wifi parfait, café à proximité avec wifi. Taxi dispos. Idéal pour le travail et même en famille', '取引先至近の為、ここに滞在しましたが、・シャワーは水。・朝食は軽食、英語が通じないが韓国語が通じるスタッフが朝食会場におり、ベトナム語か韓国語が話せれば、軽食ではない麺類の注文も可能。・蟻の侵入が激しく、ちょっとした食べかすであっても気持ち悪くなる多さの蟻が部屋に入ってくる。・部屋も臭めでした。当方のように業務上都合により必要に迫られて宿泊する場合は別としても、ご旅行でこちらに滞在されることは強くお勧めしません。', '普普通通', '위치도 좋고 가성비도 좋습니다', '직원이 매우 친절하고 한국말을 할줄압니다조식을 신청하지않았는데 무료로 조식도 제공해주었습니다근처에 한국식당이 많고 맛과 가격도 좋습니다위치가 매우 좋습니다', '추천합니다.', '하노이에 올때마다 이용하는 호텔...여직원 한국말 가능, 벨보이 친절함.시설은 나쁘지는 않지만 조금 노후된 느낌이 큼위치는, 조용하고 깔끔한 지역이라 괜찮고 다른지역으로 이동성도 좋음', '이전 호텔에서 레이트 체크아웃이 안된다해서 몇시간 머물기 위해 찾은 호텔이 다이두옹호텔이엿습니다. 카운터 안내원도 한국말을 매우 유창하게 사용할 수 있어서 놀랏고 방 상태도 훌륭했습니다. 욕실 물도 잘 나왔고 청결했습니다. 다만 아쉬웠던 점은 조그마한 벌레가 돌아다니기에 이부분은 신경써주시길 바랍니다.', '3월에 이용하고 4월에 다시 이용했어요~조식도 더 풍성해지고 좋았습니다^^직원분들도 친절하구요~편안하게 잘 쉬다가 왔어요^^', '방음이 잘 안되는 관계로 소음이 있긴한데 가격이 저렴하니 이정도는 만족스럽긴 합니다. 주변에 식당이랑 편의시설이 잘 되어 있어 다니긴 좋은것 같네요', '저렴한 가격에 잠만 자는건 괜찮아요~다만 방음은 잘 안되어 있는것 같구요~다 그렇지는 않겠지만 제가 잤던 방에서는 엄청 큰 바퀴벌레가 ㅎㅎ조식은 신라면, 쌀국수, 식빵 두개 구운거랑 계란후라이 이렇게 세가지중에 골라서 먹을수 있구요~ 커피도 주구요~전체적으로 가격대비 괜찮은것 같네요', '건물간판이 커서 위치찾기 좋습니다직원이한글을할줄알고 세탁서비스가 있으나 다우니를 안첨가해서 냄새가 그닥입니다방은정말크고방음은 안됩니다 하지만 방이 정말크고 벌레없어서좋습니다', '최고', '긍정적인 마인드가 필요합니다']
