Ngày hôm sau phải quay về lại khách sạn, được nâng cấp phòng nhưng thiết bị hỏng, nước chảy ra ngoài phòng. Điểm cộng là nhân viên thân thiện. Địa điểm tốt.', 'Tôi đã đặt phòng và thanh toán trước gần 1 tháng.Chúng tôi đến Ks và gửi đồ lại để đi chơi lúc 10h. Nhân viên khách sạn kiểm tra giấy tờ, xác nhận mã đặt phòng và nói tôi quay lại sau 2h để nhận phòng.Nhưng khi 11h đêm tôi quay lại, thì 1 bạn nhân viên khác lại nói dối à Agoda chưa gửi thông tin cho KS, mà tất cả các phòng đang sửa trần nhà, nên không còn phòng, và nói tôi qua KS khác ở.Tôi vô cùng bức xúc vì lúc đó đã 11h đêm, không thể tìm KS khác được, trong khi tôi đã check-in và thanh toán đầy đủ. Phải tranh cãi 1 lúc lâu thì nhân viên KS mới đưa tôi chìa khóa phòng.Phòng rất tệ, không như mô tả. Chăn drap rất dơ, thiết bị hư hỏng nhiều.Tôi sẽ không bao giờ quay lại!', 'Tôi book trên agoda đã nhận được email confirm. Nhưng khi đến ks thì lễ tân báo do hệ thống bị lỗi nên không nhận được đặt phòng của tôi và hiện tại đã hết phòng, chuyển tôi qua ks khác. Tôi xuống sân bay và về đến ks gần 23h đêm. Tại sao ks hay agoda không thông báo trước cho tôi về vấn đề này?', 'Chúng tôi 6 người lớn và 1 trẻ em 2,5 tuổi, lấy 3 phòng tại Serenity Hotel 2, ở 4 đêm. Lúc đến nhận phòng, chúng tôi được tiếp đón niềm nở, ân cần, được nhân viên giúp đem hành lý lên phòng một cách vui vẻ (cũng như khi chúng tôi trả phòng, đem hành lý xuống). Phòng có em bé được kê thêm giường nhỏ mà không phụ thu. Trong khoảng 4 đêm, chúng tôi có rời k/s đi tour Hạ Long 3 ngày 2 đêm, hành lý lớn vẫn được k/s giữ hộ một cách an toàn. Thời gian ở tại k/s không khí thân thiện như trong gia đình, được moi sự giúp đỡ khi chúng tôi yêu cầu, Nói chung, chúng tôi hoàn toàn vừa ý và thỏa mãn khi ở tại k/s Serenity 2. Anh Thuần quản lý rất lịch thiệp, vui vẻ và sẵn sàng chỉ dẫn, giúp đỡ khách.Chúng tôi chắc chắn trở lại đây nếu có dịp đến Hà Nội lần sau.', 'Tôi ở đây 3 ngày, từ ngày 8/1 -11/1, cảm nhận đầu tiên về khách sạn là mọi người ở đây rất thân thiện, rất chuyên nghiệp, phòng tuy hơi nhỏ 1 chút nhưng rất sạch sẽ, thoái mái, đồ ăn sáng rất ngon, cảm ơn chị lễ tân và em trai đã rất tận tình, lần sau chắc chắn tôi sẽ ghé nếu ra Hà Nội.', 'Tôi đã đặt phòng ở ks Hanoi Serenity 2 nhiều lần, hôm nay tôi sẽ bay chuyến đêm ra Hà Nội để sáng sớm mai lo công việc và vẫn lựa chọn ks này, vị trí ks nằm ngay khu phố cổ rất thuận tiện cho việc đi chơi ngắm phố phường, dạo mát buổi tối, xung quanh rất nhiều hàng quán ăn uống, cũng gần khu trung tâm những văn phòng, cơ quan, tiện cho nhiều dịp đi công tác của tôi. Nhân viên ks phục vụ cực kỳ chu đáo, từ lễ tân đến nhân viên dọn phòng, tôi rất hài lòng điểm này. Về thức ăn, do tôi chưa có dịp nào thử ăn ở ks, bữa sáng kèm theo nhưng tôi đi công việc khá sớm nên thường bỏ qua ko ăn sáng.', 'Tôi ra Hà Nội công tác vài ngày, cần ở gần đường Trần Phú nên tôi chọn khách sạn Serenity 2, đi ra văn phòng tôi cần làm việc ko đến 5p, khách sạn này tuy khá nhỏ nhưng tiện nghi đầy đủ, phục vụ lại rất chu đáo nhiệt tình, thức ăn thì tôi chưa thử nên ko nhận xét gì, gần khách sạn thì rất nhiều quán ăn, ăn vặt các loại... nói chung tôi ko có điểm nào chê.', 'địa điểm lý tưởng cho những chuyến du ngoạn phố cổ Hà Nội, gần các địa điểm ăn uống nổi tiếng tại Hà Nội, tuy nhiên ở tầng 5 vào buổi sáng các nhân viên phục vụ phòng hơi ồn. Nhưng thái độ phục vụ của nhân viên lễ tân niềm nở và tự giác giúp đỡ khách hàng. \r\r1 khách sạn đáng để cho các bạn nghỉ ngơi sau những ngày khám phá Hà Nội.', "Khách sạn và nhân viên phục vụ rất tốt.  Họ đều nói được tiếng Anh nên không có vấn đề nếu không nói được tiếng Việt.  Địa điểm rất là thuận tiện, chỉ cần đi bộ khoảng 10 đến 15' là đến được các thắng cảnh như hồ Hoàn Kiếm, Nhà Hát, ect..", 'Khi tôi nhận phòng. KS báo ko còn phòng và chuyển khách sạn khác cùng hệ thống. Nhưng khi nhận phòng mà khách sạn đổi, tiện nghi ở đây ko cùng hạng phòng tôi đã đặt, còn thua 1 nhà nghỉ bình dân. Cửa sổ ko có khoá, tivi ko coi được ( có tiếng ko có hình), tôi đặt phòng có kèm ăn sáng nhưng lễ tân báo ko có. Tôi gọi cho lễ tân khách sạn HaNoi serenity hotel 2 yêu cầu đổi phòng thì nói hết phòng. Nói tôi Thông cảm Và ko đưa ra phương án giải quyết. Tôi ko đồng ý và gọi tổng đài hỗ trợ Agoda rất nhiều cuộc mặc dù bị tính tiền nhiều nhưng vẫn không duoc giai quyet hỗ trợ. Trong khi đó gần 2h sáng, gia đình tôi buộc phải ở tạm. Tôi yêu cầu khách sạn và AGoda giải quyết thỏa đáng khiếu nại của tôi', 'Khách sạn có vị trí rất tốt, ngay trung tâm phố cổ Hà Nội, nhân viên thân thiện.', 'sach se,nhan vien le do, toi rat hai long', 'Sẽ trở lại', 'nhân viên dể thương , đáng yêu . lúc đến nhận phòng khách sạn đã hết phòng nên chuyển chúng tôi qua khách sạn cùng hệ thống cũng rất tốt . cám ơn khách sạn nhé.']

reviews: ['Hài lòng về mọi thứ', 'Hài lòng về mọi thứ', 'Khách sạn tiện nghi, sạch sẽ, gần trung tâm. Giá thuê hơi cao so với nhiều địa phương khác, nhưng chấp nhạn được', 'Khách sạn nói chung là tạm được xong thật đáng buồn vì khách sạn cũng như nhiều khách sạn khác ở Hà nội không có bãi đỗ xe lên không thuận tiện nếu nghỉ tại khách sạn mà có đi xe Ô tô...', 'Giá cả hợp lý, sẽ quay lại', 'Nhân viên lễ tân không thân thiện, khi có yêu cầu late check out ngay lập tức đòi thu phí vì khách book qua Agoda.', 'Giá hợp lý, vị trí thuận lợi', 'Giá tốt, vị trí thuận lợi, nhân viên thân thiện.', 'nhân viên có vẻ không thích người miền nam, phòng có ban công và view đẹp.', 'Đồ ăn sáng chưa đa dạng', 'Không có chỗ đỗ xe', 'Khách sạn ở trung tâm HN, vì thế nên rất ồn. Phòng thì hơi nhỏ mặc dù đã đc nâng hạng phòng. Nhìn chung không xứng đáng với những gì quảng cáo!', 'Vị trí đẹp gần hồ Gươm, nhân viên thân thiện. Tuy nhiên lễ tân bố trí phòng 404, không có view nên nhìn rất tù túng. Cảm giác phòng không được vệ sinh lắm.', 'Tốt', "The street noise in all of Hanoi takes some getting used to, but you will notice a perfect quiet calm from midnight to 4AM.  This hotel seems immaculately new, perfectly clean, nice wood floors and bathrooms of stone.  My experience of five days in Hanoi was welcomed every night by this beautiful respite.  I talked with tourists that had stayed in many hotels around Vietnam, and their take was all of the others places were aesthetically pleasing, but the infrastructure like plumbing, water pressure did not match the aesthetics, whereas Lan Vien was an amazing place - Truly - and the buffett breakfast with warm service staff -  not to miss for sure.  Don't believe that something this great exists elsewhere in Hanoi unless you go Hilton or ?  Enjoy!!!", 'Spend few days for working trip at hanoi, first time to stay at this hotel. so far the hotel is new and quite spacious, the staff are well trained. all the necessary stuff was arranged perfectly.\ri will suggest to put more effort on the breakfast, not much variety especially for asia food.', 'i booked 2 superior room but both were upgraded to excutive room and one room even has balcony. the rooms are large and clean. although i could use wifi with my iphone, i found it very thankful that they even prepared a lan cable in the drawer so that i could use with my note pc which is restricted with wifi. \rthe staffs were very nice and helpful. they even helped me to peel the grapefruit i had bought from a super market. i definately will stay at this hotel next time.', 'Nó thing tocomplain', 'The hotel is older but maintained very well and modern. The staff was always very friendly & helpful. We stayed in a room with a city view & balcony which allowed us to sit outside and relax at times. The hotel is within close walking distance to the park & “walking street” areas that are closed to vehicles on the weekends. There were numerous restaurants, coffee shops, movie theaters, shopping areas, etc within a short walk of the hotel. The complimentary morning breakfast selections at the 11th floor restaurant were more than satisfying. Overall, we truly enjoyed our stay & would recommend the hotel to anyone seeking a comfortable stay in a great location.', 'I stayed for 5 nights for a business trip. All staffs are friendly and willing to help. I think the service that could be improved tho is the variety of food for room service and an option for Halal food. The hotel was accessible and near food stalls. There’s also Starbucks at the lobby as alternative dining option. If you are a Muslim traveller, there is a certified Halal restaurant two blocks away from the hotel, around 10-minute walk.']

hotel name: Khách Sạn Merci Hà Nội (Hotel Merci Hanoi)
address: 32 Lý Thái Tổ, khu phố cổ, Quận Hòan Kiếm, Quận Hoàn Kiếm, Hà Nội, Việt Nam
reviews: ['Nghỉ ngắn ngày tại merci. Chúng tôi đã rất vui vẻ và hài lòng. Nhân viên thân thiện tận tình giúp chúng tôi lựa chọn điểm ăn nhà hàng book tour.Cảm ơn các bạn', 'mọi thứ đều cơ bản. Nhân viên thân thiện hữu ích, có thể giúp bạn đặt tour đi chơi khắp nơi với chi phí rẻ .', 'Phòng dơ, ẩm mốc, có mùi ẩm thấp.Giường bong tróc, có dán.Nhà vệ sinh nước chảy gỉ gỉ từ trên đầu xuống toalet, chắc do nhà vệ sinh ở trên làu bị hư. Mình rất là ớn vụ này.Hàng hoá, giường hư để chắn hết lối hành lang thoát hiểm. Rất nguy hiểm đến tính mạng nếu có vấn đề gì xảy ra.Quản lý ăn nói vô học khi mình bày tỏ những gì trải nghiệm để xin đổi phòng khác. Và khi mình có yêu cầu trả lại tiền đã lỡ book 3 ngày thì hoàn toàn trốn tránh. Không giải quyết.Đây là lần cuối mình sử dụng dịch vụ của agoda. Cảnh báo với các bạn book trả trước trên app agoda: hình ảnh trên trang chỉ mang tính chất minh hoạ, ra thực tế rất là gớm, không thể ở được. Mình có khiếu nại agoda để xin lấy tiền lại vì lỡ trả tiền hết 3 ngày tuy mình chưa ở được phút giây nào thì bị từ chối. Mình đã chụp hình đầy đủ vấn đề của phòng mình nhận và yêu cầu giải quyết thì phía agoda thông báo là sẽ nghe theo phía khách sạn là không trả cọc cho mình. Thật là vô lí cho việc treo đầu dê bán thịt chó. Nhưngx ai đang sử dụng agoda thì hãy cẩn thận cho việc trả trước tiền phòng. Đối với mình thì cách xử lý của agoda k bảo vệ người tiêu dùng đâu. Nên mọi người cần thận trọng sử dụng app khác để bôkz kẻo tránh mất tiền oan như mình', 'Theo như thỏa thuận thì 13h nhận phòng nhưng nhân viên nói mình chờ 14h mới đc nhận phòng chờ khách trả phòng mới đc vào, muốn vào luôn thì thêm 300k.Phòng ẩm mốc, mùi hôi nhiềuLần đầu cũng là lần cuối ở ksan nàyMong mọi người tìm hiểu kĩ trước khi booking.', 'Khách sạn cũ như nhà nghỉ. Đồ đạc cũ. Đồ ăn sáng ít và chán. Tôi ngồi ăn sáng còn nghe 3-4 nhân viên nói chuyện về nhóm khách tây rất to, dùng các từ như bọn nó, mất dạy... Nhân viên mà nói về khách như thế thì chẳng hiểu làm dịch vụ làm gì', 'Mọi thứ ok ngoại trừ ko sạch sẽ lắm', 'Phòng đẹp và nhân viên rất chuyên nghiệp', 'Tivi trong phòng chỉ có tiếng và màn hình đen xì, báo lễ tân và nhận được câu trả lời là tivi bị cháy bóng hình. Chúng tôi ở 2 đêm nhưng tivi không được sửa chữa và cũng không được đổi. Lễ tân giao tiếp cộc lốc mất lịch sự. Nói chung không đáng đồng tiền và tôi có cảm giác bị lừa khi ở khách sạn Merci, Agoda nên xem xét lại khách sạn kiểu như này nếu không muốn mất sự tin tưởng của khách hàng với sự đánh giá sao của Agoda. Rất thất vọng ...', 'Phòng vệ sinh không sạch sẽ. Không có thang máy đi từ tầng trệt lên tầng 1. Cầu thang bộ khá hẹp khó di chuyển', 'Khách sạn sạch, phòng tắm hơi nhỏ, tầng 1,2 thi thoảng vẫn ám mùi đồ ăn', 'Rất tốt', 'Rất Tốt', 'Rất hài lòng', 'Gia đình mình ở 2 đêm, nhưng chỉ cho có 2 chai nước 1 phòng cho cả 2 đêm (ở các khách sạn khác, ở mỗi đêm đều được cho 2 chai nước trong phòng). Khi hỏi Nhân viên, nhận được câu trả lời là cách ngày mới cho 1 lần nước, như vậy nếu mình ở 5 đêm thì chỉ được uống nước 2 ngày thôi sao???? Một chai nước suối nhỏ thật sự không đáng bao nhiêu tiền, nhưng đừng vì như vậy mà làm cho khách phiền lòng.', 'Tôi đến nhận phòng lúc 22h00 sau ngày làm việc mệt mỏi, nhân viên lễ tân thông báo hết phòng và đề nghị đặt phòng cho tôi ở khách sạn khác. Tôi không đồng ý và yêu cầu hoàn tiền cho tôi nhưng cũng không được sau một hòi xin ý kiến. Tôi cũng nhận được phòng mình đặt qua agoda. Quá thất vọng về sự không chuyên nghiệp không bao giờ quay lại dù giá rẻ bao nhiêu', 'Địa điểm chỗ ở khá ổn so với mức giá. Nhưng nhà vệ sinh hơi cũ.Nhân viên nam thì ok nhưng nhân viên nữ không ổn. Khi khách xuống ăn sáng, nhân viên nữ nhìn thấy nhưng làm ngơ và tám chuyện và để khách ngồi hơi lâu. Thái độ phục vụ khách ko chuyên.Nhân viên có vẻ không nhiệt tình với khách việt như mình. Không có mấy hấp dẫn về dịch vụ nên có lẽ sẽ không quay lại lần 2', 'cơ sở vật chất xuống cấp, thang máy hư, nước chảy yếu, cảm giác phòng không sạch', 'giá hợp lý,  ngay trung tâm,  sạch đẹp.', 'Khách san khong giao phong dung cho khách . Phong có mùi , cầu thang dơ, máy lanh chay yếu', 'Khách sạn cũ,thang máy bất tiện. Giá phòng cao']

address: 26 Âu Triệu, Quận Hòan Kiếm, Quận Hoàn Kiếm, Hà Nội, Việt Nam
reviews: ['Staff is super friendly. Most spoke english pretty well. Great location, but there are early morning chuch bells nearby.  Good breakfast (recommend the noodle bowl).  Good restaurants nearby. Great place to stay.', 'Very pleasant stay. Impressed with the reception and other staff members who are so willing to make our experience comfortable and fulfilled. Will come back there for our next trip to the Viet Nam capital city.', 'Enjoyed my time there very much.  Coming back to the hotel each day and greeted by staff was a real pleasure.  Especially thought that Mai was terrific and gets my vote as the nicest of a really outstanding group of front desk people.  Was there around Christmas.  Church bells were very loud and caroles were playing even until late at night.  So if you are OK with that, (room comes with nice ear plugs!) then the hotel rates highly for charm and comfort.', 'We stayed at this hotel twice at the beginning and end of our trip to Vietnam. The staff are so great and friendly, rooms are very clean and big. Breakfast is sooooo delicious! The only think to note is that they have 2  Hotel, one of them is Cinnamon Cathedral  Hotel and one Cinnamon Hotel( very close to each other). We booked with Cinnamon Hotel but then we moved to Cinnamon Cathedral Hotel as the bathrooms are better. Anyway Loved it and will definitely recommend this.', 'Showing its age, the Cinnamon is in an excellent location for tourists. Breakfast is two doors doen at another Cinnamon- not a problem, but could be an issue for some.Staff were unfailingly attentive, friendly and helpful. I stayed two nights then one night a week later. Spotty at first, the wifi was nonexistent subsequently - definitely a dreback.', 'Very good location.', 'Super hotel, well placed. We were given an upgrade room on the top floor of the Cinnamon Cathedral Hotel, two doors away. Wonderfully designed with white walls and black stained wood, balcony overlooking the cathedral roof. Large bathroom. No lift, but worth the walk up. Delicious breakfast and a generous pack up when we had to leave early one morning. The cathedral bells start at 5 am when most locals get up. Do the same and join in the Tai Chi on the doorstep or by the lake. I slept on, but witnessed the city coming to life on another occasion when I got back into Hanoi at 5:30 on the sleeper train from Lao Cai.', "Lovely staff, great breakfast, fabulous location. The one downside: the bells of the church across the street peal every 15 minutes. And the 5am ringing goes on for several long minutes.Also, the safe in the room is not attached to anything. Anyone can potentially lift it and walk away with it. :) I didn't worry that this might happen (and clearly, it never has), but it would be a little more reassuring if they bolted it to something.But the niggles aside, this was a very cute place and was great value for money. I will be back.", 'Wonderful staff throughout our stay! Thuy, May and Phoenix are wonderful ladies with big smiles and lots of energy! They really got to know us and look after us. Lovely rooms and very well situated hotel.', "We were a group of 4 who stayed as 2 couples. The staff were so lovely and attentive. Especially Tracy and Phoenix who were so friendly and couldn't do enough for us. We had a great stay and would certainly recommend this hotel.", 'Delighted to have had the opportunity  to enjoy the delights of this hotel and to experience the staffs willingness to assist where ever they could with a special word for Stacey and Kim., I should note all the staff I came in contact with were a delight .', 'Rreally enjoyed staying at cinnamon hotel. Hotel staff were always nice to me and helped me so much to find location etc. Their towel arts on the bed were cute and breakfast was lively. It is located in a popular area, where church, restaurants and cafes are around, so I heard noise during night though. Was fortunate that I found this hotel in Hanoi.', "Overall, our stay was very pleasant. The staff spoke good English and were very helpful and accommodating. The room we stayed in was big and very comfortable. Cinnamon Hotel's location is great -- beside St. Joseph's Cathedral, surrounded by interesting shops and restaurants, and just walking distance to the lake. I would definitely recommend staying here when in Hanoi.", 'I enjoyed the stay, it was good value for money and the staff were very friendly and engaging.  The bells of the cathedral are noticeable at first (especially at 0500!) but you just get used to them, & they supply earplugs if you need.  the room was large, cool & dark when required & bright when not.  The bed was huge, enough to squeeze in a small family.  Madame Hien around the corner, night market a short stroll away & Ta Hien bars too.  Represents excellent value for money & will recommend to friends.', "We can't speak highly enough of our stay at the Cinnamon. Our room was beautifully presented and clean, Ms Nguyen and her team were very welcoming and helpful and even changed our room when the wifi wouldn't work. It was no trouble for us to leave our suitcases when we went to Halong Bay; then when we got back upgraded us to their new hotel two doors down at 38 Au Trieu. The cathedral bells didn't bother us at all. If we ever go back to Hanoi we wouldn't hesitate to stay there again.", 'Staff at hotel were amazing, made our first night in Vietnam an experience to remember. Helpful tips about where to eat, booked train tickets and even left weather forecast for us. On our return from a trip on the night train they happily welcomed us back at 5.30am and gave us a room to shower and sleep. Lovely designed rooms in superb location. Would definitely come back.', 'We loved our stay at the Cinnamon Hotel . We extended by three nights because the location and staff were so good . The church bells do chime regularly, but if you are staying next to a Cathedral it is what you would expect.', "Everything was great! Included breakfast was good and more than enough food. The rooms were clean and next to the cathedral to hear the bells if you choose not wear the eearplugs. The only thing I would be wary of is using the staff as your travel agent. I had a couple of issues and wasn't totally satisfied with their travel arrangements l. I do think this maybe dependent on which staff member you work with. However there are plenty of travel agencies around the city that can provide this service.", "Very comfortable. The bells of St Joseph's ring matins at 5am which can be a little disconcerting. But the location is very charming. A few hundred metres to Hoan Kiem lake and very close proximity to 2 of Didier Corlou's fantastic restaurants. Try both - Madame Hien's is a treat. Great Pho for breakfast and kids will love the pancakes. Very big breakfast. Bar fridge prices very reasonable. They are opening a bigger version of the hotel a few places up the street and it looks as if it will be great too. Bathrooms are very basic - but the ambience and charm of the place works. Don't stay here if you want 5 star luxury - but for comfort and value it cannot be beaten. And the staff are the nicest people you will ever meet. When my daughter got a little sick they offered to send up a ginger tea and take me to the pharmacy. It feels like being a guest in a home. The design is elegant and simple."]

hotel name: Khách Sạn Merci Hà Nội (Hotel Merci Hanoi)
address: 32 Lý Thái Tổ, khu phố cổ, Quận Hòan Kiếm, Quận Hoàn Kiếm, Hà Nội, Việt Nam
reviews: ['Nghỉ ngắn ngày tại merci. Chúng tôi đã rất vui vẻ và hài lòng. Nhân viên thân thiện tận tình giúp chúng tôi lựa chọn điểm ăn nhà hàng book tour.Cảm ơn các bạn', 'mọi thứ đều cơ bản. Nhân viên thân thiện hữu ích, có thể giúp bạn đặt tour đi chơi khắp nơi với chi phí rẻ .', 'Phòng dơ, ẩm mốc, có mùi ẩm thấp.Giường bong tróc, có dán.Nhà vệ sinh nước chảy gỉ gỉ từ trên đầu xuống toalet, chắc do nhà vệ sinh ở trên làu bị hư. Mình rất là ớn vụ này.Hàng hoá, giường hư để chắn hết lối hành lang thoát hiểm. Rất nguy hiểm đến tính mạng nếu có vấn đề gì xảy ra.Quản lý ăn nói vô học khi mình bày tỏ những gì trải nghiệm để xin đổi phòng khác. Và khi mình có yêu cầu trả lại tiền đã lỡ book 3 ngày thì hoàn toàn trốn tránh. Không giải quyết.Đây là lần cuối mình sử dụng dịch vụ của agoda. Cảnh báo với các bạn book trả trước trên app agoda: hình ảnh trên trang chỉ mang tính chất minh hoạ, ra thực tế rất là gớm, không thể ở được. Mình có khiếu nại agoda để xin lấy tiền lại vì lỡ trả tiền hết 3 ngày tuy mình chưa ở được phút giây nào thì bị từ chối. Lovely rooms and very well situated hotel.', "We were a group of 4 who stayed as 2 couples. The staff were so lovely and attentive. Especially Tracy and Phoenix who were so friendly and couldn't do enough for us. We had a great stay and would certainly recommend this hotel.", 'Delighted to have had the opportunity  to enjoy the delights of this hotel and to experience the staffs willingness to assist where ever they could with a special word for Stacey and Kim., I should note all the staff I came in contact with were a delight .', 'Rreally enjoyed staying at cinnamon hotel. Hotel staff were always nice to me and helped me so much to find location etc. Their towel arts on the bed were cute and breakfast was lively. It is located in a popular area, where church, restaurants and cafes are around, so I heard noise during night though. Was fortunate that I found this hotel in Hanoi.', "Overall, our stay was very pleasant. The staff spoke good English and were very helpful and accommodating. The room we stayed in was big and very comfortable. Cinnamon Hotel's location is great -- beside St. Joseph's Cathedral, surrounded by interesting shops and restaurants, and just walking distance to the lake. I would definitely recommend staying here when in Hanoi.", 'I enjoyed the stay, it was good value for money and the staff were very friendly and engaging.  The bells of the cathedral are noticeable at first (especially at 0500!) but you just get used to them, & they supply earplugs if you need.  the room was large, cool & dark when required & bright when not.  The bed was huge, enough to squeeze in a small family.  Madame Hien around the corner, night market a short stroll away & Ta Hien bars too.  Represents excellent value for money & will recommend to friends.', "We can't speak highly enough of our stay at the Cinnamon. Our room was beautifully presented and clean, Ms Nguyen and her team were very welcoming and helpful and even changed our room when the wifi wouldn't work. It was no trouble for us to leave our suitcases when we went to Halong Bay; then when we got back upgraded us to their new hotel two doors down at 38 Au Trieu. The cathedral bells didn't bother us at all. If we ever go back to Hanoi we wouldn't hesitate to stay there again.", 'Staff at hotel were amazing, made our first night in Vietnam an experience to remember. Helpful tips about where to eat, booked train tickets and even left weather forecast for us. On our return from a trip on the night train they happily welcomed us back at 5.30am and gave us a room to shower and sleep. Lovely designed rooms in superb location. Would definitely come back.', 'We loved our stay at the Cinnamon Hotel . We extended by three nights because the location and staff were so good . The church bells do chime regularly, but if you are staying next to a Cathedral it is what you would expect.', "Everything was great! Included breakfast was good and more than enough food. The rooms were clean and next to the cathedral to hear the bells if you choose not wear the eearplugs. The only thing I would be wary of is using the staff as your travel agent. I had a couple of issues and wasn't totally satisfied with their travel arrangements l. I do think this maybe dependent on which staff member you work with. However there are plenty of travel agencies around the city that can provide this service.", "Very comfortable. The bells of St Joseph's ring matins at 5am which can be a little disconcerting. But the location is very charming. A few hundred metres to Hoan Kiem lake and very close proximity to 2 of Didier Corlou's fantastic restaurants. Try both - Madame Hien's is a treat. Great Pho for breakfast and kids will love the pancakes. Very big breakfast. Bar fridge prices very reasonable. They are opening a bigger version of the hotel a few places up the street and it looks as if it will be great too. Bathrooms are very basic - but the ambience and charm of the place works. Don't stay here if you want 5 star luxury - but for comfort and value it cannot be beaten. And the staff are the nicest people you will ever meet. When my daughter got a little sick they offered to send up a ginger tea and take me to the pharmacy. It feels like being a guest in a home. The design is elegant and simple."]

hotel name: Khách sạn Oriental Pearl Hà Nội (Hanoi Oriental Pearl Hotel )
address: 06 Đình Ngang, Cửa Nam, Hoàn Kiếm , Hanoi Địa điểm được giới thiệu nhiều nhất, Quận Hoàn Kiếm, Hà Nội, Việt Nam, 10000
reviews: ['Khách sạn có vị trí thuận lợi, cách Ga Hà Nội tầm 700m, cách Hồ Gươm và Trung tâm Phố Cổ tầm 1,5 km. Xung quanh có nhiều khu vực ăn uống (gần phố Tống Duy Tân có nhiều quán ăn đêm). Mình có đặt hai phòng gia đình, phòng sạch sẽ và thoáng, giá cả phải chăng. Mỗi phòng có 2 giường lớn, có tủ đựng đồ, tủ lạnh, tivi, điều hòa... Nhìn chung khá đầy đủ các tiện ích. Nhận viên khách sạn rất thân thiện, nhiệt tình.', 'Giá phòng và vị trí phù hợp. Phòng khá rộng nhưng thiết bị khá cũ. Ăn sáng đơn điệu. Không có nhiều thực đơn để lựa chọn, chỉ có phở gà, trứng và bánh mỳ. Khi xin thêm thức ăn nhân viên vẫn cung cấp nhưng có vẻ không hài lòng. Nhân viên lễ tân thân thiện và khá nhanh nhẹn.', 'khách sạn sạch sẽ, nhân viên thân thiện, rất hài lòng.', 'Khách sạn ở đây rất sạch sẽ, vị trí ở khu trung tâm rất thuận tiện để tham quan TP Hà Nội. Mình đặc biệt rất vui vì sự nhiệt tình và thân thiện của các bạn nhân viên. Gia đình mình đi nhóm 12 khách di chuyển từ Sapa về nên rất mệt, vừa đến khách sạn đã được các bạn nhân viên  chuẩn bị nước, trò chuyện rất thân thiện. Khách sạn còn giúp đặt xe cho nhà mình ra sân bay vào sáng hôm sau. Dù ở lại đây chỉ một tối nhưng cảm giác của mình rất thỏai mái và cảm thấy gần gũi. Đây sẽ là một trong những lựa chọn khách sạn tốt nhất mà mình sẽ giới thiệu cho bạn bè, người thân nếu có dip ghé thăm Hà Nội.', 'Nói chung ổn', 'Lần sau tôi sẽ quay lại đây', 'Khách sạn mới nên phòng sạch sẽ, nhân viên đều rất nhiệt tình và thân thiện. Bữa sáng nấu rất ngon, vị trí gần nhiều quán ăn.', "The staff were really attentive and friendly .Special thanks to Ms Apple she is realky charming ,knowledgable  she always smile and welcomed us she made our stay pleasurable .She also helpd us arranged a very nice  Ha Long Bay Cruise with breathtaking scenery and bus to Phong Nha and Binh Binh with a very competative prices.....we did have an awesome trip when we decided to book a trip with her. our hotel's bed is very comfy,room really clean and spacious .I did a great sleep here.Thank for all staff made our trip become safer and perfect.Highly recommended Hanoi Oriental Pearl Hotel !!!!", 'Khách sạn đầy đủ tiện nghi, nhân viên rất nhiệt tình, trong suốt thời gian ở khách sạn, nhóm chúng tôi cảm thấy rất thỏai mái. Hi vọng nếu có dịp sẽ tiếp tục quay lại ở khách sạn này 👍👍👍', 'Exceptional helpful staff', 'Good location.  good service,  good staff.  Everything were perfect. Thanks you so much', 'Mọi thứ thật sự quá tốt. Vị trí tuyệt với ngay gần ga Hà Nội, nhân viên nhiệt tình. Trang thiết bị nội thất hiện đại. Phòng rất sạch sẽ', 'Vị trí gần Hồ , phố đi bộ. Phòng rộng rãi. Thiết kế đẹp. Sạch sẽ', '+ Hotel was situated in an area within a walking Distance to load of eateries, shops and attractions + Room was clean and reasonably equipped + Filling breakfast with choices of5-6 freshly cocked hot dishes and some snacks to grab+ Staffs were very kind and attentive. My mum has forgotten a mobile phone on the vn flight to Hanoi. The receptionist offered a hotel phone to call lost&found office and kept contact with them. They found it at last. Big thanks!- Slight issue for a rattling aircon which made some noise.', 'Staff was very nice and helpful. The building is a bit old but contains an elevator. The room is clean. Breakfast is serve 7 to 10 am and you can order as much as you can. Overall staying here is worth the money and suitable for those who not fussy.', 'Staff remembered us from our previous stay and ensured we were really happy with our room and had everything we could ever want/need! Staff, especially Ms Apple, were always so happy to help with any queries, always going above and beyond with recommendations, helping us book a bus to Dien Bien Phu, giving directions and advice on what to see & do, etc. Ms Apple let us keep our bags at the hotel whilst we were away in Ha Long Bay for 2 days (hotel does trips but we had organised on our own) and then she anticipated the time of our return and put the aircon on in our room (just the little things)! At breakfast there is a wide variety of Vietnamese and western foods and you can order more than one option! There is also fresh fruit, juice, toast & tea and coffee that you can help yourself to. Staff take into consideration what you want to eat and can adapt the breakfast to suit your taste. Thank you to all staff for making the hotel feel like a home away from home!', 'Staff friendly, rooms clean (holidaying with another couple), location great (right next to train street, on the edge of the old quarter). We arrived early at around 6am and we were able to check in early without the fee because our train was unexpectedly early and staff were kind. Really loved our stay! Breakfast was delicious.', "Triple sharing room, given 1 queen+1 super single bed, no window. Good TV programs with some international channels. Breakfast average, may order from list for individual & they prep. The common buffet is basic & very limited. Pros: Cleanliness of room was superb. Front desk staff were English speaking, really friendly & helpful. Even received acknowledgement email from hotel personally before arrival, to offer recommendation  & help. Quite accessible location yet away from buzz; near eating street, train street, weekend night market, massage, food & bar street, walkable to St. Joseph's cathedral & lake. Cons: bathroom shower can be challenging with quite weak pressure. Toiletries provided but dispenser not working. I've always brought mine.", "Just got back from a 5 days 4 nights in Hanoi, where we stayed at the Hanoi Oriental Pearl. Very conveniently located near the Old Quarter and several Embassies (including Canada, and Thailand, in our case). The hotel is very close to the railroad, and rooms with balcony face busy streets, so if you have light sleep and require quietness, you might want to look for something else. However, if you enjoy this busy city's sounds and you can sleep through it, the rooms were very clean (although they show a little age), comfortable, and the service was simply amazing.  Everyone in the hotel went out of their way to assist us and share their knowledge about the city.  A very cheap but extremely enjoyable stay with the nice staff at Oriental Pearl. Will definitely consider next time we travel to beautiful Hanoi!", 'The hotel is quite far from the city center but the walk was tolerable. The room was spacious for the group. The bed was comfortable. Breakfast had a good variety. Good value for money.']

address: 71 Hàng Lược, Hoàn Kiếm, Hà Nội, Chợ Đồng Xuân, Hà Nội, Việt Nam
reviews: ['Tôi để bảng nhờ dọn phòng nhưng nhân viên chỉ dọn đúng toilet. Giường ngủ 3 đêm vẫn để rất bẩn. Mền đắp chỉ là 1 miếng dra mỏng. Phòng bạn tôi máy điều hòa rất cũ. Địa điểm thuận tiện nhưng cách phục vụ và tiện nghi không tốt.', 'Chuyến bay của tôi đến trễ, và khi đến khách sạn báo là đã không giữ phòng cho tôi. Sau đó, họ chuyển tôi sang 1 khách sạn khác và nhân viên ở khách sạn đó rất trịch thượng, sau khi tôi ở đó 1 ngày và quay lại hỏi xem đã có phòng chưa, thì tôi lại được chuyển sang 1 khách sạn khác nữa. Tuy chuyến đi của tôi đã qua lâu, nhưng tôi vẫn muốn viết vì đó là 1 ấn tượng không đẹp của tôi về cách làm việc.', 'Nhân viên thân thiệnGần khu phố cổ thuận tiện tham quan ngắm cảnhPhòng ốc tương đối nhỏ, nên chọn phòng 3 người ở ngoài sẽ thoáng mát và có ban côngTiện nghi một số cái đã xuống cấp, khách sạn cần sữa chữa nhiều nơi để làm mới lại', 'tốt, gan ho hoan kiem, thaun loi cho ai di du lich, gan cac dia die, du lich', 'This is the worst place I ever stayed. I stayed in a single room, which looked nothing like the pictures. A total flop house with two old televisions and a door that opened up to the water boiler and an air con that made noises intermittently all night. Stained bed sheets and bed bugs. I was moved to a slightly less dire room the second night. The place is cluttered and dirty, was glad to leave. The manager in bizarre contrast is immaculately presented and overly friendly. Odd.', 'I booked this room a month and half before going to Vietnam and directly got contact with Anna, who managed and helped me to get cheap and very great trips (specially around Hanoi and Ha long Bay) with discounts as well. I and my family really enjoyed all the stay; I hope someday to get back again', 'The stay was good for the helpful staffs and convenient for the prime location. However before booking any day trip from here try to take a look at some other places as my Halong bay 1 dat trip was not so good. The hotel itself is worth staying and totally value for money.', "i've got a private triple room. It's run by a family (I guess?), cheap, centrally located in the heart of Hanoi city. Dong Xuan market is just behind the street. We requested airport transfer through agoda.com but the hostel was not notified about this. So we had to take cab to the hostel. However the staffs are very friendly and helpful. They will try their best to serve us the best. A very pleasant stay.", "Anna is very helpful, gives good tips and is even available on Whatsapp. Well located hostel, perfect from the bus station to/from the airport. Make sure you get a room opposite to the street to avoid the noise. Very affordable and clean. I booked there for 2 nights and I'd recommand it for a short stay or if you are in transition.", 'The room was very dirty, fungi on the wall, AC did not work properly. Besides we even had cockroaches (room, kitchen area).Staff was very friendly and helpful.', 'Receptionist who didnt speak english showd us through google traslator "we got bed bugs in your room, we need to spray it - you will have diferent hotel"(way better than room with bed bugs, Im alergic for insect bite) ....... so after few minutes we have endend up in "Charming Hotel" where bathroom was falling apart becose of rust and smell of mold was realy strong. But the night was good, shower was working and when I turn up aircon to Heating you could breath it without mold smell.... but anyway for what i saw from Kangaroo for me no thanks :)', '1. Halal food is just a few meters walk (at the same street) -zainab restaurat..beside the Noor Mosque Hanoi\r2. Walkin distance to Dong Xuan Market\r3.Just walking dist to Hanoi Night Market (Fri-Sat-Sun)\r4. Near wet market\r5.Booked day trip at the counter\r6.Breakfast included\r7.Most of all - Lucy is ever ready to assist  - Tq for your hospitality!', "The room are nice and clean\rIt's quiet and you can sleep very well \rBreakfast is delicious! \rThe location in near everything you need \rAnd the staff is very kind, helpful and friendly !! \rI recommend you to book at kangaroo they are perfect !!", 'We stayed here for 5 days in total and were very satisfied with our stay. Both receptionists, Anh and Lucy, were tremendously helpful and assisted in booking our trips to Sapa and Halong Bay. The breakfast was delicious and filling as well.The hotel is also centrally located and is a 5 minute walk from the lakeside. There are convenience stores and an ATM located on the main street outside of the hotel.My only gripe with the hotel was that there was no lift. We had to walk up several flights of stairs to reach our room, so request a room on the lower floor if you can.All in all, a great stay!', "The friendly and helpful stuff really makes it up for a rather old hotel. The hotel itself could use a makeover, but if you're not looking for high class, this is a good place with all the basics. The rooms are well equipped with aircon, tv, fridge, kettle, hairdryer. Not really a hostel, it's actually a 2 star hotel.", 'This hotel is quite good hotel with good price. First time when we came, we got very nice room and we were very satisfied, but second time.. Our room had smoke smell in the evening and in the morning from the kitchen came fried eggs smell :) so.. but with that price this hotel is really very ok :) by the way service and location is perfect ;)', "We had excellent experience here. Our flight landed too late, about 2AM, but their driver was there when we came. We booked triple room with 2 beds for 3 persons and it had anything you need with air conditioner, hot water, bathtub, refrigerator, cable TV, tables. Their furniture is seem to be old but they're still good to use.Breakfast is not really tasty but it's included in room price, so you can save more money for your trip.Staff are very friendly and willing to help. They speak English very well, so you will not worry about that.One thing not good, I think, is Wifi. We cannot connect their Wifi everytime. But it's okay, not a big deal :)", 'It was alright. Ms moon is very caring and i feel pampered because of her assistance. She patiently assisted me in every ppssible way she can. She even help me deliver my passport when i left it when i was to board the bus to laos. Though there isnt a lift, i still enjoyed my time there. Thanks ms moon. I will surely recommend your hostel to my backpacker friends.', 'The people at the Kangaroo Hostel are very friendly, the food is good, and it is located in the old quarter about a 10 minute walk north of Hoan Kiem Lake. The room was comfortable. The shower drain was slow, yet, overall, very good value for money.', 'We had 3 great stays at this hostel. We left our big bags here as we travelled to Cat Ba and Bac Ha. Each time the staff were very helpful and welcoming. They have great tours on offer and helped with our onward travel. The hostel is clean and if you get a back room it is also very quiet. Thank you Kangaroo']

address: 73 Mã Mây, Hoàn Kiếm, Phố Cổ, Hà Nội, Việt Nam, 1000000
reviews: ['Địa điểm đẹp và hấp dẫn cho giải trí về đêm, 2 phút đi bộ đến tạ Hiện, 7 phút đến hồ Gươm.Sạch sẽ, ngăn nắp và gọn gàng, internet tốt. Nói chung là đáng giá tiền.Nếu nhân viên được đào tạo kỹ hơn, giao tiếp tốt chút nữa, như  nhiệt tình, tinh tế và không nói chuyện như "la, hét, thét" vào mặt khách hàng như một số hotgirl thì đây sẽ là thiên đường của dân balo bụi.', 'Lễ tân xếp chung phòng của chúng tôi với ng lạ mặc dù tôi đã book riêng full đủ giường.', 'Dirty', 'Right in the heart of Old Quarter. Close to bars and clubs, but still very quiet. The mattrasses and service are not mind-blowing but considering the price it is all very good. The breakfast is very good. One of the cheapest Hotels that i have been to ...but by faaaaar NOT one of the worst! I would come again and recommend it to friends who travel on a short budget!', "The location of this hostel is good, in the city center, every places are walkable, the staff was nice, they speak good english and so helpful, i only stay there for 1 night but everything was good, a bar downstairs was quite nice also, wasn't too many people there but there are always people hanging out there so you can talk with people surrounding you", 'We stayed in a private room on the fourth floor for two night right before flying back home. On the second night we found huge bedbugs in our bed. They did immediately give us some beds in a dorm room and apologized, but as I can understand from the other reviews, this is a general problem in this hostel. Definitely not okay!We have them in all our clothes and now have to freeze or hot wash everything from our bags, just to not infest our home with them. Such a bad experience.', 'Which is a good thing, imo. Stayed on the fourth floor, which was quiet at night. The ground lobby and bar is more of a place to hang out than to party. The free beer during certain periods is nice. The breakfast is great, with plenty of options to choose from. I had to print quite a lot of documents for my Chinese visa. Some of the staff were willing to help, some less so. All in all, recommended.', "Took around 9minutes to walk to the giant river and around 5-6 minutes with a skateboard, plenty of places to eat I also saw some market stand where they would sell clothes and food.The bad part is there's no AC but at that pricepoint it was a nobrainer for me.", 'Sometimes is good and something is not so good.\rGood:\rLocation for nightlife \rBest choice for saving money \rFree beer\rIncluding breakfast \rAir conditioner, hot shower and fans in the room.\r\rNot so good\rInternet, sometimes good sometimes not good\rStaff always makes noise when they have communicated.', 'You get what you paying for. Basic room with strong AC and fan. Small locker for belongings. Breakfast is free, but small. Wifi works great. Have a happy hour beer deal! Good wandering around location.', "I've stayed here for a few night to take a break from traveling. The down stairs has pads of sofas for relaxing and meeting me people, the dorm was clean with comfy beds and with on shower and toilet. Breakfast was included which wasn't just eggs and bread for once. In the even there was free beer so people gather down stair for that, which I felt was a really good touch as I'm a solo traveler and find it hard to meet people sometimes this just made it so worth while choosing this hostel. Me and someone I met did the sapa tour together, which was incredible they gave us loads of information, stored our big backpacks for free. The tour bus picked us up from the hostel and dropped us back right out side. Next time I'm in Hanoi I will be coming back here", "Amazingly friendly staff, always there to help and meet your needs - don't be scared to ask to change something as if they can they will.The tour to Halong Bay (2 days 1 night) was really good and similar price but Tam Coc was more expensive so just check stuff out first.Breakfast was great everyday! A lot more food than I had expected.Overall, really satisfied and I would recommend this place if you don't mind a bit of noise from the parties downstairs.", 'This place is probably the best Backpacker hostel I ever seen.The dorm was very basic, but the services are unique.A very rich free breakfast, free flow beer, super kind staff, and more of it, an excellent atmosphere where meeting new people is super easy.I loved this hostel. Super recommended!!', "Fun, happening hostel right in the center of it all! Always a party in this hostel including free beer at night! Nice thing is even through there's a party downstairs, I was on the 3rd floor and couldn't hear it.", "We love Funky Jungle hotel, we even stayed again when we stopped in Hanoi for 2 nights before come back home. It''s a great place to meet other travelers. The bar area downstairs has great deals ( Free beer from 6 - 7pm and 8pm until the keg runs out ). The staff was friendly and helpful. The tours were really good. Location is perfect, close to everything! We could definitely recommend this hostel.", "if you 're looking for an affordable hostel with a lot of fun for you and your friends then this in the one. We had a lot of fun. There's plenty of drinks offers and great music. The atmosphere is relaxed but everyone is up to party. With a pool table. Bar . Beds are super comfotable. FREE beer everyday from 6-7pm and again 8:30pm.  They have a lot of different tours to Sapa and Halong bay and other places. The staff are very helpful and freindly. ( Charlie is the best ). Highly recommended.", "We stayed here for a couple days, as soon as we entered the building we felt that the staff was very open and inviting, and tried to make our stay as smooth as possible without any hassle.The beds in the dorm room were great, haven't had a bad night's sleep in this hostel, and the breakfast in the morning, although basic, was a welcoming sight in the morning after enjoying all the free beers the previous night. They offer 3 kegs of beer per night, for an hour at 6 o'clock, and again at 8:30pm until the kegs are all empty. The staff speaks very good English, and can assist you from getting your sim card if you're a new arriver, to booking tours all over Vietnam. They are very welcoming and warm towards everybody including each other. At night, everybody is sitting in the common room having fun and chatting with one another. Food can also be ordered here, which they buy from outside and serve to you to make life easy.Excellent stay for backpackers, as every night you get the opportunity to meet new people. And as mentioned before, they offer great assistance in trying to get your itinerary for Vietnam sorted out by the best of their knowledge.In conclusion, I would recommend this hostel to everybody who wants to have a good time, and who wants to make new friends. While still having an excellent stay. Even though the hostel is relatively new, the quality of the service and facilities are up there: pool table, table football, a bar, public bathrooms on the ground floor, and fans everywhere.", 'Just backpackers there and every night free beer and it was clean. Staff was always more than helpful. \rBut we lost some things with the laundry service \rIts good to book tours there, we did the halong bay with a night on the sea and it was great', "Amazing stay at Funky Jungle  Hostel, we stayed in a dorm room which was a good opportunity to meet other people. It is a great place to meet people due to the daily pub crawls which start in the bar downstairs with lots of good drinks deals! The staff were fantastic - especially Steve and Hue ( travel desk ) . The tours that you can book at the travel desk are also very nice. You'll probably pay a bit more than across the street, but you certainly get what you pay for. We booked the tour to Sapa, Ha Long Bay with this hostel which was also awesome! Overall, I wouldn't recommend this hostel, as there are many choices that are just as affordable in the area.", "For $5 a night I'm yet to encounter a hostel which represents better value for money than Funky Jungle Hostel. The beds are seriously the best I've slept in whilst travelling, actually better than my bed back home, I never wanted to leave it. The staff are incredibly friendly and the social environment is tip top with free beer, foosball, pool, it really is a great place to socialise and treat as a base to enjoy Hanoi from... they even throw in free breakfast.Wonderful."]

address: 71 Hàng Lược, Hoàn Kiếm, Hà Nội, Chợ Đồng Xuân, Hà Nội, Việt Nam
reviews: ['Tôi để bảng nhờ dọn phòng nhưng nhân viên chỉ dọn đúng toilet. Giường ngủ 3 đêm vẫn để rất bẩn. Mền đắp chỉ là 1 miếng dra mỏng. Phòng bạn tôi máy điều hòa rất cũ. Địa điểm thuận tiện nhưng cách phục vụ và tiện nghi không tốt.', 'Chuyến bay của tôi đến trễ, và khi đến khách sạn báo là đã không giữ phòng cho tôi. Sau đó, họ chuyển tôi sang 1 khách sạn khác và nhân viên ở khách sạn đó rất trịch thượng, sau khi tôi ở đó 1 ngày và quay lại hỏi xem đã có phòng chưa, thì tôi lại được chuyển sang 1 khách sạn khác nữa. Tuy chuyến đi của tôi đã qua lâu, nhưng tôi vẫn muốn viết vì đó là 1 ấn tượng không đẹp của tôi về cách làm việc.', 'Nhân viên thân thiệnGần khu phố cổ thuận tiện tham quan ngắm cảnhPhòng ốc tương đối nhỏ, nên chọn phòng 3 người ở ngoài sẽ thoáng mát và có ban côngTiện nghi một số cái đã xuống cấp, khách sạn cần sữa chữa nhiều nơi để làm mới lại', 'tốt, gan ho hoan kiem, thaun loi cho ai di du lich, gan cac dia die, du lich', 'This is the worst place I ever stayed. I stayed in a single room, which looked nothing like the pictures. A total flop house with two old televisions and a door that opened up to the water boiler and an air con that made noises intermittently all night. Stained bed sheets and bed bugs. I was moved to a slightly less dire room the second night. The place is cluttered and dirty, was glad to leave. The manager in bizarre contrast is immaculately presented and overly friendly. Odd.', 'I booked this room a month and half before going to Vietnam and directly got contact with Anna, who managed and helped me to get cheap and very great trips (specially around Hanoi and Ha long Bay) with discounts as well. I and my family really enjoyed all the stay; I hope someday to get back again', 'The stay was good for the helpful staffs and convenient for the prime location. However before booking any day trip from here try to take a look at some other places as my Halong bay 1 dat trip was not so good. The hotel itself is worth staying and totally value for money.', "i've got a private triple room. It's run by a family (I guess?), cheap, centrally located in the heart of Hanoi city. Dong Xuan market is just behind the street. We requested airport transfer through agoda.com but the hostel was not notified about this. So we had to take cab to the hostel. However the staffs are very friendly and helpful. They will try their best to serve us the best. A very pleasant stay.", "Anna is very helpful, gives good tips and is even available on Whatsapp. Well located hostel, perfect from the bus station to/from the airport. Make sure you get a room opposite to the street to avoid the noise. Very affordable and clean. I booked there for 2 nights and I'd recommand it for a short stay or if you are in transition.", 'The room was very dirty, fungi on the wall, AC did not work properly. Besides we even had cockroaches (room, kitchen area).Staff was very friendly and helpful.', 'Receptionist who didnt speak english showd us through google traslator "we got bed bugs in your room, we need to spray it - you will have diferent hotel"(way better than room with bed bugs, Im alergic for insect bite) ....... so after few minutes we have endend up in "Charming Hotel" where bathroom was falling apart becose of rust and smell of mold was realy strong. But the night was good, shower was working and when I turn up aircon to Heating you could breath it without mold smell.... but anyway for what i saw from Kangaroo for me no thanks :)', '1. Halal food is just a few meters walk (at the same street) -zainab restaurat..beside the Noor Mosque Hanoi\r2. Walkin distance to Dong Xuan Market\r3.Just walking dist to Hanoi Night Market (Fri-Sat-Sun)\r4. Near wet market\r5.Booked day trip at the counter\r6.Breakfast included\r7.Most of all - Lucy is ever ready to assist  - Tq for your hospitality!', "The room are nice and clean\rIt's quiet and you can sleep very well \rBreakfast is delicious! \rThe location in near everything you need \rAnd the staff is very kind, helpful and friendly !! \rI recommend you to book at kangaroo they are perfect !!", 'We stayed here for 5 days in total and were very satisfied with our stay. Both receptionists, Anh and Lucy, were tremendously helpful and assisted in booking our trips to Sapa and Halong Bay. The breakfast was delicious and filling as well.The hotel is also centrally located and is a 5 minute walk from the lakeside. There are convenience stores and an ATM located on the main street outside of the hotel.My only gripe with the hotel was that there was no lift. We had to walk up several flights of stairs to reach our room, so request a room on the lower floor if you can.All in all, a great stay!', "The friendly and helpful stuff really makes it up for a rather old hotel. The hotel itself could use a makeover, but if you're not looking for high class, this is a good place with all the basics. The rooms are well equipped with aircon, tv, fridge, kettle, hairdryer. Not really a hostel, it's actually a 2 star hotel.", 'This hotel is quite good hotel with good price. First time when we came, we got very nice room and we were very satisfied, but second time.. Our room had smoke smell in the evening and in the morning from the kitchen came fried eggs smell :) so.. but with that price this hotel is really very ok :) by the way service and location is perfect ;)', "We had excellent experience here. Our flight landed too late, about 2AM, but their driver was there when we came. We booked triple room with 2 beds for 3 persons and it had anything you need with air conditioner, hot water, bathtub, refrigerator, cable TV, tables. Their furniture is seem to be old but they're still good to use.Breakfast is not really tasty but it's included in room price, so you can save more money for your trip.Staff are very friendly and willing to help. They speak English very well, so you will not worry about that.One thing not good, I think, is Wifi. We cannot connect their Wifi everytime. But it's okay, not a big deal :)", 'It was alright. Ms moon is very caring and i feel pampered because of her assistance. She patiently assisted me in every ppssible way she can. She even help me deliver my passport when i left it when i was to board the bus to laos. Though there isnt a lift, i still enjoyed my time there. Thanks ms moon. I will surely recommend your hostel to my backpacker friends.', 'The people at the Kangaroo Hostel are very friendly, the food is good, and it is located in the old quarter about a 10 minute walk north of Hoan Kiem Lake. The room was comfortable. The shower drain was slow, yet, overall, very good value for money.', 'We had 3 great stays at this hostel. We left our big bags here as we travelled to Cat Ba and Bac Ha. Each time the staff were very helpful and welcoming. They have great tours on offer and helped with our onward travel. The hostel is clean and if you get a back room it is also very quiet. Thank you Kangaroo']

address: 22 Tạ Hiện, Quận Hoàn Kiếm, Phố Cổ, Hà Nội, Việt Nam
reviews: ['Khách sạn trong khu phố cổ, khá bất tiện nếu bạn đi xe ôtô. Nếu bạn sợ ồn ào thì nơi này không phũ hợp, nếu bạn thích đông vui nhộn nhịp thì hãy chọn nơi này.', 'Khách sạn có dịch vụ rất tốt, nhân viên lịch sự nhã nhặn. Spa cũng rất tốt. Tuy nhiên buffet sáng và nhà hàng thì không có gì đặc sắc, thức ăn nhà hàng hơi mắc.Phòng tiện nghi, tuy nhiên cách âm không tốt, phòng bên cạnh đóng mở cửa đều nghe rất rõ, vì vậy nên có 1 đêm ko ngủ được vì phòng bên cạnh về khuya :(', 'Khách san xuống cấp rất nhiều, nhân viên  dễ thương, lich su, giup do khach luu tri rat nhieu.', 'That su  ks đã quá xuống cấp!', 'nhan vien nhiet tinh than thien', 'Khách sạn ngay trung tâm, gần hồ Hoàn Kiếm. Các dịch vụ giải trí về đêm diễn ra ngay trước khách sạn. Phòng ở yên tĩnh, sạch sẽ.', 'vi tri dong vui', 'I am from Singapore and I worked in the hospitality industry before, currently in the luxury retail trade. Therefore, I believed I knew what is professionalism and excellent customer service when I experience one.Front Office Reception: They have an amazing team of service staff. Almost everyone speaks good English and has a high energy level whenever guests approach them for assistance. The MVP among them has to be Jack, one of the most helpful and professional gentlemen with a big warm smile and enthusiasm in providing advice and local recommendations for the best of our experience in Hanoi. He even created a GROUP CHAT in Whatsapp for us, so as to allow us to text him should we ever need help or got lost in the City... how amazing is that!!! He went over and beyond in terms of service level for a 3-4 stars hotel! Essence Cafe: Both Annie and Alex(female) provided superb service during our dinner at the cafe. Smiley, patience, professional, attention to details. Food was YUMMY!', 'I am from Singapore and I worked in the hospitality industry before, currently in the luxury retail trade. Therefore, I believed I knew what is professionalism and excellent customer service when I experience one.Front Office Reception: They have an amazing team of service staff. Almost everyone speaks good English and has a high energy level whenever guests approach them for assistance. The MVP among them has to be Jack, one of the most helpful and professional gentlemen with a big warm smile and enthusiasm in providing advice and local recommendations for the best of our experience in Hanoi. He even created a GROUP CHAT in Whatsapp for us, so as to allow us to text him should we ever need help or got lost in the City... how amazing is that!!! He went over and beyond in terms of service level for a 3-4 stars hotel! Essence Cafe: Both Annie and Alex(female) provided superb service during our dinner at the cafe. Smiley, patience, professional, attention to details. Food was YUMMY!', 'Everything was perfect.- Location in old town is perfect for sight seeing-Best staff I have had attend to me, especially Christine- One of the best mattress I have slept on- AC works perfectly- Sumptuous breakfast spread that changes day to day- Afternoon tea. Need I say more. Cherry on top of an already perfect cake. Highly recommended. Lived up to the hype.', 'The hotel can consider having more hooks to hang the towels, clothes, etc.  Perhaps have more switches to control the lights instead of just 1.  This family room is very good, very comfortable.JOE, who is at the front desk, is exceptionally fantastic.  He is not only very helpful and kind with my family and I.  He is very good with all the guests as well.  He is exceptionally smiley, always.  I hope JOE can be rewarded and appreciated by the company.  He is a role model to his co-workers.  Christine, who is also at the front desk, had been helpful.  Thank you very much for the few days of stay with ESSENCE.', "Worth the money anyways, however, don't pick it if you want to get rest early at night. Location is surrounded by many local street beer restaurants and pubs, which attracts many tourists and local at night.", 'Pros:  staff friendly, professional and overall excellent.  Nice quiet, clean rooms.  Great location for nightlife.Cons:  watered down orange and other fruit juices for breakfast.  Really it was just flavoured water and a very insipid colour - a bit pathetic.  I only mention it as it was so laughable.  No ironing facilities, no gym.', 'Nothing quite beats the warmth and helpfulness of the staff here. Excellent location in the heart of Old Quarter, but that also entails quite about of noise before 12 MN when the streets in front are packed with diners. Highy recommend the suite with balcony as its away from the noise and very cozy. The breakfast is superb. Thanks again for the amazing warm welcome!', "Our connectung room aircond had some problem and staff came with technician to fix even though it's midnight. They provided a fan because the are not able to fix. Staff also provided complimentary fruits and juices due to aircond problems. They fix the aircond next day and called us in the evening to check with us on the condition of room.", "Staff were friendly and breakfast spread were adequate. We stayed in a connecting room, size was reasonable. However, the design of the bedframe was those oversize wooden frame which was bigger than the mattress, resulting my wife and kids knocking onto them on a few occasions. One room didn't have any window while the other came with a small window without any view. Hotel is located along a fairly busy street, but we hardly hear any noise during the night.Overall, my family enjoyed our stay at the hotel and will be back again.Regards,WeeOverall, we did enjoy our stay", "It's centrally located, and the room is very comfortable! The staff were friendly and very welcoming.", "Nice accommodation, it's the one of a few nice experience in my first Vietnam travel. There are many kindly attendant, especially Christine, she always provide nice service and answer my question as much as possible, thanks.", "If you are looking for hotel in central location, food and drink at door step, with exceptional customer service. This will be the hotel you should consider. On the other end, hotel room is not impressive and bathroom is small and old, despite staying in a junior suite. It didn't even come close to North American standard. There are many newer hotel around, with larger room and way cheaper rate. Calling taxi or grab is also challenging due to street closure during weekend evening.", 'We are very happy to stayed in the Essence Hotel during our holiday.  Their location is good, the hotel is clean & comfortable, the restaurant served nice breakfast, lunch and dinner. We are no regret to have our lunch & dinner during our short stay. The staff are always happy to provide any support during our stay in Hanoi. Last but not least, many thanks to Tom from buying tickets, allow us to shower before we ahead to train station, arranging taxi and guide us to the train cabin. Many thanks to Sarah Bui of all the kind assistance & tour suggestion during our stay.  We enjoyed the water puppet show. We will never forget their smiling faces & definitely will return when we back to Hanoi.']

address: 91C Hàng Mã, Quận Hòan Kiếm, Phố Cổ, Hà Nội, Việt Nam
reviews: ['Phù hợp cho những nhóm bạn đi du lịch bụi, giá cả phải chăng.', "There was no one there most of the time. No amenities, not even water. I booked with the option to pay in cash on the property, but they charged my card for the room without asking me first to verify my payment choice. I'm furious about the lack of communication and service. The room itself was unimpressive and there was no soap in the dispenser to wash my hands, and barely any toilet paper. There were also few easy to reach electrical outlets. An extension cord should have been provided.", 'bed is comfortable and hostel not far to resteran, night club and mart. i like this place', "I stayed in a private with two friends and the beds were so comfortable compared to all beds I've slept on in the last few months! The room is nice and cozy but the bathroom is pretty tiny. Breakfast is decent. The staff is very helpful. I would definitely stay again!", "I only stayed here two nights as my roommates were quite noisy and made a mess in the bathroom every day. The staff was very friendly overall but their cleaning needs to be improved. After a day the floor in the bathroom was very dirty and full of hair so was the floor in the room. That is not the staff's fault but they didn't clean the bathroom properly in the morning. There was still hair in the sink and on the floor. The shower was broken when I first arrived. However the beds are very comfortable and breakfast is nice with toast eggs and fresh fruits. Also the place is quiet and as a solo traveller I felt a little lonely at times. I appreciate the free maps. Overall the stay was good.", 'as advertised, a simple hostel.  perfect for budget travelers, or a quick overnight between connections.  clean bathrooms, cold dorm rooms (with thick comforters), provided lockers with keys.', 'enjoyed it very much', 'Quiet Room, Local Food', "The dorm was ok, good lockers for your bags. Staff were really helpful, they let me change my booking for no extra cost when I realised I would miss the Sunday market at bac ha if I stayed when I'd originally booked for. The also helped my work out itinerary and bookings for my travel to sapa and halong bay as I was on restricted time and I also received free breakfast on a day when I was just passing through and not staying at the hostel that day. Very helpful and made the stay easy. Good location too", 'Enjoyable stay, Friendly and very helpful staff, nice atmosphere!!!', "The rooms were nice here and the staff are really helpful. It isn't as easy to meet lots of people here so Hanoi backpackers is probably better for young solo travellers wanting to party, but I still met lots of people in the bar for free beer at 6pm every day! And it was nice and quiet, whilst still being walking distance from the 'beer corner' in the city.", 'Probably, the breakfast provided from them is the bestI have had in a budget hostel, in addition to providing free beer for one hour in every evening. But the noise from the neighbours lasting till the mid night is the only thing negative. Overall I would still give them A', 'Initially I admitted I was abit skeptical due to some negative reviews left in Agoda and wondered if they are true to the words. Weighing on its positive reviews, I decided to bet my dollars on it. It turned out that the negative reviews here are baseless and perhaps prejudice to some point of the unrealistic expectations that they thought they deserved when the price is already low.Hanoi Hostel gives me an affordable stay with values that far exceeds the inexpensive price tag. Especially the kind female coordinator who always responds emails within 24 hours, she offers kind advice, patience and being helpful in all arrangements and enquiries. She reminds me of the Greek story of Odyssey and the hospitality code, Xenia. Other staffs have also been extremely attentive and helpful.My helpful advice to other Agoda users is, what you pay is what you get. That’s the universal truth in life. If you want a better room or tour package, be prepared to pay for more.Choices are given to you so that you have the freedom to choose.', 'Hanoi hostel is for budget backpackers. Cheap rate, perfect for short stay. The staff are very helpful and friendly. Room cleaness needs some improvement tho.', 'My stay suited my needs perfectly. My boyfriend and I stayed in the dorm room for a day. We had a day in Hanoi between two overnight trains and decided to book a place where we could shower, escape the heat and keep our bags. For that, this hostel was perfect.', 'The rooms were dirty, especially the bathroom. Sharing with 8 people requires daily thorough cleaning. Breakfast was disappointing. Unlimited, but no choice, one egg and only jam and butter after that. Location was good, and people in my room were really nice.', 'I think u should not choose this hostel, the staff here is very terrible, she is not willing to help us, and she is very rude and impolite, i think i would not suggest anyone to stay.Also, the toilet is not clean as well.']

address: 22 Tạ Hiện, Quận Hoàn Kiếm, Phố Cổ, Hà Nội, Việt Nam
reviews: ['Khách sạn trong khu phố cổ, khá bất tiện nếu bạn đi xe ôtô. Nếu bạn sợ ồn ào thì nơi này không phũ hợp, nếu bạn thích đông vui nhộn nhịp thì hãy chọn nơi này.', 'Khách sạn có dịch vụ rất tốt, nhân viên lịch sự nhã nhặn. Spa cũng rất tốt. Tuy nhiên buffet sáng và nhà hàng thì không có gì đặc sắc, thức ăn nhà hàng hơi mắc.Phòng tiện nghi, tuy nhiên cách âm không tốt, phòng bên cạnh đóng mở cửa đều nghe rất rõ, vì vậy nên có 1 đêm ko ngủ được vì phòng bên cạnh về khuya :(', 'Khách san xuống cấp rất nhiều, nhân viên  dễ thương, lich su, giup do khach luu tri rat nhieu.', 'That su  ks đã quá xuống cấp!', 'nhan vien nhiet tinh than thien', 'Khách sạn ngay trung tâm, gần hồ Hoàn Kiếm. Các dịch vụ giải trí về đêm diễn ra ngay trước khách sạn. Phòng ở yên tĩnh, sạch sẽ.', 'vi tri dong vui', 'I am from Singapore and I worked in the hospitality industry before, currently in the luxury retail trade. Therefore, I believed I knew what is professionalism and excellent customer service when I experience one.Front Office Reception: They have an amazing team of service staff. Almost everyone speaks good English and has a high energy level whenever guests approach them for assistance. The MVP among them has to be Jack, one of the most helpful and professional gentlemen with a big warm smile and enthusiasm in providing advice and local recommendations for the best of our experience in Hanoi. He even created a GROUP CHAT in Whatsapp for us, so as to allow us to text him should we ever need help or got lost in the City... how amazing is that!!! He went over and beyond in terms of service level for a 3-4 stars hotel! Essence Cafe: Both Annie and Alex(female) provided superb service during our dinner at the cafe. Smiley, patience, professional, attention to details. Food was YUMMY!', 'I am from Singapore and I worked in the hospitality industry before, currently in the luxury retail trade. Therefore, I believed I knew what is professionalism and excellent customer service when I experience one.Front Office Reception: They have an amazing team of service staff. Almost everyone speaks good English and has a high energy level whenever guests approach them for assistance. The MVP among them has to be Jack, one of the most helpful and professional gentlemen with a big warm smile and enthusiasm in providing advice and local recommendations for the best of our experience in Hanoi. He even created a GROUP CHAT in Whatsapp for us, so as to allow us to text him should we ever need help or got lost in the City... how amazing is that!!! He went over and beyond in terms of service level for a 3-4 stars hotel! Essence Cafe: Both Annie and Alex(female) provided superb service during our dinner at the cafe. Smiley, patience, professional, attention to details. Food was YUMMY!', 'Everything was perfect.- Location in old town is perfect for sight seeing-Best staff I have had attend to me, especially Christine- One of the best mattress I have slept on- AC works perfectly- Sumptuous breakfast spread that changes day to day- Afternoon tea. Need I say more. Cherry on top of an already perfect cake. Highly recommended. Lived up to the hype.', 'The hotel can consider having more hooks to hang the towels, clothes, etc.  Perhaps have more switches to control the lights instead of just 1.  This family room is very good, very comfortable.JOE, who is at the front desk, is exceptionally fantastic.  He is not only very helpful and kind with my family and I.  He is very good with all the guests as well.  He is exceptionally smiley, always.  I hope JOE can be rewarded and appreciated by the company.  He is a role model to his co-workers.  Christine, who is also at the front desk, had been helpful.  Thank you very much for the few days of stay with ESSENCE.', "Worth the money anyways, however, don't pick it if you want to get rest early at night. Location is surrounded by many local street beer restaurants and pubs, which attracts many tourists and local at night.", 'Pros:  staff friendly, professional and overall excellent.  Nice quiet, clean rooms.  Great location for nightlife.Cons:  watered down orange and other fruit juices for breakfast.  Really it was just flavoured water and a very insipid colour - a bit pathetic.  I only mention it as it was so laughable.  No ironing facilities, no gym.', 'Nothing quite beats the warmth and helpfulness of the staff here. Excellent location in the heart of Old Quarter, but that also entails quite about of noise before 12 MN when the streets in front are packed with diners. Highy recommend the suite with balcony as its away from the noise and very cozy. The breakfast is superb. Thanks again for the amazing warm welcome!', "Our connectung room aircond had some problem and staff came with technician to fix even though it's midnight. They provided a fan because the are not able to fix. Staff also provided complimentary fruits and juices due to aircond problems. They fix the aircond next day and called us in the evening to check with us on the condition of room.", "Staff were friendly and breakfast spread were adequate. We stayed in a connecting room, size was reasonable. However, the design of the bedframe was those oversize wooden frame which was bigger than the mattress, resulting my wife and kids knocking onto them on a few occasions. One room didn't have any window while the other came with a small window without any view. Hotel is located along a fairly busy street, but we hardly hear any noise during the night.Overall, my family enjoyed our stay at the hotel and will be back again.Regards,WeeOverall, we did enjoy our stay", "It's centrally located, and the room is very comfortable! The staff were friendly and very welcoming.", "Nice accommodation, it's the one of a few nice experience in my first Vietnam travel. There are many kindly attendant, especially Christine, she always provide nice service and answer my question as much as possible, thanks.", "If you are looking for hotel in central location, food and drink at door step, with exceptional customer service. This will be the hotel you should consider. On the other end, hotel room is not impressive and bathroom is small and old, despite staying in a junior suite. It didn't even come close to North American standard. There are many newer hotel around, with larger room and way cheaper rate. Calling taxi or grab is also challenging due to street closure during weekend evening.", 'We are very happy to stayed in the Essence Hotel during our holiday.  Their location is good, the hotel is clean & comfortable, the restaurant served nice breakfast, lunch and dinner. We are no regret to have our lunch & dinner during our short stay. The staff are always happy to provide any support during our stay in Hanoi. Last but not least, many thanks to Tom from buying tickets, allow us to shower before we ahead to train station, arranging taxi and guide us to the train cabin. Many thanks to Sarah Bui of all the kind assistance & tour suggestion during our stay.  We enjoyed the water puppet show. We will never forget their smiling faces & definitely will return when we back to Hanoi.']
